text_he: ויהי כשמע חירם את-דברי שלמה--וישמח מאד ויאמר ברוך יהוה היום אשר נתן לדוד בן חכם על-העם הרב הזה | And it came to pass when Hiram heard the words of Solomon that he rejoiced greatly and said 'Blessed be the LORD this day who hath given unto David a wise son over this great people' | וירדף גיחזי אחרי נעמן ויראה נעמן רץ אחריו ויפל מעל המרכבה לקראתו ויאמר השלום | So Gehazi followed after Naaman And when Naaman saw one running after him he alighted from the chariot to meet him and said 'Is all well'
text_en: And it came to pass, when Hiram heard the words of Solomon, that he rejoiced greatly, and said: 'Blessed be the LORD this day, who hath given unto David a wise son over this great people.'
text_pisuk: וַיְהִי כִּשְׁמֹעַ חִירָם, אֶת-דִּבְרֵי שְׁלֹמֹה--וַיִּשְׂמַח מְאֹד; וַיֹּאמֶר, בָּרוּךְ יְהוָה הַיּוֹם, אֲשֶׁר נָתַן לְדָוִד בֵּן חָכָם, עַל-הָעָם הָרָב הַזֶּה. | And it came to pass, when Hiram heard the words of Solomon, that he rejoiced greatly, and said: 'Blessed be the LORD this day, who hath given unto David a wise son over this great people.' | וַיִּרְדֹּף גֵּיחֲזִי, אַחֲרֵי נַעֲמָן; וַיִּרְאֶה נַעֲמָן, רָץ אַחֲרָיו, וַיִּפֹּל מֵעַל הַמֶּרְכָּבָה לִקְרָאתוֹ, וַיֹּאמֶר הֲשָׁלוֹם. | So Gehazi followed after Naaman. And when Naaman saw one running after him, he alighted from the chariot to meet him, and said: 'Is all well?'

text_he: וישלח חירם אל-שלמה לאמר שמעתי את אשר-שלחת אלי אני אעשה את-כל-חפצך בעצי ארזים ובעצי ברושים | And Hiram sent to Solomon saying 'I have heard that which thou hast sent unto me I will do all thy desire concerning timber of cedar and concerning timber of cypress | ויאמר שלום אדני שלחני לאמר הנה עתה זה באו אלי שני-נערים מהר אפרים מבני הנביאים תנה-נא להם כר-כסף ושתי חלפות בגדים | And he said 'All is well My master hath sent me saying Behold even now there are come to me from the hill-country of Ephraim two young men of the sons of the prophets give them I pray thee a talent of silver and two changes of raiment'
text_en: And Hiram sent to Solomon, saying: 'I have heard that which thou hast sent unto me; I will do all thy desire concerning timber of cedar, and concerning timber of cypress.
text_pisuk: וַיִּשְׁלַח חִירָם, אֶל-שְׁלֹמֹה לֵאמֹר, שָׁמַעְתִּי, אֵת אֲשֶׁר-שָׁלַחְתָּ אֵלָי; אֲנִי אֶעֱשֶׂה אֶת-כָּל-חֶפְצְךָ, בַּעֲצֵי אֲרָזִים וּבַעֲצֵי בְרוֹשִׁים. | And Hiram sent to Solomon, saying: 'I have heard that which thou hast sent unto me; I will do all thy desire concerning timber of cedar, and concerning timber of cypress. | וַיֹּאמֶר שָׁלוֹם, אֲדֹנִי שְׁלָחַנִי לֵאמֹר, הִנֵּה עַתָּה זֶה בָּאוּ אֵלַי שְׁנֵי-נְעָרִים מֵהַר אֶפְרַיִם, מִבְּנֵי הַנְּבִיאִים; תְּנָה-נָּא לָהֶם כִּכַּר-כֶּסֶף, וּשְׁתֵּי חֲלִפוֹת בְּגָדִים. | And he said: 'All is well. My master hath sent me, saying: Behold, even now there are come to me from the hill-country of Ephraim two young men of the sons of the prophets; give them, I pray thee, a talent of silver, and two changes of raiment.'

text_he: עבדי ירדו מן-הלבנון ימה ואני אשימם דברות בים עד-המקום אשר-תשלח אלי ונפצתים שם--ואתה תשא ואתה תעשה את-חפצי לת לחם ביתי | My servants shall bring them down from Lebanon unto the sea and I will make them into rafts to go by sea unto the place that thou shalt appoint me and will cause them to be broken up there and thou shalt receive them and thou shalt accomplish my desire in giving food for my household' | ויאמר נעמן הואל קח כרים ויפרץ-בו ויצר כרים כסף בשני חרטים ושתי חלפות בגדים ויתן אל-שני נעריו וישאו לפניו | And Naaman said 'Be content take two talents' And he urged him and bound two talents of silver in two bags with two changes of raiment and laid them upon two of his servants and they bore them before him
text_en: My servants shall bring them down from Lebanon unto the sea; and I will make them into rafts to go by sea unto the place that thou shalt appoint me, and will cause them to be broken up there, and thou shalt receive them; and thou shalt accomplish my desire, in giving food for my household.'
text_pisuk: עֲבָדַי יֹרִדוּ מִן-הַלְּבָנוֹן יָמָּה, וַאֲנִי אֲשִׂימֵם דֹּבְרוֹת בַּיָּם עַד-הַמָּקוֹם אֲשֶׁר-תִּשְׁלַח אֵלַי וְנִפַּצְתִּים שָׁם--וְאַתָּה תִשָּׂא; וְאַתָּה תַּעֲשֶׂה אֶת-חֶפְצִי, לָתֵת לֶחֶם בֵּיתִי. | My servants shall bring them down from Lebanon unto the sea; and I will make them into rafts to go by sea unto the place that thou shalt appoint me, and will cause them to be broken up there, and thou shalt receive them; and thou shalt accomplish my desire, in giving food for my household.' | וַיֹּאמֶר נַעֲמָן, הוֹאֵל קַח כִּכָּרָיִם; וַיִּפְרָץ-בּוֹ, וַיָּצַר כִּכְּרַיִם כֶּסֶף בִּשְׁנֵי חֲרִטִים וּשְׁתֵּי חֲלִפוֹת בְּגָדִים, וַיִּתֵּן אֶל-שְׁנֵי נְעָרָיו, וַיִּשְׂאוּ לְפָנָיו. | And Naaman said: 'Be content, take two talents.' And he urged him, and bound two talents of silver in two bags, with two changes of raiment, and laid them upon two of his servants; and they bore them before him.

text_he: ויהי חירום נתן לשלמה עצי ארזים ועצי ברושים--כל-חפצו | So Hiram gave Solomon timber of cedar and timber of cypress according to all his desire | ויבא אל-העפל ויקח מידם ויפקד בית וישלח את-האנשים וילכו | And when he came to the hill he took them from their hand and deposited them in the house and he let the men go and they departed
text_en: So Hiram gave Solomon timber of cedar and timber of cypress according to all his desire.
text_pisuk: וַיְהִי חִירוֹם נֹתֵן לִשְׁלֹמֹה, עֲצֵי אֲרָזִים וַעֲצֵי בְרוֹשִׁים--כָּל-חֶפְצוֹ. | So Hiram gave Solomon timber of cedar and timber of cypress according to all his desire. | וַיָּבֹא, אֶל-הָעֹפֶל, וַיִּקַּח מִיָּדָם, וַיִּפְקֹד בַּבָּיִת; וַיְשַׁלַּח אֶת-הָאֲנָשִׁים, וַיֵּלֵכוּ. | And when he came to the hill, he took them from their hand, and deposited them in the house; and he let the men go, and they departed.

text_he: ושלמה נתן לחירם עשרים אלף כר חטים מכלת לביתו ועשרים כר שמן כתית כה-יתן שלמה לחירם שנה בשנה | And Solomon gave Hiram twenty thousand measures of wheat for food to his household and twenty measures of beaten oil thus gave Solomon to Hiram year by year | והוא-בא ויעמד אל-אדניו ויאמר אליו אלישע מאן (מאין) גחזי ויאמר לא-הלך עבדך אנה ואנה | But he went in and stood before his master And Elisha said unto him 'Whence comest thou Gehazi' And he said 'Thy servant went no whither'
text_en: And Solomon gave Hiram twenty thousand measures of wheat for food to his household, and twenty measures of beaten oil; thus gave Solomon to Hiram year by year.
text_pisuk: וּשְׁלֹמֹה נָתַן לְחִירָם עֶשְׂרִים אֶלֶף כֹּר חִטִּים, מַכֹּלֶת לְבֵיתוֹ, וְעֶשְׂרִים כֹּר, שֶׁמֶן כָּתִית: כֹּה-יִתֵּן שְׁלֹמֹה לְחִירָם, שָׁנָה בְשָׁנָה. | And Solomon gave Hiram twenty thousand measures of wheat for food to his household, and twenty measures of beaten oil; thus gave Solomon to Hiram year by year. | וְהוּא-בָא, וַיַּעֲמֹד אֶל-אֲדֹנָיו, וַיֹּאמֶר אֵלָיו אֱלִישָׁע, מאן (מֵאַיִן) גֵּחֲזִי; וַיֹּאמֶר, לֹא-הָלַךְ עַבְדְּךָ אָנֶה וָאָנָה. | But he went in, and stood before his master. And Elisha said unto him: 'Whence comest thou, Gehazi?' And he said: 'Thy servant went no whither.'

text_he: ויהוה נתן חכמה לשלמה כאשר דבר-לו ויהי שלם בין חירם ובין שלמה ויכרתו ברית שניהם | And the LORD gave Solomon wisdom as He promised him and there was peace between Hiram and Solomon and they two made a league together | ויאמר אליו לא-לבי הלך כאשר הפך-איש מעל מרכבתו לקראתך העת לקחת את-הכסף ולקחת בגדים וזיתים וכרמים וצאן ובקר ועבדים ושפחות | And he said unto him 'Went not my heart  when the man turned back from his chariot to meet thee Is it a time to receive money and to receive garments and oliveyards and vineyards and sheep and oxen and men-servants and maid-servants
text_en: And the LORD gave Solomon wisdom, as He promised him; and there was peace between Hiram and Solomon; and they two made a league together.
text_pisuk: וַיהוָה, נָתַן חָכְמָה לִשְׁלֹמֹה, כַּאֲשֶׁר, דִּבֶּר-לוֹ; וַיְהִי שָׁלֹם, בֵּין חִירָם וּבֵין שְׁלֹמֹה, וַיִּכְרְתוּ בְרִית, שְׁנֵיהֶם. | And the LORD gave Solomon wisdom, as He promised him; and there was peace between Hiram and Solomon; and they two made a league together. | וַיֹּאמֶר אֵלָיו לֹא-לִבִּי הָלַךְ, כַּאֲשֶׁר הָפַךְ-אִישׁ מֵעַל מֶרְכַּבְתּוֹ לִקְרָאתֶךָ; הַעֵת לָקַחַת אֶת-הַכֶּסֶף, וְלָקַחַת בְּגָדִים, וְזֵיתִים וּכְרָמִים וְצֹאן וּבָקָר, וַעֲבָדִים וּשְׁפָחוֹת. | And he said unto him: 'Went not my heart , when the man turned back from his chariot to meet thee? Is it a time to receive money, and to receive garments, and oliveyards and vineyards, and sheep and oxen, and men-servants and maid-servants?

text_he: ויעל המלך שלמה מס מכל-ישראל ויהי המס שלשים אלף איש | And king Solomon raised a levy out of all Israel and the levy was thirty thousand men | וצרעת נעמן תדבק-בך ובזרעך לעולם ויצא מלפניו מצרע כשלג | The leprosy therefore of Naaman shall cleave unto thee and unto thy seed for ever' And he went out from his presence a leper as white as snow
text_en: And king Solomon raised a levy out of all Israel; and the levy was thirty thousand men.
text_pisuk: וַיַּעַל הַמֶּלֶךְ שְׁלֹמֹה מַס, מִכָּל-יִשְׂרָאֵל; וַיְהִי הַמַּס, שְׁלֹשִׁים אֶלֶף אִישׁ. | And king Solomon raised a levy out of all Israel; and the levy was thirty thousand men. | וְצָרַעַת נַעֲמָן תִּדְבַּק-בְּךָ, וּבְזַרְעֲךָ לְעוֹלָם; וַיֵּצֵא מִלְּפָנָיו, מְצֹרָע כַּשָּׁלֶג. | The leprosy therefore of Naaman shall cleave unto thee, and unto thy seed for ever.' And he went out from his presence a leper as white as snow.

text_he: וישלחם לבנונה עשרת אלפים בחדש חליפות--חדש יהיו בלבנון שנים חדשים ביתו ואדנירם על-המס
text_en: And he sent them to Lebanon, ten thousand a month by courses: a month they were in Lebanon, and two months at home; and Adoniram was over the levy.{S}
text_pisuk: וַיִּשְׁלָחֵם לְבָנוֹנָה, עֲשֶׂרֶת אֲלָפִים בַּחֹדֶשׁ חֲלִיפוֹת--חֹדֶשׁ יִהְיוּ בַלְּבָנוֹן, שְׁנַיִם חֳדָשִׁים בְּבֵיתוֹ; וַאֲדֹנִירָם, עַל-הַמַּס.

text_he: ויהי לשלמה שבעים אלף נשא סבל ושמנים אלף חצב בהר
text_en: And Solomon had threescore and ten thousand that bore burdens, and fourscore thousand that were hewers in the mountains;
text_pisuk: וַיְהִי לִשְׁלֹמֹה שִׁבְעִים אֶלֶף, נֹשֵׂא סַבָּל; וּשְׁמֹנִים אֶלֶף, חֹצֵב בָּהָר.

text_he: לבד משרי הנצבים לשלמה אשר על-המלאכה שלשת אלפים ושלש מאות--הרדים בעם העשים במלאכה
text_en: besides Solomon's chief officers that were over the work, three thousand and three hundred, who bore rule over the people that wrought in the work.{S}
text_pisuk: לְבַד מִשָּׂרֵי הַנִּצָּבִים לִשְׁלֹמֹה, אֲשֶׁר עַל-הַמְּלָאכָה, שְׁלֹשֶׁת אֲלָפִים, וּשְׁלֹשׁ מֵאוֹת--הָרֹדִים בָּעָם, הָעֹשִׂים בַּמְּלָאכָה.

text_he: ויצו המלך ויסעו אבנים גדלות אבנים יקרות ליסד הבית--אבני גזית
text_en: And the king commanded, and they quarried great stones, costly stones, to lay the foundation of the house with hewn stone.
text_pisuk: וַיְצַו הַמֶּלֶךְ וַיַּסִּעוּ אֲבָנִים גְּדֹלוֹת אֲבָנִים יְקָרוֹת, לְיַסֵּד הַבָּיִת--אַבְנֵי גָזִית.

text_he: ויפסלו בני שלמה ובני חירום--והגבלים ויכינו העצים והאבנים לבנות הבית
text_en: And Solomon's builders and Hiram's builders and the Gebalites did fashion them, and prepared the timber and the stones to build the house.
text_pisuk: וַיִּפְסְלוּ בֹּנֵי שְׁלֹמֹה, וּבֹנֵי חִירוֹם--וְהַגִּבְלִים; וַיָּכִינוּ הָעֵצִים וְהָאֲבָנִים, לִבְנוֹת הַבָּיִת.

text_he: ויהי בשמונים שנה וארבע מאות שנה לצאת בני-ישראל מארץ-מצרים בשנה הרביעית בחדש זו הוא החדש השני למלך שלמה על-ישראל ויבן הבית ליהוה | And it came to pass in the four hundred and eightieth year after the children of Israel were come out of the land of Egypt in the fourth year of Solomon's reign over Israel in the month Ziv which is the second month that he began to build the house of the LORD | ויאמרו בני-הנביאים אל-אלישע הנה-נא המקום אשר אנחנו ישבים שם לפניך--צר מנו | And the sons of the prophets said unto Elisha 'Behold now the place where we dwell before thee is too strait for us
text_en: And it came to pass in the four hundred and eightieth year after the children of Israel were come out of the land of Egypt, in the fourth year of Solomon's reign over Israel, in the month Ziv, which is the second month, that he began to build the house of the LORD.
text_pisuk: וַיְהִי בִשְׁמוֹנִים שָׁנָה וְאַרְבַּע מֵאוֹת שָׁנָה לְצֵאת בְּנֵי-יִשְׂרָאֵל מֵאֶרֶץ-מִצְרַיִם בַּשָּׁנָה הָרְבִיעִית בְּחֹדֶשׁ זִו, הוּא הַחֹדֶשׁ הַשֵּׁנִי, לִמְלֹךְ שְׁלֹמֹה, עַל-יִשְׂרָאֵל; וַיִּבֶן הַבַּיִת, לַיהוָה. | And it came to pass in the four hundred and eightieth year after the children of Israel were come out of the land of Egypt, in the fourth year of Solomon's reign over Israel, in the month Ziv, which is the second month, that he began to build the house of the LORD. | וַיֹּאמְרוּ בְנֵי-הַנְּבִיאִים, אֶל-אֱלִישָׁע: הִנֵּה-נָא הַמָּקוֹם, אֲשֶׁר אֲנַחְנוּ יֹשְׁבִים שָׁם לְפָנֶיךָ--צַר מִמֶּנּוּ. | And the sons of the prophets said unto Elisha: 'Behold now, the place where we dwell before thee is too strait for us.

text_he: והבית אשר בנה המלך שלמה ליהוה--שים-אמה ארכו ועשרים רחבו ושלשים אמה קומתו | And the house which king Solomon built for the LORD the length thereof was threescore cubits and the breadth thereof twenty cubits and the height thereof thirty cubits | נלכה-נא עד-הירדן ונקחה משם איש קורה אחת ונעשה-לנו שם מקום לשבת שם ויאמר לכו | Let us go we pray thee unto the Jordan and take thence every man a beam and let us make us a place there where we may dwell' And he answered 'Go ye'
text_en: And the house which king Solomon built for the LORD, the length thereof was threescore cubits, and the breadth thereof twenty cubits, and the height thereof thirty cubits.
text_pisuk: וְהַבַּיִת, אֲשֶׁר בָּנָה הַמֶּלֶךְ שְׁלֹמֹה לַיהוָה--שִׁשִּׁים-אַמָּה אָרְכּוֹ, וְעֶשְׂרִים רָחְבּוֹ; וּשְׁלֹשִׁים אַמָּה, קוֹמָתוֹ. | And the house which king Solomon built for the LORD, the length thereof was threescore cubits, and the breadth thereof twenty cubits, and the height thereof thirty cubits. | נֵלְכָה-נָּא עַד-הַיַּרְדֵּן, וְנִקְחָה מִשָּׁם אִישׁ קוֹרָה אֶחָת, וְנַעֲשֶׂה-לָּנוּ שָׁם מָקוֹם, לָשֶׁבֶת שָׁם; וַיֹּאמֶר, לֵכוּ. | Let us go, we pray thee, unto the Jordan, and take thence every man a beam, and let us make us a place there, where we may dwell.' And he answered: 'Go ye.'

text_he: והאולם על-פני היכל הבית--עשרים אמה ארכו על-פני רחב הבית עשר באמה רחבו על-פני הבית | And the porch before the temple of the house twenty cubits was the length thereof according to the breadth of the house and ten cubits was the breadth thereof before the house | ויאמר האחד הואל נא ולך את-עבדיך ויאמר אני אלך | And one said 'Be content I pray thee and go with thy servants' And he answered 'I will go'
text_en: And the porch before the temple of the house, twenty cubits was the length thereof, according to the breadth of the house; and ten cubits was the breadth thereof before the house.
text_pisuk: וְהָאוּלָם, עַל-פְּנֵי הֵיכַל הַבַּיִת--עֶשְׂרִים אַמָּה אָרְכּוֹ, עַל-פְּנֵי רֹחַב הַבָּיִת; עֶשֶׂר בָּאַמָּה רָחְבּוֹ, עַל-פְּנֵי הַבָּיִת. | And the porch before the temple of the house, twenty cubits was the length thereof, according to the breadth of the house; and ten cubits was the breadth thereof before the house. | וַיֹּאמֶר, הָאֶחָד, הוֹאֶל נָא, וְלֵךְ אֶת-עֲבָדֶיךָ; וַיֹּאמֶר, אֲנִי אֵלֵךְ. | And one said: 'Be content, I pray thee, and go with thy servants.' And he answered: 'I will go.'

text_he: ויעש לבית חלוני שקפים אטומים | And for the house he made windows broad within and narrow without | וילך אתם ויבאו הירדנה ויגזרו העצים | So he went with them And when they came to the Jordan they cut down wood
text_en: And for the house he made windows broad within, and narrow without.
text_pisuk: וַיַּעַשׂ לַבָּיִת, חַלּוֹנֵי שְׁקֻפִים אֲטוּמִים. | And for the house he made windows broad within, and narrow without. | וַיֵּלֶךְ, אִתָּם; וַיָּבֹאוּ, הַיַּרְדֵּנָה, וַיִּגְזְרוּ, הָעֵצִים. | So he went with them. And when they came to the Jordan, they cut down wood.

text_he: ויבן על-קיר הבית יצוע (יציע) סביב את-קירות הבית סביב להיכל ולדביר ויעש צלעות סביב | And against the wall of the house he built a side-structure round about against the walls of the house round about both of the temple and of the sanctuary and he made side-chambers round about | ויהי האחד מפיל הקורה ואת-הברזל נפל אל-המים ויצעק ויאמר אה אדני והוא שאול | But as one was felling a beam the axe-head fell into the water and he cried and said 'Alas my master for it was borrowed'
text_en: And against the wall of the house he built a side-structure round about, against the walls of the house round about, both of the temple and of the sanctuary; and he made side-chambers round about;
text_pisuk: וַיִּבֶן עַל-קִיר הַבַּיִת יצוע (יָצִיעַ), סָבִיב, אֶת-קִירוֹת הַבַּיִת סָבִיב, לַהֵיכָל וְלַדְּבִיר; וַיַּעַשׂ צְלָעוֹת, סָבִיב. | And against the wall of the house he built a side-structure round about, against the walls of the house round about, both of the temple and of the sanctuary; and he made side-chambers round about; | וַיְהִי הָאֶחָד מַפִּיל הַקּוֹרָה, וְאֶת-הַבַּרְזֶל נָפַל אֶל-הַמָּיִם; וַיִּצְעַק וַיֹּאמֶר אֲהָהּ אֲדֹנִי, וְהוּא שָׁאוּל. | But as one was felling a beam, the axe-head fell into the water; and he cried, and said: 'Alas, my master! for it was borrowed.'

text_he: היצוע (היציע) התחתנה חמש באמה רחבה והתיכנה ש באמה רחבה והשלישית שבע באמה רחבה כי מגרעות נתן לבית סביב חוצה לבלתי אחז בקירות-הבית | the nethermost story of the side-structure was five cubits broad and the middle was six cubits broad and the third was seven cubits broad for on the outside he made rebatements in the wall of the house round about that the beams should not have hold in the walls of the house-- | ויאמר איש-האלהים אנה נפל ויראהו את-המקום ויקצב-עץ וישלך-שמה ויצף הברזל | And the man of God said 'Where fell it' And he showed him the place And he cut down a stick and cast it in thither and made the iron to swim
text_en: the nethermost story of the side-structure was five cubits broad, and the middle was six cubits broad, and the third was seven cubits broad; for on the outside he made rebatements in the wall of the house round about, that the beams should not have hold in the walls of the house.--
text_pisuk: היצוע (הַיָּצִיעַ) הַתַּחְתֹּנָה חָמֵשׁ בָּאַמָּה רָחְבָּהּ, וְהַתִּיכֹנָה שֵׁשׁ בָּאַמָּה רָחְבָּהּ, וְהַשְּׁלִישִׁית, שֶׁבַע בָּאַמָּה רָחְבָּהּ: כִּי מִגְרָעוֹת נָתַן לַבַּיִת סָבִיב, חוּצָה, לְבִלְתִּי, אֲחֹז בְּקִירוֹת-הַבָּיִת. | the nethermost story of the side-structure was five cubits broad, and the middle was six cubits broad, and the third was seven cubits broad; for on the outside he made rebatements in the wall of the house round about, that the beams should not have hold in the walls of the house.-- | וַיֹּאמֶר אִישׁ-הָאֱלֹהִים, אָנָה נָפָל; וַיַּרְאֵהוּ, אֶת-הַמָּקוֹם, וַיִּקְצָב-עֵץ וַיַּשְׁלֶךְ-שָׁמָּה, וַיָּצֶף הַבַּרְזֶל. | And the man of God said: 'Where fell it?' And he showed him the place. And he cut down a stick, and cast it in thither, and made the iron to swim.

text_he: והבית בהבנתו--אבן-שלמה מסע נבנה ומקבות והגרזן כל-כלי ברזל לא-נשמע בית בהבנתו | For the house when it was in building was built of stone made ready at the quarry and there was neither hammer nor axe nor any tool of iron heard in the house while it was in building-- | ויאמר הרם לך וישלח ידו ויקחהו | And he said 'Take it up to thee' So he put out his hand and took it
text_en: For the house, when it was in building, was built of stone made ready at the quarry; and there was neither hammer nor axe nor any tool of iron heard in the house, while it was in building.--
text_pisuk: וְהַבַּיִת, בְּהִבָּנֹתוֹ--אֶבֶן-שְׁלֵמָה מַסָּע, נִבְנָה; וּמַקָּבוֹת וְהַגַּרְזֶן כָּל-כְּלִי בַרְזֶל, לֹא-נִשְׁמַע בַּבַּיִת בְּהִבָּנֹתוֹ. | For the house, when it was in building, was built of stone made ready at the quarry; and there was neither hammer nor axe nor any tool of iron heard in the house, while it was in building.-- | וַיֹּאמֶר, הָרֶם לָךְ; וַיִּשְׁלַח יָדוֹ, וַיִּקָּחֵהוּ. | And he said: 'Take it up to thee.' So he put out his hand, and took it.

text_he: פתח הצלע התיכנה אל-כתף הבית הימנית ובלולים יעלו על-התיכנה ומן-התיכנה אל-השלשים | The door for the lowest row of chambers was in the right side of the house and they went up by winding stairs into the middle row and out of the middle into the third | ומלך ארם היה נלחם בישראל ויועץ אל-עבדיו לאמר אל-מקום פלני אלמני תחנתי | Now the king of Aram warred against Israel and he took counsel with his servants saying 'In such and such a place shall be my camp'
text_en: The door for the lowest row of chambers was in the right side of the house and they went up by winding stairs into the middle row, and out of the middle into the third.
text_pisuk: פֶּתַח, הַצֵּלָע הַתִּיכֹנָה, אֶל-כֶּתֶף הַבַּיִת, הַיְמָנִית; וּבְלוּלִּים, יַעֲלוּ עַל-הַתִּיכֹנָה, וּמִן-הַתִּיכֹנָה, אֶל-הַשְּׁלִשִׁים. | The door for the lowest row of chambers was in the right side of the house and they went up by winding stairs into the middle row, and out of the middle into the third. | וּמֶלֶךְ אֲרָם, הָיָה נִלְחָם בְּיִשְׂרָאֵל; וַיִּוָּעַץ אֶל-עֲבָדָיו לֵאמֹר, אֶל-מְקוֹם פְּלֹנִי אַלְמֹנִי תַּחֲנֹתִי. | Now the king of Aram warred against Israel; and he took counsel with his servants, saying: 'In such and such a place shall be my camp.'

text_he: ויבן את-הבית ויכלהו ויספן את-הבית גבים ושדרת בארזים | So he built the house and finished it and he covered in the house with planks of cedar over beams | וישלח איש האלהים אל-מלך ישראל לאמר השמר מעבר המקום הזה כי-שם ארם נחתים | And the man of God sent unto the king of Israel saying 'Beware that thou pass not such a place for thither the Arameans are coming down'
text_en: So he built the house, and finished it; and he covered in the house with planks of cedar over beams.
text_pisuk: וַיִּבֶן אֶת-הַבַּיִת, וַיְכַלֵּהוּ; וַיִּסְפֹּן אֶת-הַבַּיִת גֵּבִים, וּשְׂדֵרֹת בָּאֲרָזִים. | So he built the house, and finished it; and he covered in the house with planks of cedar over beams. | וַיִּשְׁלַח אִישׁ הָאֱלֹהִים, אֶל-מֶלֶךְ יִשְׂרָאֵל לֵאמֹר, הִשָּׁמֶר, מֵעֲבֹר הַמָּקוֹם הַזֶּה: כִּי-שָׁם, אֲרָם נְחִתִּים. | And the man of God sent unto the king of Israel, saying: 'Beware that thou pass not such a place; for thither the Arameans are coming down.'

text_he: ויבן את-היצוע (היציע) על-כל-הבית חמש אמות קומתו ויאחז את-הבית בעצי ארזים | And he built the stories of the side-structure against all the house each five cubits high and they rested on the house with timber of cedar | וישלח מלך ישראל אל-המקום אשר אמר-לו איש-האלהים והזהירה--ונשמר שם לא אחת ולא שתים | And the king of Israel sent to the place which the man of God told him and warned him of and he guarded himself there not once nor twice
text_en: And he built the stories of the side-structure against all the house, each five cubits high; and they rested on the house with timber of cedar.
text_pisuk: וַיִּבֶן אֶת-היצוע (הַיָּצִיעַ) עַל-כָּל-הַבַּיִת, חָמֵשׁ אַמּוֹת קוֹמָתוֹ; וַיֶּאֱחֹז אֶת-הַבַּיִת, בַּעֲצֵי אֲרָזִים. | And he built the stories of the side-structure against all the house, each five cubits high; and they rested on the house with timber of cedar. | וַיִּשְׁלַח מֶלֶךְ יִשְׂרָאֵל, אֶל-הַמָּקוֹם אֲשֶׁר אָמַר-לוֹ אִישׁ-הָאֱלֹהִים וְהִזְהִירֹה--וְנִשְׁמַר שָׁם: לֹא אַחַת, וְלֹא שְׁתָּיִם. | And the king of Israel sent to the place which the man of God told him and warned him of; and he guarded himself there, not once nor twice.

text_he: ויהי דבר-יהוה אל-שלמה לאמר | And the word of the LORD came to Solomon saying | ויסער לב מלך-ארם על-הדבר הזה ויקרא אל-עבדיו ויאמר אליהם הלוא תגידו לי מי משלנו אל-מלך ישראל | And the heart of the king of Aram was sore troubled for this thing and he called his servants and said unto them 'Will ye not tell me which of us is for the king of Israel'
text_en: And the word of the LORD came to Solomon, saying:
text_pisuk: וַיְהִי, דְּבַר-יְהוָה, אֶל-שְׁלֹמֹה, לֵאמֹר. | And the word of the LORD came to Solomon, saying: | וַיִּסָּעֵר לֵב מֶלֶךְ-אֲרָם, עַל-הַדָּבָר הַזֶּה; וַיִּקְרָא אֶל-עֲבָדָיו, וַיֹּאמֶר אֲלֵיהֶם, הֲלוֹא תַּגִּידוּ לִי, מִי מִשֶּׁלָּנוּ אֶל-מֶלֶךְ יִשְׂרָאֵל. | And the heart of the king of Aram was sore troubled for this thing; and he called his servants, and said unto them: 'Will ye not tell me which of us is for the king of Israel?'

text_he: הבית הזה אשר-אתה בנה אם-תלך בחקתי ואת-משפטי תעשה ושמרת את-כל-מצותי לכת בהם--והקמתי את-דברי אתך אשר דברתי אל-דוד אביך | 'As for this house which thou art building if thou wilt walk in My statutes and execute Mine ordinances and keep all My commandments to walk in them then will I establish My word with thee which I spoke unto David thy father | ויאמר אחד מעבדיו לוא אדני המלך כי-אלישע הנביא אשר בישראל יגיד למלך ישראל את-הדברים אשר תדבר בחדר משכבך | And one of his servants said 'Nay my lord O king but Elisha the prophet that is in Israel telleth the king of Israel the words that thou speakest in thy bed-chamber'
text_en: 'As for this house which thou art building, if thou wilt walk in My statutes, and execute Mine ordinances, and keep all My commandments to walk in them; then will I establish My word with thee, which I spoke unto David thy father;
text_pisuk: הַבַּיִת הַזֶּה אֲשֶׁר-אַתָּה בֹנֶה, אִם-תֵּלֵךְ בְּחֻקֹּתַי וְאֶת-מִשְׁפָּטַי תַּעֲשֶׂה, וְשָׁמַרְתָּ אֶת-כָּל-מִצְותַי, לָלֶכֶת בָּהֶם--וַהֲקִמֹתִי אֶת-דְּבָרִי אִתָּךְ, אֲשֶׁר דִּבַּרְתִּי אֶל-דָּוִד אָבִיךָ. | 'As for this house which thou art building, if thou wilt walk in My statutes, and execute Mine ordinances, and keep all My commandments to walk in them; then will I establish My word with thee, which I spoke unto David thy father; | וַיֹּאמֶר אַחַד מֵעֲבָדָיו, לוֹא אֲדֹנִי הַמֶּלֶךְ: כִּי-אֱלִישָׁע הַנָּבִיא, אֲשֶׁר בְּיִשְׂרָאֵל, יַגִּיד לְמֶלֶךְ יִשְׂרָאֵל, אֶת-הַדְּבָרִים אֲשֶׁר תְּדַבֵּר בַּחֲדַר מִשְׁכָּבֶךָ. | And one of his servants said: 'Nay, my lord, O king; but Elisha, the prophet that is in Israel, telleth the king of Israel the words that thou speakest in thy bed-chamber.'

text_he: ושכנתי בתוך בני ישראל ולא אעזב את-עמי ישראל | in that I will dwell therein among the children of Israel and will not forsake My people Israel' | ויאמר לכו וראו איכה הוא ואשלח ואקחהו ויגד-לו לאמר הנה בדתן | And he said 'Go and see where he is that I may send and fetch him' And it was told him saying 'Behold he is in Dothan'
text_en: in that I will dwell therein among the children of Israel, and will not forsake My people Israel.'
text_pisuk: וְשָׁכַנְתִּי, בְּתוֹךְ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל; וְלֹא אֶעֱזֹב, אֶת-עַמִּי יִשְׂרָאֵל. | in that I will dwell therein among the children of Israel, and will not forsake My people Israel.' | וַיֹּאמֶר, לְכוּ וּרְאוּ אֵיכֹה הוּא, וְאֶשְׁלַח, וְאֶקָּחֵהוּ; וַיֻּגַּד-לוֹ לֵאמֹר, הִנֵּה בְדֹתָן. | And he said: 'Go and see where he is, that I may send and fetch him.' And it was told him, saying: 'Behold, he is in Dothan.'

text_he: ויבן שלמה את-הבית ויכלהו | So Solomon built the house and finished it | וישלח-שמה סוסים ורכב וחיל כבד ויבאו לילה ויקפו על-העיר | Therefore sent he thither horses and chariots and a great host and they came by night and compassed the city about
text_en: So Solomon built the house, and finished it.
text_pisuk: וַיִּבֶן שְׁלֹמֹה אֶת-הַבַּיִת, וַיְכַלֵּהוּ. | So Solomon built the house, and finished it. | וַיִּשְׁלַח-שָׁמָּה סוּסִים וְרֶכֶב, וְחַיִל כָּבֵד; וַיָּבֹאוּ לַיְלָה, וַיַּקִּפוּ עַל-הָעִיר. | Therefore sent he thither horses, and chariots, and a great host; and they came by night, and compassed the city about.

text_he: ויבן את-קירות הבית מביתה בצלעות ארזים--מקרקע הבית עד-קירות הספן צפה עץ מבית ויצף את-קרקע הבית בצלעות ברושים | And he built the walls of the house within with boards of cedar from the floor of the house unto the joists of the ceiling he covered them on the inside with wood and he covered the floor of the house with boards of cypress | וישכם משרת איש האלהים לקום ויצא והנה-חיל סוב את-העיר וסוס ורכב ויאמר נערו אליו אה אדני איכה נעשה | And when the servant of the man of God was risen early and gone forth behold a host with horses and chariots was round about the city And his servant said unto him 'Alas my master how shall we do'
text_en: And he built the walls of the house within with boards of cedar; from the floor of the house unto the joists of the ceiling, he covered them on the inside with wood; and he covered the floor of the house with boards of cypress.
text_pisuk: וַיִּבֶן אֶת-קִירוֹת הַבַּיִת מִבַּיְתָה, בְּצַלְעוֹת אֲרָזִים--מִקַּרְקַע הַבַּיִת עַד-קִירוֹת הַסִּפֻּן, צִפָּה עֵץ מִבָּיִת; וַיְצַף אֶת-קַרְקַע הַבַּיִת, בְּצַלְעוֹת בְּרוֹשִׁים. | And he built the walls of the house within with boards of cedar; from the floor of the house unto the joists of the ceiling, he covered them on the inside with wood; and he covered the floor of the house with boards of cypress. | וַיַּשְׁכֵּם מְשָׁרֵת אִישׁ הָאֱלֹהִים, לָקוּם, וַיֵּצֵא, וְהִנֵּה-חַיִל סוֹבֵב אֶת-הָעִיר וְסוּס וָרָכֶב; וַיֹּאמֶר נַעֲרוֹ אֵלָיו אֲהָהּ אֲדֹנִי, אֵיכָה נַעֲשֶׂה. | And when the servant of the man of God was risen early, and gone forth, behold, a host with horses and chariots was round about the city. And his servant said unto him: 'Alas, my master! how shall we do?'

text_he: ויבן את-עשרים אמה מירכותי (מירכתי) הבית בצלעות ארזים מן-הקרקע עד-הקירות ויבן לו מבית לדביר לקדש הקדשים | And he built twenty cubits on the hinder part of the house with boards of cedar from the floor unto the joists he even built them for himself within for a Sanctuary even for the most holy place | ויאמר אל-תירא כי רבים אשר אתנו מאשר אותם | And he answered 'Fear not for they that are with us are more than they that are with them'
text_en: And he built twenty cubits on the hinder part of the house with boards of cedar from the floor unto the joists; he even built them for himself within, for a Sanctuary, even for the most holy place.
text_pisuk: וַיִּבֶן אֶת-עֶשְׂרִים אַמָּה מירכותי (מִיַּרְכְּתֵי) הַבַּיִת, בְּצַלְעוֹת אֲרָזִים, מִן-הַקַּרְקַע, עַד-הַקִּירוֹת; וַיִּבֶן לוֹ מִבַּיִת לִדְבִיר, לְקֹדֶשׁ הַקֳּדָשִׁים. | And he built twenty cubits on the hinder part of the house with boards of cedar from the floor unto the joists; he even built them for himself within, for a Sanctuary, even for the most holy place. | וַיֹּאמֶר, אַל-תִּירָא: כִּי רַבִּים אֲשֶׁר אִתָּנוּ, מֵאֲשֶׁר אוֹתָם. | And he answered: 'Fear not: for they that are with us are more than they that are with them.'

text_he: וארבעים באמה היה הבית--הוא היכל לפני | And the house that is the temple before  was forty cubits long | ויתפל אלישע ויאמר יהוה פקח-נא את-עיניו ויראה ויפקח יהוה את-עיני הנער וירא והנה הר מלא סוסים ורכב אש סביבת אלישע | And Elisha prayed and said 'LORD I pray Thee open his eyes that he may see' And the LORD opened the eyes of the young man and he saw and behold the mountain was full of horses and chariots of fire round about Elisha
text_en: And the house, that is, the temple before , was forty cubits long.
text_pisuk: וְאַרְבָּעִים בָּאַמָּה, הָיָה הַבָּיִת--הוּא, הַהֵיכָל לִפְנָי. | And the house, that is, the temple before , was forty cubits long. | וַיִּתְפַּלֵּל אֱלִישָׁע, וַיֹּאמַר, יְהוָה, פְּקַח-נָא אֶת-עֵינָיו וְיִרְאֶה; וַיִּפְקַח יְהוָה, אֶת-עֵינֵי הַנַּעַר, וַיַּרְא וְהִנֵּה הָהָר מָלֵא סוּסִים וְרֶכֶב אֵשׁ, סְבִיבֹת אֱלִישָׁע. | And Elisha prayed, and said: 'LORD, I pray Thee, open his eyes, that he may see.' And the LORD opened the eyes of the young man; and he saw; and, behold, the mountain was full of horses and chariots of fire round about Elisha.

text_he: וארז אל-הבית פנימה מקלעת פקעים ופטורי צים הכל ארז אין אבן נראה | And the cedar on the house within was carved with knops and open flowers all was cedar there was no stone seen | וירדו אליו ויתפל אלישע אל-יהוה ויאמר הך-נא את-הגוי-הזה בסנורים ויכם בסנורים כדבר אלישע | And when they came down to him Elisha prayed unto the LORD and said 'Smite this people I pray Thee with blindness' And He smote them with blindness according to the word of Elisha
text_en: And the cedar on the house within was carved with knops and open flowers; all was cedar; there was no stone seen.
text_pisuk: וְאֶרֶז אֶל-הַבַּיִת, פְּנִימָה, מִקְלַעַת פְּקָעִים, וּפְטוּרֵי צִצִּים: הַכֹּל אֶרֶז, אֵין אֶבֶן נִרְאָה. | And the cedar on the house within was carved with knops and open flowers; all was cedar; there was no stone seen. | וַיֵּרְדוּ, אֵלָיו, וַיִּתְפַּלֵּל אֱלִישָׁע אֶל-יְהוָה וַיֹּאמַר, הַךְ-נָא אֶת-הַגּוֹי-הַזֶּה בַּסַּנְוֵרִים; וַיַּכֵּם בַּסַּנְוֵרִים, כִּדְבַר אֱלִישָׁע. | And when they came down to him, Elisha prayed unto the LORD, and said: 'Smite this people, I pray Thee, with blindness.' And He smote them with blindness according to the word of Elisha.

text_he: ודביר בתוך-הבית מפנימה הכין לתן שם את-ארון ברית יהוה | And he prepared the Sanctuary in the midst of the house within to set there the ark of the covenant of the LORD | ויאמר אלהם אלישע לא זה הדרך ולא זה העיר--לכו אחרי ואוליכה אתכם אל-האיש אשר תבקשון וילך אותם שמרונה | And Elisha said unto them 'This is not the way neither is this the city follow me and I will bring you to the man whom ye seek' And he led them to Samaria
text_en: And he prepared the Sanctuary in the midst of the house within, to set there the ark of the covenant of the LORD.
text_pisuk: וּדְבִיר בְּתוֹךְ-הַבַּיִת מִפְּנִימָה, הֵכִין, לְתִתֵּן שָׁם, אֶת-אֲרוֹן בְּרִית יְהוָה. | And he prepared the Sanctuary in the midst of the house within, to set there the ark of the covenant of the LORD. | וַיֹּאמֶר אֲלֵהֶם אֱלִישָׁע, לֹא זֶה הַדֶּרֶךְ וְלֹא זֹה הָעִיר--לְכוּ אַחֲרַי, וְאוֹלִיכָה אֶתְכֶם אֶל-הָאִישׁ אֲשֶׁר תְּבַקֵּשׁוּן; וַיֹּלֶךְ אוֹתָם, שֹׁמְרוֹנָה. | And Elisha said unto them: 'This is not the way, neither is this the city; follow me, and I will bring you to the man whom ye seek.' And he led them to Samaria.

text_he: ולפני הדביר עשרים אמה ארך ועשרים אמה רחב ועשרים אמה קומתו ויצפהו זהב סגור ויצף מזבח ארז | And before the Sanctuary which was twenty cubits in length and twenty cubits in breadth and twenty cubits in the height thereof overlaid with pure gold he set an altar which he covered with cedar | ויהי כבאם שמרון ויאמר אלישע יהוה פקח את-עיני-אלה ויראו ויפקח יהוה את-עיניהם ויראו והנה בתוך שמרון | And it came to pass when they were come into Samaria that Elisha said 'LORD open the eyes of these men that they may see' And the LORD opened their eyes and they saw and behold they were in the midst of Samaria
text_en: And before the Sanctuary which was twenty cubits in length, and twenty cubits in breadth, and twenty cubits in the height thereof, overlaid with pure gold, he set an altar, which he covered with cedar.
text_pisuk: וְלִפְנֵי הַדְּבִיר עֶשְׂרִים אַמָּה אֹרֶךְ וְעֶשְׂרִים אַמָּה רֹחַב, וְעֶשְׂרִים אַמָּה קוֹמָתוֹ, וַיְצַפֵּהוּ, זָהָב סָגוּר; וַיְצַף מִזְבֵּחַ, אָרֶז. | And before the Sanctuary which was twenty cubits in length, and twenty cubits in breadth, and twenty cubits in the height thereof, overlaid with pure gold, he set an altar, which he covered with cedar. | וַיְהִי, כְּבֹאָם שֹׁמְרוֹן, וַיֹּאמֶר אֱלִישָׁע, יְהוָה פְּקַח אֶת-עֵינֵי-אֵלֶּה וְיִרְאוּ; וַיִּפְקַח יְהוָה, אֶת-עֵינֵיהֶם, וַיִּרְאוּ, וְהִנֵּה בְּתוֹךְ שֹׁמְרוֹן. | And it came to pass, when they were come into Samaria, that Elisha said: 'LORD, open the eyes of these men, that they may see.' And the LORD opened their eyes, and they saw; and, behold, they were in the midst of Samaria.

text_he: ויצף שלמה את-הבית מפנימה זהב סגור ויעבר ברתיקות (ברתוקות) זהב לפני הדביר ויצפהו זהב | So Solomon overlaid the house within with pure gold and he drew chains of gold across the wall before the Sanctuary and he overlaid it with gold | ויאמר מלך-ישראל אל-אלישע כראתו אותם האכה אכה אבי | And the king of Israel said unto Elisha when he saw them 'My father shall I smite them shall I smite them'
text_en: So Solomon overlaid the house within with pure gold; and he drew chains of gold across the wall before the Sanctuary; and he overlaid it with gold.
text_pisuk: וַיְצַף שְׁלֹמֹה אֶת-הַבַּיִת מִפְּנִימָה, זָהָב סָגוּר; וַיְעַבֵּר ברתיקות (בְּרַתּוּקוֹת) זָהָב, לִפְנֵי הַדְּבִיר, וַיְצַפֵּהוּ, זָהָב. | So Solomon overlaid the house within with pure gold; and he drew chains of gold across the wall before the Sanctuary; and he overlaid it with gold. | וַיֹּאמֶר מֶלֶךְ-יִשְׂרָאֵל אֶל-אֱלִישָׁע, כִּרְאֹתוֹ אוֹתָם: הַאַכֶּה אַכֶּה, אָבִי. | And the king of Israel said unto Elisha, when he saw them: 'My father, shall I smite them? shall I smite them?'

text_he: ואת-כל-הבית צפה זהב עד-תם כל-הבית וכל-המזבח אשר-לדביר צפה זהב | And the whole house he overlaid with gold until all the house was finished also the whole altar that belonged to the Sanctuary he overlaid with gold | ויאמר לא תכה האשר שבית בחרבך ובקשתך אתה מכה שים לחם ומים לפניהם ויאכלו וישתו וילכו אל-אדניהם | And he answered 'Thou shalt not smite them hast thou taken captive with thy sword and with thy bow those whom thou wouldest smite set bread and water before them that they may eat and drink and go to their master'
text_en: And the whole house he overlaid with gold, until all the house was finished; also the whole altar that belonged to the Sanctuary he overlaid with gold.
text_pisuk: וְאֶת-כָּל-הַבַּיִת צִפָּה זָהָב, עַד-תֹּם כָּל-הַבָּיִת; וְכָל-הַמִּזְבֵּחַ אֲשֶׁר-לַדְּבִיר, צִפָּה זָהָב. | And the whole house he overlaid with gold, until all the house was finished; also the whole altar that belonged to the Sanctuary he overlaid with gold. | וַיֹּאמֶר לֹא תַכֶּה, הַאֲשֶׁר שָׁבִיתָ בְּחַרְבְּךָ וּבְקַשְׁתְּךָ אַתָּה מַכֶּה; שִׂים לֶחֶם וָמַיִם לִפְנֵיהֶם, וְיֹאכְלוּ וְיִשְׁתּוּ, וְיֵלְכוּ, אֶל-אֲדֹנֵיהֶם. | And he answered: 'Thou shalt not smite them; hast thou taken captive with thy sword and with thy bow those whom thou wouldest smite? set bread and water before them, that they may eat and drink, and go to their master.'

text_he: ויעש בדביר שני כרובים עצי-שמן עשר אמות קומתו | And in the Sanctuary he made two cherubim of olive-wood each ten cubits high | ויכרה להם כרה גדולה ויאכלו וישתו וישלחם וילכו אל-אדניהם ולא-יספו עוד גדודי ארם לבוא בארץ ישראל | And he prepared great provision for them and when they had eaten and drunk he sent them away and they went to their master And the bands of Aram came no more into the land of Israel
text_en: And in the Sanctuary he made two cherubim of olive-wood, each ten cubits high.
text_pisuk: וַיַּעַשׂ בַּדְּבִיר, שְׁנֵי כְרוּבִים עֲצֵי-שָׁמֶן: עֶשֶׂר אַמּוֹת, קוֹמָתוֹ. | And in the Sanctuary he made two cherubim of olive-wood, each ten cubits high. | וַיִּכְרֶה לָהֶם כֵּרָה גְדוֹלָה, וַיֹּאכְלוּ וַיִּשְׁתּוּ, וַיְשַׁלְּחֵם, וַיֵּלְכוּ אֶל-אֲדֹנֵיהֶם; וְלֹא-יָסְפוּ עוֹד גְּדוּדֵי אֲרָם, לָבוֹא בְּאֶרֶץ יִשְׂרָאֵל. | And he prepared great provision for them; and when they had eaten and drunk, he sent them away, and they went to their master. And the bands of Aram came no more into the land of Israel.

text_he: וחמש אמות כנף הכרוב האחת וחמש אמות כנף הכרוב השנית עשר אמות מקצות כנפיו ועד-קצות כנפיו | And five cubits was the one wing of the cherub and five cubits the other wing of the cherub from the uttermost part of the one wing unto the uttermost part of the other were ten cubits | ויהי אחרי-כן ויקבץ בן-הד מלך-ארם את-כל-מחנהו ויעל ויצר על-שמרון | And it came to pass after this that Ben-hadad king of Aram gathered all his host and went up and besieged Samaria
text_en: And five cubits was the one wing of the cherub, and five cubits the other wing of the cherub; from the uttermost part of the one wing unto the uttermost part of the other were ten cubits.
text_pisuk: וְחָמֵשׁ אַמּוֹת, כְּנַף הַכְּרוּב הָאֶחָת, וְחָמֵשׁ אַמּוֹת, כְּנַף הַכְּרוּב הַשֵּׁנִית; עֶשֶׂר אַמּוֹת, מִקְצוֹת כְּנָפָיו וְעַד-קְצוֹת כְּנָפָיו. | And five cubits was the one wing of the cherub, and five cubits the other wing of the cherub; from the uttermost part of the one wing unto the uttermost part of the other were ten cubits. | וַיְהִי, אַחֲרֵי-כֵן, וַיִּקְבֹּץ בֶּן-הֲדַד מֶלֶךְ-אֲרָם, אֶת-כָּל-מַחֲנֵהוּ; וַיַּעַל, וַיָּצַר עַל-שֹׁמְרוֹן. | And it came to pass after this, that Ben-hadad king of Aram gathered all his host, and went up, and besieged Samaria.

text_he: ועשר באמה הכרוב השני מדה אחת וקצב אחד לשני הכרבים | And the other cherub was ten cubits both the cherubim were of one measure and one form | ויהי רעב גדול בשמרון והנה צרים עליה עד היות ראש-חמור בשמנים כסף ורבע הקב חרי (דב-) יונים בחמשה-כסף | And there was a great famine in Samaria and behold they besieged it until an ass's head was sold for fourscore pieces of silver and the fourth part of a kab of dove's dung for five pieces of silver
text_en: And the other cherub was ten cubits; both the cherubim were of one measure and one form.
text_pisuk: וְעֶשֶׂר, בָּאַמָּה, הַכְּרוּב, הַשֵּׁנִי: מִדָּה אַחַת וְקֶצֶב אֶחָד, לִשְׁנֵי הַכְּרֻבִים. | And the other cherub was ten cubits; both the cherubim were of one measure and one form. | וַיְהִי רָעָב גָּדוֹל בְּשֹׁמְרוֹן, וְהִנֵּה צָרִים עָלֶיהָ: עַד הֱיוֹת רֹאשׁ-חֲמוֹר בִּשְׁמֹנִים כֶּסֶף, וְרֹבַע הַקַּב חרי (דִּב-) יוֹנִים בַּחֲמִשָּׁה-כָסֶף. | And there was a great famine in Samaria; and, behold, they besieged it, until an ass's head was sold for fourscore pieces of silver, and the fourth part of a kab of dove's dung for five pieces of silver.

text_he: קומת הכרוב האחד עשר באמה וכן הכרוב השני | The height of the one cherub was ten cubits and so was it of the other cherub | ויהי מלך ישראל עבר על-החמה ואשה צעקה אליו לאמר הושיעה אדני המלך | And as the king of Israel was passing by upon the wall there cried a woman unto him saying 'Help my lord O king'
text_en: The height of the one cherub was ten cubits, and so was it of the other cherub.
text_pisuk: קוֹמַת הַכְּרוּב הָאֶחָד, עֶשֶׂר בָּאַמָּה; וְכֵן, הַכְּרוּב הַשֵּׁנִי. | The height of the one cherub was ten cubits, and so was it of the other cherub. | וַיְהִי מֶלֶךְ יִשְׂרָאֵל, עֹבֵר עַל-הַחֹמָה; וְאִשָּׁה, צָעֲקָה אֵלָיו לֵאמֹר, הוֹשִׁיעָה, אֲדֹנִי הַמֶּלֶךְ. | And as the king of Israel was passing by upon the wall, there cried a woman unto him, saying: 'Help, my lord, O king.'

text_he: ויתן את-הכרובים בתוך הבית הפנימי ויפרשו את-כנפי הכרבים ותגע כנף-האחד בקיר וכנף הכרוב השני נגעת בקיר השני וכנפיהם אל-תוך הבית נגעת כנף אל-כנף | And he set the cherubim within the inner house and the wings of the cherubim were stretched forth so that the wing of the one touched the one wall and the wing of the other cherub touched the other wall and their wings touched one another in the midst of the house | ויאמר אל-יושעך יהוה מאין אושיעך המן-הגרן או מן-היקב | And he said 'If the LORD do not help thee whence shall I help thee out of the threshingfloor or out of the winepress'
text_en: And he set the cherubim within the inner house; and the wings of the cherubim were stretched forth, so that the wing of the one touched the one wall, and the wing of the other cherub touched the other wall; and their wings touched one another in the midst of the house.
text_pisuk: וַיִּתֵּן אֶת-הַכְּרוּבִים בְּתוֹךְ הַבַּיִת הַפְּנִימִי, וַיִּפְרְשׂוּ אֶת-כַּנְפֵי הַכְּרֻבִים, וַתִּגַּע כְּנַף-הָאֶחָד בַּקִּיר, וּכְנַף הַכְּרוּב הַשֵּׁנִי נֹגַעַת בַּקִּיר הַשֵּׁנִי; וְכַנְפֵיהֶם אֶל-תּוֹךְ הַבַּיִת, נֹגְעֹת כָּנָף אֶל-כָּנָף. | And he set the cherubim within the inner house; and the wings of the cherubim were stretched forth, so that the wing of the one touched the one wall, and the wing of the other cherub touched the other wall; and their wings touched one another in the midst of the house. | וַיֹּאמֶר אַל-יוֹשִׁעֵךְ יְהוָה, מֵאַיִן אוֹשִׁיעֵךְ; הֲמִן-הַגֹּרֶן, אוֹ מִן-הַיָּקֶב. | And he said: 'If the LORD do not help thee, whence shall I help thee? out of the threshingfloor, or out of the winepress?'

text_he: ויצף את-הכרובים זהב | And he overlaid the cherubim with gold | ויאמר-לה המלך מה-לך ותאמר האשה הזאת אמרה אלי תני את-בנך ונאכלנו היום ואת-בני נאכל מחר | And the king said unto her 'What aileth thee' And she answered 'This woman said unto me Give thy son that we may eat him to-day and we will eat my son to-morrow
text_en: And he overlaid the cherubim with gold.
text_pisuk: וַיְצַף אֶת-הַכְּרוּבִים, זָהָב. | And he overlaid the cherubim with gold. | וַיֹּאמֶר-לָהּ הַמֶּלֶךְ, מַה-לָּךְ; וַתֹּאמֶר, הָאִשָּׁה הַזֹּאת אָמְרָה אֵלַי תְּנִי אֶת-בְּנֵךְ וְנֹאכְלֶנּוּ הַיּוֹם, וְאֶת-בְּנִי, נֹאכַל מָחָר. | And the king said unto her: 'What aileth thee?' And she answered: 'This woman said unto me: Give thy son, that we may eat him to-day, and we will eat my son to-morrow.

text_he: ואת כל-קירות הבית מסב קלע פתוחי מקלעות כרובים ותמרת ופטורי צים--מלפנים ולחיצון | And he carved all the walls of the house round about with carved figures of cherubim and palm-trees and open flowers within and without | ונבשל את-בני ונאכלהו ואמר אליה ביום האחר תני את-בנך ונאכלנו ותחבא את-בנה | So we boiled my son and did eat him and I said unto her on the next day Give thy son that we may eat him and she hath hid her son'
text_en: And he carved all the walls of the house round about with carved figures of cherubim and palm-trees and open flowers, within and without.
text_pisuk: וְאֵת כָּל-קִירוֹת הַבַּיִת מֵסַב קָלַע, פִּתּוּחֵי מִקְלְעוֹת כְּרוּבִים וְתִמֹרֹת, וּפְטוּרֵי, צִצִּים--מִלִּפְנִים, וְלַחִיצוֹן. | And he carved all the walls of the house round about with carved figures of cherubim and palm-trees and open flowers, within and without. | וַנְּבַשֵּׁל אֶת-בְּנִי, וַנֹּאכְלֵהוּ; וָאֹמַר אֵלֶיהָ בַּיּוֹם הָאַחֵר, תְּנִי אֶת-בְּנֵךְ וְנֹאכְלֶנּוּ, וַתַּחְבִּא, אֶת-בְּנָהּ. | So we boiled my son, and did eat him; and I said unto her on the next day: Give thy son, that we may eat him; and she hath hid her son.'

text_he: ואת-קרקע הבית צפה זהב--לפנימה ולחיצון | And the floor of the house he overlaid with gold within and without | ויהי כשמע המלך את-דברי האשה ויקרע את-בגדיו והוא עבר על-החמה וירא העם והנה השק על-בשרו מבית | And it came to pass when the king heard the words of the woman that he rent his clothes--now he was passing by upon the wall--and the people looked and behold he had sackcloth within upon his flesh
text_en: And the floor of the house he overlaid with gold, within and without.
text_pisuk: וְאֶת-קַרְקַע הַבַּיִת, צִפָּה זָהָב--לִפְנִימָה, וְלַחִיצוֹן. | And the floor of the house he overlaid with gold, within and without. | וַיְהִי כִשְׁמֹעַ הַמֶּלֶךְ אֶת-דִּבְרֵי הָאִשָּׁה, וַיִּקְרַע אֶת-בְּגָדָיו, וְהוּא, עֹבֵר עַל-הַחֹמָה; וַיַּרְא הָעָם, וְהִנֵּה הַשַּׂק עַל-בְּשָׂרוֹ מִבָּיִת. | And it came to pass, when the king heard the words of the woman, that he rent his clothes--now he was passing by upon the wall--and the people looked, and, behold, he had sackcloth within upon his flesh.

text_he: ואת פתח הדביר עשה דלתות עצי-שמן האיל מזוזות חמשית | And for the entrance of the Sanctuary he made doors of olive-wood the door-posts within the frame having five angles | ויאמר כה-יעשה-לי אלהים וכה יוסף אם-יעמד ראש אלישע בן-שפט עליו--היום | Then he said 'God do so to me and more also if the head of Elisha the son of Shaphat shall stand on him this day'
text_en: And for the entrance of the Sanctuary he made doors of olive-wood, the door-posts within the frame having five angles.
text_pisuk: וְאֵת פֶּתַח הַדְּבִיר, עָשָׂה דַּלְתוֹת עֲצֵי-שָׁמֶן; הָאַיִל מְזוּזוֹת, חֲמִשִׁית. | And for the entrance of the Sanctuary he made doors of olive-wood, the door-posts within the frame having five angles. | וַיֹּאמֶר, כֹּה-יַעֲשֶׂה-לִּי אֱלֹהִים וְכֹה יוֹסִף: אִם-יַעֲמֹד רֹאשׁ אֱלִישָׁע בֶּן-שָׁפָט, עָלָיו--הַיּוֹם. | Then he said: 'God do so to me, and more also, if the head of Elisha the son of Shaphat shall stand on him this day.'

text_he: ושתי דלתות עצי-שמן וקלע עליהם מקלעות כרובים ותמרת ופטורי צים וצפה זהב וירד על-הכרובים ועל-התמרות את-הזהב | And as for the two doors of olive-wood he carved upon them carvings of cherubim and palm-trees and open flowers and overlaid them with gold and he spread the gold upon the cherubim and upon the palm-trees | ואלישע ישב ביתו והזקנים ישבים אתו וישלח איש מלפניו בטרם יבא המלאך אליו והוא אמר אל-הזקנים הראיתם כי-שלח בן-המרצח הזה להסיר את-ראשי ראו כבא המלאך סגרו הדלת ולחצתם אתו בדלת הלוא קול רגלי אדניו אחריו | But Elisha sat in his house and the elders sat with him and the king sent a man from before him but ere the messenger came to him he said to the elders 'See ye how this son of a murderer hath sent to take away my head look when the messenger cometh shut the door and hold the door fast against him is not the sound of his master's feet behind him'
text_en: And as for the two doors of olive-wood, he carved upon them carvings of cherubim and palm-trees and open flowers, and overlaid them with gold; and he spread the gold upon the cherubim, and upon the palm-trees.
text_pisuk: וּשְׁתֵּי, דַּלְתוֹת עֲצֵי-שֶׁמֶן, וְקָלַע עֲלֵיהֶם מִקְלְעוֹת כְּרוּבִים וְתִמֹרֹת וּפְטוּרֵי צִצִּים, וְצִפָּה זָהָב; וַיָּרֶד עַל-הַכְּרוּבִים וְעַל-הַתִּמֹרוֹת, אֶת-הַזָּהָב. | And as for the two doors of olive-wood, he carved upon them carvings of cherubim and palm-trees and open flowers, and overlaid them with gold; and he spread the gold upon the cherubim, and upon the palm-trees. | וֶאֱלִישָׁע יֹשֵׁב בְּבֵיתוֹ, וְהַזְּקֵנִים יֹשְׁבִים אִתּוֹ; וַיִּשְׁלַח אִישׁ מִלְּפָנָיו, בְּטֶרֶם יָבֹא הַמַּלְאָךְ אֵלָיו וְהוּא אָמַר אֶל-הַזְּקֵנִים הַרְּאִיתֶם כִּי-שָׁלַח בֶּן-הַמְרַצֵּחַ הַזֶּה לְהָסִיר אֶת-רֹאשִׁי, רְאוּ כְּבֹא הַמַּלְאָךְ סִגְרוּ הַדֶּלֶת וּלְחַצְתֶּם אֹתוֹ בַּדֶּלֶת, הֲלוֹא קוֹל רַגְלֵי אֲדֹנָיו אַחֲרָיו. | But Elisha sat in his house, and the elders sat with him; and the king sent a man from before him; but ere the messenger came to him, he said to the elders: 'See ye how this son of a murderer hath sent to take away my head? look, when the messenger cometh, shut the door, and hold the door fast against him; is not the sound of his master's feet behind him?'

text_he: וכן עשה לפתח היכל מזוזות עצי-שמן מאת רבעית | So also made he for the entrance of the temple door-posts of olive-wood within a frame four-square | עודנו מדבר עמם והנה המלאך ירד אליו ויאמר הנה-זאת הרעה מאת יהוה--מה-אוחיל ליהוה עוד | And while he yet talked with them behold the messenger came down unto him and said 'Behold this evil is of the LORD why should I wait for the LORD any longer'
text_en: So also made he for the entrance of the temple door-posts of olive-wood, within a frame four-square;
text_pisuk: וְכֵן עָשָׂה לְפֶתַח הַהֵיכָל, מְזוּזוֹת עֲצֵי-שָׁמֶן, מֵאֵת, רְבִעִית. | So also made he for the entrance of the temple door-posts of olive-wood, within a frame four-square; | עוֹדֶנּוּ מְדַבֵּר עִמָּם, וְהִנֵּה הַמַּלְאָךְ יֹרֵד אֵלָיו; וַיֹּאמֶר, הִנֵּה-זֹאת הָרָעָה מֵאֵת יְהוָה--מָה-אוֹחִיל לַיהוָה, עוֹד. | And while he yet talked with them, behold, the messenger came down unto him; and said: 'Behold, this evil is of the LORD; why should I wait for the LORD any longer?'

text_he: ושתי דלתות עצי ברושים שני צלעים הדלת האחת גלילים ושני קלעים הדלת השנית גלילים
text_en: and two doors of cypress-wood; the two leaves of the one door were folding, and the two leaves of the other door were folding.
text_pisuk: וּשְׁתֵּי דַלְתוֹת, עֲצֵי בְרוֹשִׁים; שְׁנֵי צְלָעִים הַדֶּלֶת הָאַחַת, גְּלִילִים, וּשְׁנֵי קְלָעִים הַדֶּלֶת הַשֵּׁנִית, גְּלִילִים.

text_he: וקלע כרובים ותמרות ופטרי צים וצפה זהב מישר על-המחקה
text_en: And he carved thereon cherubim and palm-trees and open flowers; and he overlaid them with gold fitted upon the graven work.
text_pisuk: וְקָלַע כְּרוּבִים וְתִמֹרוֹת, וּפְטֻרֵי צִצִּים; וְצִפָּה זָהָב, מְיֻשָּׁר עַל-הַמְּחֻקֶּה.

text_he: ויבן את-החצר הפנימית שלשה טורי גזית וטור כרת ארזים
text_en: And he built the inner court with three rows of hewn stone, and a row of cedar beams.
text_pisuk: וַיִּבֶן אֶת-הֶחָצֵר הַפְּנִימִית, שְׁלֹשָׁה טוּרֵי גָזִית; וְטוּר, כְּרֻתֹת אֲרָזִים.

text_he: בשנה הרביעית יסד בית יהוה--בירח זו
text_en: In the fourth year was the foundation of the house of the LORD laid, in the month Ziv.
text_pisuk: בַּשָּׁנָה, הָרְבִיעִית, יֻסַּד, בֵּית יְהוָה--בְּיֶרַח, זִו.

text_he: ובשנה האחת עשרה בירח בול הוא החדש השמיני כלה הבית לכל-דבריו ולכל-משפטו ויבנהו שבע שנים
text_en: And in the eleventh year, in the month Bul, which is the eighth month, was the house finished throughout all the parts thereof, and according to all the fashion of it. So was he seven years in building it.
text_pisuk: וּבַשָּׁנָה הָאַחַת עֶשְׂרֵה בְּיֶרַח בּוּל, הוּא הַחֹדֶשׁ הַשְּׁמִינִי, כָּלָה הַבַּיִת, לְכָל-דְּבָרָיו וּלְכָל-מִשְׁפָּטָו; וַיִּבְנֵהוּ, שֶׁבַע שָׁנִים.

text_he: ואת-ביתו בנה שלמה שלש עשרה שנה ויכל את-כל-ביתו | And Solomon was building his own house thirteen years and he finished all his house | ויאמר אלישע שמעו דבר-יהוה כה אמר יהוה כעת מחר סאה-סלת בשקל וסאתים שערים בשקל--בשער שמרון | And Elisha said 'Hear ye the word of the LORD thus saith the LORD To-morrow about this time shall a measure of fine flour be sold for a shekel and two measures of barley for a shekel in the gate of Samaria'
text_en: And Solomon was building his own house thirteen years, and he finished all his house.
text_pisuk: וְאֶת-בֵּיתוֹ בָּנָה שְׁלֹמֹה, שְׁלֹשׁ עֶשְׂרֵה שָׁנָה; וַיְכַל, אֶת-כָּל-בֵּיתוֹ. | And Solomon was building his own house thirteen years, and he finished all his house. | וַיֹּאמֶר אֱלִישָׁע, שִׁמְעוּ דְּבַר-יְהוָה: כֹּה אָמַר יְהוָה, כָּעֵת מָחָר סְאָה-סֹלֶת בְּשֶׁקֶל וְסָאתַיִם שְׂעֹרִים בְּשֶׁקֶל--בְּשַׁעַר שֹׁמְרוֹן. | And Elisha said: 'Hear ye the word of the LORD; thus saith the LORD: To-morrow about this time shall a measure of fine flour be sold for a shekel, and two measures of barley for a shekel, in the gate of Samaria.'

text_he: ויבן את-בית יער הלבנון מאה אמה ארכו וחמשים אמה רחבו ושלשים אמה קומתו על ארבעה טורי עמודי ארזים וכרתות ארזים על-העמודים | For he built the house of the forest of Lebanon the length thereof was a hundred cubits and the breadth thereof fifty cubits and the height thereof thirty cubits upon four rows of cedar pillars with cedar beams upon the pillars | ויען השליש אשר-למלך נשען על-ידו את-איש האלהים ויאמר הנה יהוה עשה ארבות בשמים היהיה הדבר הזה ויאמר הנכה ראה בעיניך ומשם לא תאכל | Then the captain on whose hand the king leaned answered the man of God and said 'Behold if the LORD should make windows in heaven might this thing be' And he said 'Behold thou shalt see it with thine eyes but shalt not eat thereof'
text_en: For he built the house of the forest of Lebanon: the length thereof was a hundred cubits, and the breadth thereof fifty cubits, and the height thereof thirty cubits, upon four rows of cedar pillars, with cedar beams upon the pillars.
text_pisuk: וַיִּבֶן אֶת-בֵּית יַעַר הַלְּבָנוֹן, מֵאָה אַמָּה אָרְכּוֹ וַחֲמִשִּׁים אַמָּה רָחְבּוֹ, וּשְׁלֹשִׁים אַמָּה, קוֹמָתוֹ; עַל, אַרְבָּעָה טוּרֵי עַמּוּדֵי אֲרָזִים, וּכְרֻתוֹת אֲרָזִים, עַל-הָעַמּוּדִים. | For he built the house of the forest of Lebanon: the length thereof was a hundred cubits, and the breadth thereof fifty cubits, and the height thereof thirty cubits, upon four rows of cedar pillars, with cedar beams upon the pillars. | וַיַּעַן הַשָּׁלִישׁ אֲשֶׁר-לַמֶּלֶךְ נִשְׁעָן עַל-יָדוֹ אֶת-אִישׁ הָאֱלֹהִים, וַיֹּאמַר, הִנֵּה יְהוָה עֹשֶׂה אֲרֻבּוֹת בַּשָּׁמַיִם, הֲיִהְיֶה הַדָּבָר הַזֶּה; וַיֹּאמֶר, הִנְּכָה רֹאֶה בְּעֵינֶיךָ, וּמִשָּׁם, לֹא תֹאכֵל. | Then the captain on whose hand the king leaned answered the man of God, and said: 'Behold, if the LORD should make windows in heaven, might this thing be?' And he said: 'Behold, thou shalt see it with thine eyes, but shalt not eat thereof.'

text_he: וספן בארז מעל על-הצלעות אשר על-העמודים ארבעים וחמשה--חמשה עשר הטור | And it was covered with cedar above upon the side-chambers that lay on forty and five pillars fifteen in a row | וארבעה אנשים היו מצרעים פתח השער ויאמרו איש אל-רעהו מה אנחנו ישבים פה עד-מתנו | Now there were four leprous men at the entrance of the gate and they said one to another 'Why sit we here until we die
text_en: And it was covered with cedar above upon the side-chambers, that lay on forty and five pillars, fifteen in a row.
text_pisuk: וְסָפֻן בָּאֶרֶז, מִמַּעַל עַל-הַצְּלָעוֹת אֲשֶׁר עַל-הָעַמּוּדִים, אַרְבָּעִים, וַחֲמִשָּׁה--חֲמִשָּׁה עָשָׂר, הַטּוּר. | And it was covered with cedar above upon the side-chambers, that lay on forty and five pillars, fifteen in a row. | וְאַרְבָּעָה אֲנָשִׁים הָיוּ מְצֹרָעִים, פֶּתַח הַשָּׁעַר; וַיֹּאמְרוּ, אִישׁ אֶל-רֵעֵהוּ, מָה אֲנַחְנוּ יֹשְׁבִים פֹּה, עַד-מָתְנוּ. | Now there were four leprous men at the entrance of the gate; and they said one to another: 'Why sit we here until we die?

text_he: ושקפים שלשה טורים ומחזה אל-מחזה שלש פעמים | And there were beams in three rows and light was over against light in three ranks | אם-אמרנו נבוא העיר והרעב בעיר ומתנו שם ואם-ישבנו פה ומתנו ועתה לכו ונפלה אל-מחנה ארם--אם-יחינו נחיה ואם-ימיתנו ומתנו | If we say We will enter into the city then the famine is in the city and we shall die there and if we sit still here we die also Now therefore come and let us fall unto the host of the Arameans if they save us alive we shall live and if they kill us we shall but die'
text_en: And there were beams in three rows; and light was over against light in three ranks.
text_pisuk: וּשְׁקֻפִים, שְׁלֹשָׁה טוּרִים; וּמֶחֱזָה אֶל-מֶחֱזָה, שָׁלֹשׁ פְּעָמִים. | And there were beams in three rows; and light was over against light in three ranks. | אִם-אָמַרְנוּ נָבוֹא הָעִיר וְהָרָעָב בָּעִיר, וָמַתְנוּ שָׁם, וְאִם-יָשַׁבְנוּ פֹה, וָמָתְנוּ; וְעַתָּה, לְכוּ וְנִפְּלָה אֶל-מַחֲנֵה אֲרָם--אִם-יְחַיֻּנוּ נִחְיֶה, וְאִם-יְמִיתֻנוּ, וָמָתְנוּ. | If we say: We will enter into the city, then the famine is in the city, and we shall die there; and if we sit still here, we die also. Now therefore come, and let us fall unto the host of the Arameans; if they save us alive, we shall live; and if they kill us, we shall but die.'

text_he: וכל-הפתחים והמזוזות רבעים שקף ומול מחזה אל-מחזה שלש פעמים | And all the doors with their posts were square in the frame and light was over against light in three ranks | ויקמו בנשף לבוא אל-מחנה ארם ויבאו עד-קצה מחנה ארם והנה אין-שם איש | And they rose up in the twilight to go unto the camp of the Arameans and when they were come to the outermost part of the camp of the Arameans behold there was no man there
text_en: And all the doors with their posts were square in the frame; and light was over against light in three ranks.
text_pisuk: וְכָל-הַפְּתָחִים וְהַמְּזוּזוֹת, רְבֻעִים שָׁקֶף; וּמוּל מֶחֱזָה אֶל-מֶחֱזָה, שָׁלֹשׁ פְּעָמִים. | And all the doors with their posts were square in the frame; and light was over against light in three ranks. | וַיָּקֻמוּ בַנֶּשֶׁף, לָבוֹא אֶל-מַחֲנֵה אֲרָם; וַיָּבֹאוּ, עַד-קְצֵה מַחֲנֵה אֲרָם, וְהִנֵּה אֵין-שָׁם, אִישׁ. | And they rose up in the twilight, to go unto the camp of the Arameans; and when they were come to the outermost part of the camp of the Arameans, behold, there was no man there.

text_he: ואת אולם העמודים עשה חמשים אמה ארכו ושלשים אמה רחבו ואולם על-פניהם ועמדים ועב על-פניהם | And he made the porch of pillars the length thereof was fifty cubits and the breadth thereof thirty cubits and a porch before them and pillars and thick beams before them | ואדני השמיע את-מחנה ארם קול רכב קול סוס--קול חיל גדול ויאמרו איש אל-אחיו הנה שכר-עלינו מלך ישראל את-מלכי החתים ואת-מלכי מצרים--לבוא עלינו | For the Lord had made the host of the Arameans to hear a noise of chariots and a noise of horses even the noise of a great host and they said one to another 'Lo the king of Israel hath hired against us the kings of the Hittites and the kings of the Egyptians to come upon us'
text_en: And he made the porch of pillars: the length thereof was fifty cubits, and the breadth thereof thirty cubits; and a porch before them; and pillars and thick beams before them.
text_pisuk: וְאֵת אוּלָם הָעַמּוּדִים, עָשָׂה, חֲמִשִּׁים אַמָּה אָרְכּוֹ, וּשְׁלֹשִׁים אַמָּה רָחְבּוֹ; וְאוּלָם, עַל-פְּנֵיהֶם, וְעַמֻּדִים וְעָב, עַל-פְּנֵיהֶם. | And he made the porch of pillars: the length thereof was fifty cubits, and the breadth thereof thirty cubits; and a porch before them; and pillars and thick beams before them. | וַאדֹנָי הִשְׁמִיעַ אֶת-מַחֲנֵה אֲרָם, קוֹל רֶכֶב קוֹל סוּס--קוֹל, חַיִל גָּדוֹל; וַיֹּאמְרוּ אִישׁ אֶל-אָחִיו, הִנֵּה שָׂכַר-עָלֵינוּ מֶלֶךְ יִשְׂרָאֵל אֶת-מַלְכֵי הַחִתִּים וְאֶת-מַלְכֵי מִצְרַיִם--לָבוֹא עָלֵינוּ. | For the Lord had made the host of the Arameans to hear a noise of chariots, and a noise of horses, even the noise of a great host; and they said one to another: 'Lo, the king of Israel hath hired against us the kings of the Hittites, and the kings of the Egyptians, to come upon us.'

text_he: ואולם הכסא אשר ישפט-שם אלם המשפט עשה וספון בארז מהקרקע עד-הקרקע | And he made the porch of the throne where he might judge even the porch of judgment and it was covered with cedar from floor to floor | ויקומו וינוסו בנשף ויעזבו את-אהליהם ואת-סוסיהם ואת-חמריהם המחנה כאשר-היא וינסו אל-נפשם | Wherefore they arose and fled in the twilight and left their tents and their horses and their asses even the camp as it was and fled for their life
text_en: And he made the porch of the throne where he might judge, even the porch of judgment; and it was covered with cedar from floor to floor.
text_pisuk: וְאוּלָם הַכִּסֵּא אֲשֶׁר יִשְׁפָּט-שָׁם, אֻלָם הַמִּשְׁפָּט עָשָׂה; וְסָפוּן בָּאֶרֶז, מֵהַקַּרְקַע עַד-הַקַּרְקָע. | And he made the porch of the throne where he might judge, even the porch of judgment; and it was covered with cedar from floor to floor. | וַיָּקוּמוּ, וַיָּנוּסוּ בַנֶּשֶׁף, וַיַּעַזְבוּ אֶת-אָהֳלֵיהֶם וְאֶת-סוּסֵיהֶם וְאֶת-חֲמֹרֵיהֶם, הַמַּחֲנֶה כַּאֲשֶׁר-הִיא; וַיָּנֻסוּ, אֶל-נַפְשָׁם. | Wherefore they arose and fled in the twilight, and left their tents, and their horses, and their asses, even the camp as it was, and fled for their life.

text_he: וביתו אשר-ישב שם חצר האחרת מבית לאולם כמעשה הזה היה ובית יעשה לבת-פרעה אשר לקח שלמה כאולם הזה | And his house where he might dwell in the other court within the porch was of the like work He made also a house for Pharaoh's daughter whom Solomon had taken to wife like unto this porch | ויבאו המצרעים האלה עד-קצה המחנה ויבאו אל-אהל אחד ויאכלו וישתו וישאו משם כסף וזהב ובגדים וילכו ויטמנו וישבו ויבאו אל-אהל אחר וישאו משם וילכו ויטמנו | And when these lepers came to the outermost part of the camp they went into one tent and did eat and drink and carried thence silver and gold and raiment and went and hid it and they came back and entered into another tent and carried thence also and went and hid it
text_en: And his house where he might dwell, in the other court, within the porch, was of the like work. He made also a house for Pharaoh's daughter, whom Solomon had taken to wife, like unto this porch.
text_pisuk: וּבֵיתוֹ אֲשֶׁר-יֵשֶׁב שָׁם חָצֵר הָאַחֶרֶת, מִבֵּית לָאוּלָם, כַּמַּעֲשֶׂה הַזֶּה, הָיָה; וּבַיִת יַעֲשֶׂה לְבַת-פַּרְעֹה, אֲשֶׁר לָקַח שְׁלֹמֹה, כָּאוּלָם, הַזֶּה. | And his house where he might dwell, in the other court, within the porch, was of the like work. He made also a house for Pharaoh's daughter, whom Solomon had taken to wife, like unto this porch. | וַיָּבֹאוּ הַמְצֹרָעִים הָאֵלֶּה עַד-קְצֵה הַמַּחֲנֶה, וַיָּבֹאוּ אֶל-אֹהֶל אֶחָד וַיֹּאכְלוּ וַיִּשְׁתּוּ, וַיִּשְׂאוּ מִשָּׁם כֶּסֶף וְזָהָב וּבְגָדִים, וַיֵּלְכוּ וַיַּטְמִנוּ; וַיָּשֻׁבוּ, וַיָּבֹאוּ אֶל-אֹהֶל אַחֵר, וַיִּשְׂאוּ מִשָּׁם, וַיֵּלְכוּ וַיַּטְמִנוּ. | And when these lepers came to the outermost part of the camp, they went into one tent, and did eat and drink, and carried thence silver, and gold, and raiment, and went and hid it; and they came back, and entered into another tent, and carried thence also, and went and hid it.

text_he: כל-אלה אבנים יקרת כמדות גזית מגרות במגרה מבית ומחוץ ומסד עד-הטפחות ומחוץ עד-החצר הגדולה | All these were of costly stones according to the measures of hewn stones sawed with saws within and without even from the foundation unto the coping and so on the outside unto the great court | ויאמרו איש אל-רעהו לא-כן אנחנו עשים היום הזה יום-בשרה הוא ואנחנו מחשים וחכינו עד-אור הבקר ומצאנו עון ועתה לכו ונבאה ונגידה בית המלך | Then they said one to another 'We do not well this day is a day of good tidings and we hold our peace if we tarry till the morning light punishment will overtake us now therefore come let us go and tell the king's household'
text_en: All these were of costly stones, according to the measures of hewn stones, sawed with saws, within and without, even from the foundation unto the coping, and so on the outside unto the great court.
text_pisuk: כָּל-אֵלֶּה אֲבָנִים יְקָרֹת, כְּמִדּוֹת גָּזִית, מְגֹרָרוֹת בַּמְּגֵרָה, מִבַּיִת וּמִחוּץ; וּמִמַּסָּד, עַד-הַטְּפָחוֹת, וּמִחוּץ, עַד-הֶחָצֵר הַגְּדוֹלָה. | All these were of costly stones, according to the measures of hewn stones, sawed with saws, within and without, even from the foundation unto the coping, and so on the outside unto the great court. | וַיֹּאמְרוּ אִישׁ אֶל-רֵעֵהוּ לֹא-כֵן אֲנַחְנוּ עֹשִׂים, הַיּוֹם הַזֶּה יוֹם-בְּשֹׂרָה הוּא, וַאֲנַחְנוּ מַחְשִׁים וְחִכִּינוּ עַד-אוֹר הַבֹּקֶר, וּמְצָאָנוּ עָווֹן; וְעַתָּה לְכוּ וְנָבֹאָה, וְנַגִּידָה בֵּית הַמֶּלֶךְ. | Then they said one to another: 'We do not well; this day is a day of good tidings, and we hold our peace; if we tarry till the morning light, punishment will overtake us; now therefore come, let us go and tell the king's household.'

text_he: ומיסד אבנים יקרות אבנים גדלות--אבני עשר אמות ואבני שמנה אמות | And the foundation was of costly stones even great stones stones of ten cubits and stones of eight cubits | ויבאו ויקראו אל-שער העיר ויגידו להם לאמר באנו אל-מחנה ארם והנה אין-שם איש וקול אדם כי אם-הסוס אסור והחמור אסור ואהלים כאשר-המה | So they came and called unto the porters of the city and they told them saying 'We came to the camp of the Arameans and behold there was no man there neither voice of man but the horses tied and the asses tied and the tents as they were'
text_en: And the foundation was of costly stones, even great stones, stones of ten cubits, and stones of eight cubits.
text_pisuk: וּמְיֻסָּד, אֲבָנִים יְקָרוֹת אֲבָנִים גְּדֹלוֹת--אַבְנֵי עֶשֶׂר אַמּוֹת, וְאַבְנֵי שְׁמֹנֶה אַמּוֹת. | And the foundation was of costly stones, even great stones, stones of ten cubits, and stones of eight cubits. | וַיָּבֹאוּ, וַיִּקְרְאוּ אֶל-שֹׁעֵר הָעִיר, וַיַּגִּידוּ לָהֶם לֵאמֹר, בָּאנוּ אֶל-מַחֲנֵה אֲרָם וְהִנֵּה אֵין-שָׁם אִישׁ וְקוֹל אָדָם: כִּי אִם-הַסּוּס אָסוּר וְהַחֲמוֹר אָסוּר, וְאֹהָלִים כַּאֲשֶׁר-הֵמָּה. | So they came and called unto the porters of the city; and they told them, saying. 'We came to the camp of the Arameans, and, behold, there was no man there, neither voice of man, but the horses tied, and the asses tied, and the tents as they were.'

text_he: ומלמעלה אבנים יקרות כמדות גזית--וארז | And above were costly stones after the measure of hewn stones and cedar-wood | ויקרא השערים ויגידו בית המלך פנימה | And the porters called and they told it to the king's household within
text_en: And above were costly stones, after the measure of hewn stones, and cedar-wood.
text_pisuk: וּמִלְמַעְלָה, אֲבָנִים יְקָרוֹת כְּמִדּוֹת גָּזִית--וָאָרֶז. | And above were costly stones, after the measure of hewn stones, and cedar-wood. | וַיִּקְרָא, הַשֹּׁעֲרִים; וַיַּגִּידוּ, בֵּית הַמֶּלֶךְ פְּנִימָה. | And the porters called, and they told it to the king's household within.

text_he: וחצר הגדולה סביב שלשה טורים גזית וטור כרת ארזים ולחצר בית-יהוה הפנימית ולאלם הבית | And the great court round about had three rows of hewn stone and a row of cedar beams like as the inner court of the house of the LORD and the court of the porch of the house | ויקם המלך לילה ויאמר אל-עבדיו אגידה-נא לכם את אשר-עשו לנו ארם ידעו כי-רעבים אנחנו ויצאו מן-המחנה להחבה בהשדה (בשדה) לאמר כי-יצאו מן-העיר ונתפשם חים ואל-העיר נבא | And the king arose in the night and said unto his servants 'I will now tell you what the Arameans have done to us They know that we are hungry therefore are they gone out of the camp to hide themselves in the field saying When they come out of the city we shall take them alive and get into the city'
text_en: And the great court round about had three rows of hewn stone, and a row of cedar beams, like as the inner court of the house of the LORD, and the court of the porch of the house.
text_pisuk: וְחָצֵר הַגְּדוֹלָה סָבִיב, שְׁלֹשָׁה טוּרִים גָּזִית, וְטוּר, כְּרֻתֹת אֲרָזִים; וְלַחֲצַר בֵּית-יְהוָה הַפְּנִימִית, וּלְאֻלָם הַבָּיִת. | And the great court round about had three rows of hewn stone, and a row of cedar beams, like as the inner court of the house of the LORD, and the court of the porch of the house. | וַיָּקָם הַמֶּלֶךְ לַיְלָה, וַיֹּאמֶר אֶל-עֲבָדָיו, אַגִּידָה-נָּא לָכֶם, אֵת אֲשֶׁר-עָשׂוּ לָנוּ אֲרָם: יָדְעוּ כִּי-רְעֵבִים אֲנַחְנוּ, וַיֵּצְאוּ מִן-הַמַּחֲנֶה לְהֵחָבֵה בהשדה (בַשָּׂדֶה) לֵאמֹר, כִּי-יֵצְאוּ מִן-הָעִיר וְנִתְפְּשֵׂם חַיִּים, וְאֶל-הָעִיר נָבֹא. | And the king arose in the night, and said unto his servants: 'I will now tell you what the Arameans have done to us. They know that we are hungry; therefore are they gone out of the camp to hide themselves in the field, saying: When they come out of the city, we shall take them alive, and get into the city.'

text_he: וישלח המלך שלמה ויקח את-חירם מצר | And king Solomon sent and fetched Hiram out of Tyre | ויען אחד מעבדיו ויאמר ויקחו-נא חמשה מן-הסוסים הנשארים אשר נשארו-בה הנם כל-המון (המון) ישראל אשר נשארו-בה הנם כל-המון ישראל אשר-תמו ונשלחה ונראה | And one of his servants answered and said 'Let some take I pray thee five of the horses that remain which are left in the city--behold they are as all the multitude of Israel that are left in it behold they are as all the multitude of Israel that are consumed--and let us send and see'
text_en: And king Solomon sent and fetched Hiram out of Tyre.
text_pisuk: וַיִּשְׁלַח הַמֶּלֶךְ שְׁלֹמֹה, וַיִּקַּח אֶת-חִירָם מִצֹּר. | And king Solomon sent and fetched Hiram out of Tyre. | וַיַּעַן אֶחָד מֵעֲבָדָיו וַיֹּאמֶר, וְיִקְחוּ-נָא חֲמִשָּׁה מִן-הַסּוּסִים הַנִּשְׁאָרִים אֲשֶׁר נִשְׁאֲרוּ-בָהּ, הִנָּם כְּכָל-ההמון (הֲמוֹן) יִשְׂרָאֵל אֲשֶׁר נִשְׁאֲרוּ-בָהּ, הִנָּם כְּכָל-הֲמוֹן יִשְׂרָאֵל אֲשֶׁר-תָּמּוּ; וְנִשְׁלְחָה, וְנִרְאֶה. | And one of his servants answered and said: 'Let some take, I pray thee, five of the horses that remain, which are left in the city--behold, they are as all the multitude of Israel that are left in it; behold, they are as all the multitude of Israel that are consumed--and let us send and see.'

text_he: בן-אשה אלמנה הוא מטה נפתלי ואביו איש-צרי חרש נחשת וימלא את-החכמה ואת-התבונה ואת-הדעת לעשות כל-מלאכה בנחשת ויבוא אל-המלך שלמה ויעש את-כל-מלאכתו | He was the son of a widow of the tribe of Naphtali and his father was a man of Tyre a worker in brass and he was filled with wisdom and understanding and skill to work all works in brass And he came to king Solomon and wrought all his work | ויקחו שני רכב סוסים וישלח המלך אחרי מחנה-ארם לאמר--לכו וראו | They took therefore two chariots with horses and the king sent after the host of the Arameans saying 'Go and see'
text_en: He was the son of a widow of the tribe of Naphtali, and his father was a man of Tyre, a worker in brass; and he was filled with wisdom and understanding and skill, to work all works in brass. And he came to king Solomon, and wrought all his work.
text_pisuk: בֶּן-אִשָּׁה אַלְמָנָה הוּא מִמַּטֵּה נַפְתָּלִי, וְאָבִיו אִישׁ-צֹרִי חֹרֵשׁ נְחֹשֶׁת, וַיִּמָּלֵא אֶת-הַחָכְמָה וְאֶת-הַתְּבוּנָה וְאֶת-הַדַּעַת, לַעֲשׂוֹת כָּל-מְלָאכָה בַּנְּחֹשֶׁת; וַיָּבוֹא אֶל-הַמֶּלֶךְ שְׁלֹמֹה, וַיַּעַשׂ אֶת-כָּל-מְלַאכְתּוֹ. | He was the son of a widow of the tribe of Naphtali, and his father was a man of Tyre, a worker in brass; and he was filled with wisdom and understanding and skill, to work all works in brass. And he came to king Solomon, and wrought all his work. | וַיִּקְחוּ, שְׁנֵי רֶכֶב סוּסִים; וַיִּשְׁלַח הַמֶּלֶךְ אַחֲרֵי מַחֲנֵה-אֲרָם, לֵאמֹר--לְכוּ וּרְאוּ. | They took therefore two chariots with horses; and the king sent after the host of the Arameans, saying: 'Go and see.'

text_he: ויצר את-שני העמודים נחשת שמנה עשרה אמה קומת העמוד האחד וחוט שתים-עשרה אמה יסב את-העמוד השני | Thus he fashioned the two pillars of brass of eighteen cubits high each and a line of twelve cubits did compass it about the other pillar | וילכו אחריהם עד-הירדן והנה כל-הדרך מלאה בגדים וכלים אשר-השליכו ארם בהחפזם (בחפזם) וישבו המלאכים ויגדו למלך | And they went after them unto the Jordan and lo all the way was full of garments and vessels which the Arameans had cast away in their haste And the messengers returned and told the king
text_en: Thus he fashioned the two pillars of brass, of eighteen cubits high each; and a line of twelve cubits did compass it about; the other pillar.
text_pisuk: וַיָּצַר אֶת-שְׁנֵי הָעַמּוּדִים, נְחֹשֶׁת: שְׁמֹנֶה עֶשְׂרֵה אַמָּה, קוֹמַת הָעַמּוּד הָאֶחָד, וְחוּט שְׁתֵּים-עֶשְׂרֵה אַמָּה, יָסֹב אֶת-הָעַמּוּד הַשֵּׁנִי. | Thus he fashioned the two pillars of brass, of eighteen cubits high each; and a line of twelve cubits did compass it about; the other pillar. | וַיֵּלְכוּ אַחֲרֵיהֶם, עַד-הַיַּרְדֵּן, וְהִנֵּה כָל-הַדֶּרֶךְ מְלֵאָה בְגָדִים וְכֵלִים, אֲשֶׁר-הִשְׁלִיכוּ אֲרָם בהחפזם (בְּחָפְזָם); וַיָּשֻׁבוּ, הַמַּלְאָכִים, וַיַּגִּדוּ, לַמֶּלֶךְ. | And they went after them unto the Jordan; and, lo, all the way was full of garments and vessels, which the Arameans had cast away in their haste. And the messengers returned, and told the king.

text_he: ושתי כתרת עשה לת על-ראשי העמודים--מצק נחשת חמש אמות קומת הכתרת האחת וחמש אמות קומת הכתרת השנית | And he made two capitals of molten brass to set upon the tops of the pillars the height of the one capital was five cubits and the height of the other capital was five cubits | ויצא העם--ויבזו את מחנה ארם ויהי סאה-סלת בשקל וסאתים שערים בשקל--כדבר יהוה | And the people went out and spoiled the camp of the Arameans So a measure of fine flour was sold for a shekel and two measures of barley for a shekel according to the word of the LORD
text_en: And he made two capitals of molten brass, to set upon the tops of the pillars; the height of the one capital was five cubits, and the height of the other capital was five cubits.
text_pisuk: וּשְׁתֵּי כֹתָרֹת עָשָׂה, לָתֵת עַל-רָאשֵׁי הָעַמּוּדִים--מֻצַק נְחֹשֶׁת: חָמֵשׁ אַמּוֹת, קוֹמַת הַכֹּתֶרֶת הָאֶחָת, וְחָמֵשׁ אַמּוֹת, קוֹמַת הַכֹּתֶרֶת הַשֵּׁנִית. | And he made two capitals of molten brass, to set upon the tops of the pillars; the height of the one capital was five cubits, and the height of the other capital was five cubits. | וַיֵּצֵא הָעָם--וַיָּבֹזּוּ, אֵת מַחֲנֵה אֲרָם; וַיְהִי סְאָה-סֹלֶת בְּשֶׁקֶל, וְסָאתַיִם שְׂעֹרִים בְּשֶׁקֶל--כִּדְבַר יְהוָה. | And the people went out, and spoiled the camp of the Arameans. So a measure of fine flour was sold for a shekel, and two measures of barley for a shekel, according to the word of the LORD.

text_he: שבכים מעשה שבכה גדלים מעשה שרשרות לכתרת אשר על-ראש העמודים--שבעה לכתרת האחת ושבעה לכתרת השנית | He also made nets of checker-work and wreaths of chain-work for the capitals which were upon the top of the pillars seven for the one capital and seven for the other capital | והמלך הפקיד את-השליש אשר-נשען על-ידו על-השער וירמסהו העם בשער וימת כאשר דבר איש האלהים אשר דבר ברדת המלך אליו | And the king appointed the captain on whose hand he leaned to have the charge of the gate and the people trod upon him in the gate and he died as the man of God had said who spoke when the king came down to him
text_en: He also made nets of checker-work, and wreaths of chain-work, for the capitals which were upon the top of the pillars: seven for the one capital, and seven for the other capital.
text_pisuk: שְׂבָכִים מַעֲשֵׂה שְׂבָכָה, גְּדִלִים מַעֲשֵׂה שַׁרְשְׁרוֹת, לַכֹּתָרֹת, אֲשֶׁר עַל-רֹאשׁ הָעַמּוּדִים--שִׁבְעָה לַכֹּתֶרֶת הָאֶחָת, וְשִׁבְעָה לַכֹּתֶרֶת הַשֵּׁנִית. | He also made nets of checker-work, and wreaths of chain-work, for the capitals which were upon the top of the pillars: seven for the one capital, and seven for the other capital. | וְהַמֶּלֶךְ הִפְקִיד אֶת-הַשָּׁלִישׁ אֲשֶׁר-נִשְׁעָן עַל-יָדוֹ, עַל-הַשַּׁעַר, וַיִּרְמְסֻהוּ הָעָם בַּשַּׁעַר, וַיָּמֹת: כַּאֲשֶׁר דִּבֶּר, אִישׁ הָאֱלֹהִים, אֲשֶׁר דִּבֶּר, בְּרֶדֶת הַמֶּלֶךְ אֵלָיו. | And the king appointed the captain on whose hand he leaned to have the charge of the gate; and the people trod upon him in the gate, and he died as the man of God had said, who spoke when the king came down to him.

text_he: ויעש את-העמודים ושני טורים סביב על-השבכה האחת לכסות את-הכתרת אשר על-ראש הרמנים וכן עשה לכתרת השנית | And he made the pillars and there were two rows round about upon the one network to cover the capitals that were upon the top of the pomegranates and so did he for the other capital | ויהי כדבר איש האלהים אל-המלך לאמר סאתים שערים בשקל וסאה-סלת בשקל יהיה כעת מחר בשער שמרון | And it came to pass as the man of God had spoken to the king saying 'Two measures of barley for a shekel and a measure of fine flour for a shekel shall be to-morrow about this time in the gate of Samaria'
text_en: And he made the pillars; and there were two rows round about upon the one network, to cover the capitals that were upon the top of the pomegranates; and so did he for the other capital.
text_pisuk: וַיַּעַשׂ, אֶת-הָעַמּוּדִים; וּשְׁנֵי טוּרִים סָבִיב עַל-הַשְּׂבָכָה הָאֶחָת, לְכַסּוֹת אֶת-הַכֹּתָרֹת אֲשֶׁר עַל-רֹאשׁ הָרִמֹּנִים, וְכֵן עָשָׂה, לַכֹּתֶרֶת הַשֵּׁנִית. | And he made the pillars; and there were two rows round about upon the one network, to cover the capitals that were upon the top of the pomegranates; and so did he for the other capital. | וַיְהִי, כְּדַבֵּר אִישׁ הָאֱלֹהִים, אֶל-הַמֶּלֶךְ, לֵאמֹר: סָאתַיִם שְׂעֹרִים בְּשֶׁקֶל, וּסְאָה-סֹלֶת בְּשֶׁקֶל, יִהְיֶה כָּעֵת מָחָר, בְּשַׁעַר שֹׁמְרוֹן. | And it came to pass, as the man of God had spoken to the king, saying: 'Two measures of barley for a shekel, and a measure of fine flour for a shekel, shall be to-morrow about this time in the gate of Samaria';

text_he: וכתרת אשר על-ראש העמודים--מעשה שושן באולם ארבע אמות | And the capitals that were upon the top of the pillars in the porch were of lily-work four cubits | ויען השליש את-איש האלהים ויאמר והנה יהוה עשה ארבות בשמים היהיה כדבר הזה ויאמר הנך ראה בעיניך ומשם לא תאכל | and that captain answered the man of God and said 'Now behold if the LORD should make windows in heaven might such a thing be' and he said 'Behold thou shalt see it with thine eyes but shalt not eat thereof'
text_en: And the capitals that were upon the top of the pillars in the porch were of lily-work, four cubits.
text_pisuk: וְכֹתָרֹת, אֲשֶׁר עַל-רֹאשׁ הָעַמּוּדִים--מַעֲשֵׂה, שׁוּשַׁן בָּאוּלָם: אַרְבַּע, אַמּוֹת. | And the capitals that were upon the top of the pillars in the porch were of lily-work, four cubits. | וַיַּעַן הַשָּׁלִישׁ אֶת-אִישׁ הָאֱלֹהִים, וַיֹּאמַר, וְהִנֵּה יְהוָה עֹשֶׂה אֲרֻבּוֹת בַּשָּׁמַיִם, הֲיִהְיֶה כַּדָּבָר הַזֶּה; וַיֹּאמֶר, הִנְּךָ רֹאֶה בְּעֵינֶיךָ, וּמִשָּׁם, לֹא תֹאכֵל. | and that captain answered the man of God, and said: 'Now, behold, if the LORD should make windows in heaven, might such a thing be?' and he said: 'Behold, thou shalt see it with thine eyes, but shalt not eat thereof';

text_he: וכתרת על-שני העמודים גם-מעל מלעמת הבטן אשר לעבר שבכה (השבכה) והרמונים מאתים טרים סביב על הכתרת השנית | And there were capitals above also upon the two pillars close by the belly which was beside the network and the pomegranates were two hundred in rows round about upon each capital | ויהי-לו כן וירמסו אתו העם בשער וימת | it came to pass even so unto him for the people trod upon him in the gate and he died{S}
text_en: And there were capitals above also upon the two pillars, close by the belly which was beside the network; and the pomegranates were two hundred, in rows round about upon each capital.
text_pisuk: וְכֹתָרֹת, עַל-שְׁנֵי הָעַמּוּדִים, גַּם-מִמַּעַל מִלְּעֻמַּת הַבֶּטֶן, אֲשֶׁר לְעֵבֶר שבכה (הַשְּׂבָכָה); וְהָרִמּוֹנִים מָאתַיִם טֻרִים סָבִיב, עַל הַכֹּתֶרֶת הַשֵּׁנִית. | And there were capitals above also upon the two pillars, close by the belly which was beside the network; and the pomegranates were two hundred, in rows round about upon each capital. | וַיְהִי-לוֹ, כֵּן; וַיִּרְמְסוּ אֹתוֹ הָעָם בַּשַּׁעַר, וַיָּמֹת. | it came to pass even so unto him; for the people trod upon him in the gate, and he died.{S}

text_he: ויקם את-העמדים לאלם היכל ויקם את-העמוד הימני ויקרא את-שמו יכין ויקם את-העמוד השמאלי ויקרא את-שמו בעז
text_en: And he set up the pillars at the porch of the temple; and he set up the right pillar, and called the name thereof Jachin; and he set up the left pillar, and called the name thereof Boaz.
