text_he: ויהי מקצה עשרים שנה אשר-בנה שלמה את-שני הבתים--את-בית יהוה ואת-בית המלך | And it came to pass at the end of twenty years wherein Solomon had built the two houses the house of the LORD and the king's house-- | ואת-איזבל יאכלו הכלבים בחלק יזרעאל--ואין קבר ויפתח הדלת וינס | And the dogs shall eat Jezebel in the portion of Jezreel and there shall be none to bury her' And he opened the door and fled
text_en: And it came to pass at the end of twenty years, wherein Solomon had built the two houses, the house of the LORD and the king's house--
text_pisuk: וַיְהִי, מִקְצֵה עֶשְׂרִים שָׁנָה, אֲשֶׁר-בָּנָה שְׁלֹמֹה, אֶת-שְׁנֵי הַבָּתִּים--אֶת-בֵּית יְהוָה, וְאֶת-בֵּית הַמֶּלֶךְ. | And it came to pass at the end of twenty years, wherein Solomon had built the two houses, the house of the LORD and the king's house-- | וְאֶת-אִיזֶבֶל יֹאכְלוּ הַכְּלָבִים, בְּחֵלֶק יִזְרְעֶאל--וְאֵין קֹבֵר; וַיִּפְתַּח הַדֶּלֶת, וַיָּנֹס. | And the dogs shall eat Jezebel in the portion of Jezreel, and there shall be none to bury her.' And he opened the door, and fled.

text_he: חירם מלך-צר נשא את-שלמה בעצי ארזים ובעצי ברושים ובזהב--לכל-חפצו אז יתן המלך שלמה לחירם עשרים עיר בארץ הגליל | now Hiram the king of Tyre had furnished Solomon with cedar-trees and cypress-trees and with gold according to all his desire--that then king Solomon gave Hiram twenty cities in the land of Galilee | ויהוא יצא אל-עבדי אדניו ויאמר לו השלום מדוע בא-המשגע הזה אליך ויאמר אליהם אתם ידעתם את-האיש ואת-שיחו | Then Jehu came forth to the servants of his lord and one said unto him 'Is all well wherefore came this mad fellow to thee' And he said unto them 'Ye know the man and what his talk was'
text_en: now Hiram the king of Tyre had furnished Solomon with cedar-trees and cypress-trees, and with gold, according to all his desire--that then king Solomon gave Hiram twenty cities in the land of Galilee.
text_pisuk: חִירָם מֶלֶךְ-צֹר נִשָּׂא אֶת-שְׁלֹמֹה בַּעֲצֵי אֲרָזִים וּבַעֲצֵי בְרוֹשִׁים, וּבַזָּהָב--לְכָל-חֶפְצוֹ; אָז יִתֵּן הַמֶּלֶךְ שְׁלֹמֹה לְחִירָם, עֶשְׂרִים עִיר, בְּאֶרֶץ, הַגָּלִיל. | now Hiram the king of Tyre had furnished Solomon with cedar-trees and cypress-trees, and with gold, according to all his desire--that then king Solomon gave Hiram twenty cities in the land of Galilee. | וְיֵהוּא, יָצָא אֶל-עַבְדֵי אֲדֹנָיו, וַיֹּאמֶר לוֹ הֲשָׁלוֹם, מַדּוּעַ בָּא-הַמְשֻׁגָּע הַזֶּה אֵלֶיךָ; וַיֹּאמֶר אֲלֵיהֶם, אַתֶּם יְדַעְתֶּם אֶת-הָאִישׁ וְאֶת-שִׂיחוֹ. | Then Jehu came forth to the servants of his lord; and one said unto him: 'Is all well? wherefore came this mad fellow to thee?' And he said unto them: 'Ye know the man and what his talk was.'

text_he: ויצא חירם מצר לראות את-הערים אשר נתן-לו שלמה ולא ישרו בעיניו | And Hiram came out from Tyre to see the cities which Solomon had given him and they pleased him not | ויאמרו שקר הגד-נא לנו ויאמר כזאת וכזאת אמר אלי לאמר כה אמר יהוה משחתיך למלך אל-ישראל | And they said 'It is false tell us now' And he said 'Thus and thus spoke he to me saying Thus saith the LORD I have anointed thee king over Israel'
text_en: And Hiram came out from Tyre to see the cities which Solomon had given him: and they pleased him not.
text_pisuk: וַיֵּצֵא חִירָם, מִצֹּר, לִרְאוֹת אֶת-הֶעָרִים, אֲשֶׁר נָתַן-לוֹ שְׁלֹמֹה; וְלֹא יָשְׁרוּ, בְּעֵינָיו. | And Hiram came out from Tyre to see the cities which Solomon had given him: and they pleased him not. | וַיֹּאמְרוּ שֶׁקֶר, הַגֶּד-נָא לָנוּ; וַיֹּאמֶר, כָּזֹאת וְכָזֹאת אָמַר אֵלַי לֵאמֹר, כֹּה אָמַר יְהוָה, מְשַׁחְתִּיךָ לְמֶלֶךְ אֶל-יִשְׂרָאֵל. | And they said: 'It is false; tell us now.' And he said: 'Thus and thus spoke he to me, saying: Thus saith the LORD: I have anointed thee king over Israel.'

text_he: ויאמר--מה הערים האלה אשר-נתה לי אחי ויקרא להם ארץ כבול עד היום הזה | And he said 'What cities are these which thou hast given me my brother' And they were called the land of Cabul unto this day | וימהרו ויקחו איש בגדו וישימו תחתיו אל-גרם המעלות ויתקעו בשופר ויאמרו מלך יהוא | Then they hastened and took every man his garment and put it under him on the top of the stairs and blew the horn saying 'Jehu is king'
text_en: And he said: 'What cities are these which thou hast given me, my brother?' And they were called the land of Cabul, unto this day.
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמֶר--מָה הֶעָרִים הָאֵלֶּה, אֲשֶׁר-נָתַתָּה לִּי אָחִי; וַיִּקְרָא לָהֶם אֶרֶץ כָּבוּל, עַד הַיּוֹם הַזֶּה. | And he said: 'What cities are these which thou hast given me, my brother?' And they were called the land of Cabul, unto this day. | וַיְמַהֲרוּ, וַיִּקְחוּ אִישׁ בִּגְדוֹ, וַיָּשִׂימוּ תַחְתָּיו, אֶל-גֶּרֶם הַמַּעֲלוֹת; וַיִּתְקְעוּ, בַּשּׁוֹפָר, וַיֹּאמְרוּ, מָלַךְ יֵהוּא. | Then they hastened, and took every man his garment, and put it under him on the top of the stairs, and blew the horn, saying: 'Jehu is king.'

text_he: וישלח חירם למלך מאה ועשרים כר זהב | And Hiram sent to the king sixscore talents of gold | ויתקשר יהוא בן-יהושפט בן-נמשי--אל-יורם ויורם היה שמר ברמת גלעד הוא וכל-ישראל מפני חזאל מלך-ארם | So Jehu the son of Jehoshaphat the son of Nimshi conspired against Joram--Now Joram had been guarding Ramoth-gilead he and all Israel because of Hazael king of Aram
text_en: And Hiram sent to the king sixscore talents of gold.
text_pisuk: וַיִּשְׁלַח חִירָם, לַמֶּלֶךְ, מֵאָה וְעֶשְׂרִים, כִּכַּר זָהָב. | And Hiram sent to the king sixscore talents of gold. | וַיִּתְקַשֵּׁר, יֵהוּא בֶּן-יְהוֹשָׁפָט בֶּן-נִמְשִׁי--אֶל-יוֹרָם; וְיוֹרָם הָיָה שֹׁמֵר בְּרָמֹת גִּלְעָד, הוּא וְכָל-יִשְׂרָאֵל, מִפְּנֵי, חֲזָאֵל מֶלֶךְ-אֲרָם. | So Jehu the son of Jehoshaphat the son of Nimshi conspired against Joram.--Now Joram had been guarding Ramoth-gilead, he and all Israel, because of Hazael king of Aram;

text_he: וזה דבר-המס אשר-העלה המלך שלמה לבנות את-בית יהוה ואת-ביתו ואת-המלוא ואת חומת ירושלם ואת-חצר ואת-מגדו ואת-גזר | And this is the account of the levy which king Solomon raised to build the house of the LORD and his own house and Millo and the wall of Jerusalem and Hazor and Megiddo and Gezer | וישב יהורם המלך להתרפא ביזרעאל מן-המכים אשר יכהו ארמים בהלחמו את-חזאל מלך ארם ויאמר יהוא אם-יש נפשכם--אל-יצא פליט מן-העיר לכת לגיד (להגיד) ביזרעאל | but king Joram was returned to be healed in Jezreel of the wounds which the Arameans had given him when he fought with Hazael king of Aram--And Jehu said 'If this be your mind then let none escape and go forth out of the city to go to tell it in Jezreel'
text_en: And this is the account of the levy which king Solomon raised; to build the house of the LORD, and his own house, and Millo, and the wall of Jerusalem, and Hazor, and Megiddo, and Gezer.
text_pisuk: וְזֶה דְבַר-הַמַּס אֲשֶׁר-הֶעֱלָה הַמֶּלֶךְ שְׁלֹמֹה, לִבְנוֹת אֶת-בֵּית יְהוָה וְאֶת-בֵּיתוֹ וְאֶת-הַמִּלּוֹא, וְאֵת, חוֹמַת יְרוּשָׁלִָם; וְאֶת-חָצֹר וְאֶת-מְגִדּוֹ, וְאֶת-גָּזֶר. | And this is the account of the levy which king Solomon raised; to build the house of the LORD, and his own house, and Millo, and the wall of Jerusalem, and Hazor, and Megiddo, and Gezer. | וַיָּשָׁב יְהוֹרָם הַמֶּלֶךְ לְהִתְרַפֵּא בְיִזְרְעֶאל, מִן-הַמַּכִּים אֲשֶׁר יַכֻּהוּ אֲרַמִּים, בְּהִלָּחֲמוֹ, אֶת-חֲזָאֵל מֶלֶךְ אֲרָם; וַיֹּאמֶר יֵהוּא, אִם-יֵשׁ נַפְשְׁכֶם--אַל-יֵצֵא פָלִיט מִן-הָעִיר, לָלֶכֶת לגיד (לְהַגִּיד) בְּיִזְרְעֶאל. | but king Joram was returned to be healed in Jezreel of the wounds which the Arameans had given him, when he fought with Hazael king of Aram.--And Jehu said: 'If this be your mind, then let none escape and go forth out of the city, to go to tell it in Jezreel.'

text_he: פרעה מלך-מצרים עלה וילכד את-גזר וישרפה באש ואת-הכנעני הישב בעיר הרג ויתנה שלחים לבתו אשת שלמה | Pharaoh king of Egypt had gone up and taken Gezer and burnt it with fire and slain the Canaanites that dwelt in the city and given it for a portion unto his daughter Solomon's wife | וירכב יהוא וילך יזרעאלה כי יורם שכב שמה ואחזיה מלך יהודה ירד לראות את-יורם | So Jehu rode in a chariot and went to Jezreel for Joram lay there And Ahaziah king of Judah was come down to see Joram
text_en: Pharaoh king of Egypt had gone up, and taken Gezer, and burnt it with fire, and slain the Canaanites that dwelt in the city, and given it for a portion unto his daughter, Solomon's wife.
text_pisuk: פַּרְעֹה מֶלֶךְ-מִצְרַיִם עָלָה, וַיִּלְכֹּד אֶת-גֶּזֶר וַיִּשְׂרְפָהּ בָּאֵשׁ, וְאֶת-הַכְּנַעֲנִי הַיֹּשֵׁב בָּעִיר, הָרָג; וַיִּתְּנָהּ, שִׁלֻּחִים, לְבִתּוֹ, אֵשֶׁת שְׁלֹמֹה. | Pharaoh king of Egypt had gone up, and taken Gezer, and burnt it with fire, and slain the Canaanites that dwelt in the city, and given it for a portion unto his daughter, Solomon's wife. | וַיִּרְכַּב יֵהוּא וַיֵּלֶךְ יִזְרְעֶאלָה, כִּי יוֹרָם שֹׁכֵב שָׁמָּה; וַאֲחַזְיָה מֶלֶךְ יְהוּדָה, יָרַד לִרְאוֹת אֶת-יוֹרָם. | So Jehu rode in a chariot, and went to Jezreel; for Joram lay there. And Ahaziah king of Judah was come down to see Joram.

text_he: ויבן שלמה את-גזר ואת-בית חרן תחתון | And Solomon built Gezer and Beth-horon the nether | והצפה עמד על-המגדל ביזרעאל וירא את-שפעת יהוא באו ויאמר שפעת אני ראה ויאמר יהורם קח רכב ושלח לקראתם--ויאמר השלום | Now the watchman stood on the tower in Jezreel and he spied the company of Jehu as he came and said 'I see a company' And Joram said 'Take a horseman and send to meet them and let him say Is it peace'
text_en: And Solomon built Gezer, and Beth-horon the nether,
text_pisuk: וַיִּבֶן שְׁלֹמֹה אֶת-גָּזֶר, וְאֶת-בֵּית חֹרֹן תַּחְתּוֹן. | And Solomon built Gezer, and Beth-horon the nether, | וְהַצֹּפֶה עֹמֵד עַל-הַמִּגְדָּל בְּיִזְרְעֶאל, וַיַּרְא אֶת-שִׁפְעַת יֵהוּא בְּבֹאוֹ, וַיֹּאמֶר, שִׁפְעַת אֲנִי רֹאֶה; וַיֹּאמֶר יְהוֹרָם, קַח רַכָּב וּשְׁלַח לִקְרָאתָם--וְיֹאמַר הֲשָׁלוֹם. | Now the watchman stood on the tower in Jezreel, and he spied the company of Jehu as he came, and said: 'I see a company.' And Joram said: 'Take a horseman, and send to meet them, and let him say: Is it peace?'

text_he: ואת-בעלת ואת-תמר (תדמר) במדבר בארץ | and Baalath and Tadmor in the wilderness in the land | וילך רכב הסוס לקראתו ויאמר כה-אמר המלך השלום ויאמר יהוא מה-לך ולשלום סב אל-אחרי ויגד הצפה לאמר בא-המלאך עד-הם ולא-שב | So there went one on horseback to meet him and said 'Thus saith the king Is it peace' And Jehu said 'What hast thou to do with peace turn thee behind me' And the watchman told saying 'The messenger came to them but he cometh not back'
text_en: and Baalath, and Tadmor in the wilderness, in the land,
text_pisuk: וְאֶת-בַּעֲלָת וְאֶת-תמר (תַּדְמֹר) בַּמִּדְבָּר, בָּאָרֶץ. | and Baalath, and Tadmor in the wilderness, in the land, | וַיֵּלֶךְ רֹכֵב הַסּוּס לִקְרָאתוֹ, וַיֹּאמֶר כֹּה-אָמַר הַמֶּלֶךְ הֲשָׁלוֹם, וַיֹּאמֶר יֵהוּא מַה-לְּךָ וּלְשָׁלוֹם, סֹב אֶל-אַחֲרָי; וַיַּגֵּד הַצֹּפֶה לֵאמֹר, בָּא-הַמַּלְאָךְ עַד-הֵם וְלֹא-שָׁב. | So there went one on horseback to meet him, and said: 'Thus saith the king: Is it peace?' And Jehu said: 'What hast thou to do with peace? turn thee behind me.' And the watchman told, saying: 'The messenger came to them, but he cometh not back.'

text_he: ואת כל-ערי המסכנות אשר היו לשלמה ואת ערי הרכב ואת ערי הפרשים ואת חשק שלמה אשר חשק לבנות בירושלם ובלבנון ובכל ארץ משלתו | and all the store-cities that Solomon had and the cities for his chariots and the cities for his horsemen and that which Solomon desired to build for his pleasure in Jerusalem and in Lebanon and in all the land of his dominion | וישלח רכב סוס שני ויבא אלהם ויאמר כה-אמר המלך שלום ויאמר יהוא מה-לך ולשלום סב אל-אחרי | Then he sent out a second on horseback who came to them and said 'Thus saith the king Is it peace' And Jehu answered 'What hast thou to do with peace turn thee behind me'
text_en: and all the store-cities that Solomon had, and the cities for his chariots, and the cities for his horsemen, and that which Solomon desired to build for his pleasure in Jerusalem, and in Lebanon, and in all the land of his dominion.
text_pisuk: וְאֵת כָּל-עָרֵי הַמִּסְכְּנוֹת, אֲשֶׁר הָיוּ לִשְׁלֹמֹה, וְאֵת עָרֵי הָרֶכֶב, וְאֵת עָרֵי הַפָּרָשִׁים; וְאֵת חֵשֶׁק שְׁלֹמֹה, אֲשֶׁר חָשַׁק לִבְנוֹת בִּירוּשָׁלִַם וּבַלְּבָנוֹן, וּבְכֹל, אֶרֶץ מֶמְשַׁלְתּוֹ. | and all the store-cities that Solomon had, and the cities for his chariots, and the cities for his horsemen, and that which Solomon desired to build for his pleasure in Jerusalem, and in Lebanon, and in all the land of his dominion. | וַיִּשְׁלַח, רֹכֵב סוּס שֵׁנִי, וַיָּבֹא אֲלֵהֶם, וַיֹּאמֶר כֹּה-אָמַר הַמֶּלֶךְ שָׁלוֹם; וַיֹּאמֶר יֵהוּא מַה-לְּךָ וּלְשָׁלוֹם, סֹב אֶל-אַחֲרָי. | Then he sent out a second on horseback, who came to them, and said: 'Thus saith the king: Is it peace?' And Jehu answered: 'What hast thou to do with peace? turn thee behind me.'

text_he: כל-העם הנותר מן-האמרי החתי הפרזי החוי והיבוסי אשר לא-מבני ישראל המה | All the people that were left of the Amorites the Hittites the Perizzites the Hivites and the Jebusites who were not of the children of Israel | ויגד הצפה לאמר בא עד-אליהם ולא-שב והמנהג כמנהג יהוא בן-נמשי--כי בשגעון ינהג | And the watchman told saying 'He came even unto them and cometh not back and the driving is like the driving of Jehu the son of Nimshi for he driveth furiously'
text_en: All the people that were left of the Amorites, the Hittites, the Perizzites, the Hivites, and the Jebusites, who were not of the children of Israel;
text_pisuk: כָּל-הָעָם הַנּוֹתָר מִן-הָאֱמֹרִי הַחִתִּי הַפְּרִזִּי, הַחִוִּי וְהַיְבוּסִי, אֲשֶׁר לֹא-מִבְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל, הֵמָּה. | All the people that were left of the Amorites, the Hittites, the Perizzites, the Hivites, and the Jebusites, who were not of the children of Israel; | וַיַגֵּד הַצֹּפֶה לֵאמֹר, בָּא עַד-אֲלֵיהֶם וְלֹא-שָׁב; וְהַמִּנְהָג, כְּמִנְהַג יֵהוּא בֶן-נִמְשִׁי--כִּי בְשִׁגָּעוֹן, יִנְהָג. | And the watchman told, saying: 'He came even unto them, and cometh not back; and the driving is like the driving of Jehu the son of Nimshi; for he driveth furiously.'

text_he: בניהם אשר נתרו אחריהם בארץ אשר לא-יכלו בני ישראל להחרימם ויעלם שלמה למס-עבד עד היום הזה | even their children that were left after them in the land whom the children of Israel were not able utterly to destroy of them did Solomon raise a levy of bondservants unto this day | ויאמר יהורם אסר ויאסר רכבו ויצא יהורם מלך-ישראל ואחזיהו מלך-יהודה איש ברכבו ויצאו לקראת יהוא וימצאהו בחלקת נבות היזרעאלי | And Joram said 'Make ready' And they made ready his chariot And Joram king of Israel and Ahaziah king of Judah went out each in his chariot and they went out to meet Jehu and found him in the portion of Naboth the Jezreelite
text_en: even their children that were left after them in the land, whom the children of Israel were not able utterly to destroy, of them did Solomon raise a levy of bondservants, unto this day.
text_pisuk: בְּנֵיהֶם, אֲשֶׁר נֹתְרוּ אַחֲרֵיהֶם בָּאָרֶץ, אֲשֶׁר לֹא-יָכְלוּ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל, לְהַחֲרִימָם; וַיַּעֲלֵם שְׁלֹמֹה לְמַס-עֹבֵד, עַד הַיּוֹם הַזֶּה. | even their children that were left after them in the land, whom the children of Israel were not able utterly to destroy, of them did Solomon raise a levy of bondservants, unto this day. | וַיֹּאמֶר יְהוֹרָם אֱסֹר, וַיֶּאְסֹר רִכְבּוֹ; וַיֵּצֵא יְהוֹרָם מֶלֶךְ-יִשְׂרָאֵל וַאֲחַזְיָהוּ מֶלֶךְ-יְהוּדָה אִישׁ בְּרִכְבּוֹ, וַיֵּצְאוּ לִקְרַאת יֵהוּא, וַיִּמְצָאֻהוּ, בְּחֶלְקַת נָבוֹת הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִי. | And Joram said: 'Make ready.' And they made ready his chariot. And Joram king of Israel and Ahaziah king of Judah went out, each in his chariot, and they went out to meet Jehu, and found him in the portion of Naboth the Jezreelite.

text_he: ומבני ישראל לא-נתן שלמה עבד כי-הם אנשי המלחמה ועבדיו ושריו ושלישיו ושרי רכבו ופרשיו | But of the children of Israel did Solomon make no bondservants but they were the men of war and his servants and his princes and his captains and rulers of his chariots and of his horsemen{S} | ויהי כראות יהורם את-יהוא ויאמר השלום יהוא ויאמר מה השלום--עד-זנוני איזבל אמך וכשפיה הרבים | And it came to pass when Joram saw Jehu that he said 'Is it peace Jehu' And he answered 'What peace so long as the harlotries of thy mother Jezebel and her witchcrafts are so many'
text_en: But of the children of Israel did Solomon make no bondservants; but they were the men of war, and his servants, and his princes, and his captains, and rulers of his chariots and of his horsemen.{S}
text_pisuk: וּמִבְּנֵי, יִשְׂרָאֵל, לֹא-נָתַן שְׁלֹמֹה, עָבֶד: כִּי-הֵם אַנְשֵׁי הַמִּלְחָמָה, וַעֲבָדָיו וְשָׂרָיו וְשָׁלִישָׁיו, וְשָׂרֵי רִכְבּוֹ, וּפָרָשָׁיו. | But of the children of Israel did Solomon make no bondservants; but they were the men of war, and his servants, and his princes, and his captains, and rulers of his chariots and of his horsemen.{S} | וַיְהִי, כִּרְאוֹת יְהוֹרָם אֶת-יֵהוּא, וַיֹּאמֶר, הֲשָׁלוֹם יֵהוּא; וַיֹּאמֶר, מָה הַשָּׁלוֹם--עַד-זְנוּנֵי אִיזֶבֶל אִמְּךָ וּכְשָׁפֶיהָ, הָרַבִּים. | And it came to pass, when Joram saw Jehu, that he said: 'Is it peace, Jehu?' And he answered: 'What peace, so long as the harlotries of thy mother Jezebel and her witchcrafts are so many?'

text_he: אלה שרי הנצבים אשר על-המלאכה לשלמה חמשים וחמש מאות--הרדים בעם העשים במלאכה | These were the chief officers that were over Solomon's work five hundred and fifty who bore rule over the people that wrought in the work | ויהפך יהורם ידיו וינס ויאמר אל-אחזיהו מרמה אחזיה | And Joram turned his hands and fled and said to Ahaziah 'There is treachery O Ahaziah'
text_en: These were the chief officers that were over Solomon's work, five hundred and fifty, who bore rule over the people that wrought in the work.
text_pisuk: אֵלֶּה שָׂרֵי הַנִּצָּבִים, אֲשֶׁר עַל-הַמְּלָאכָה לִשְׁלֹמֹה, חֲמִשִּׁים, וַחֲמֵשׁ מֵאוֹת--הָרֹדִים בָּעָם, הָעֹשִׂים בַּמְּלָאכָה. | These were the chief officers that were over Solomon's work, five hundred and fifty, who bore rule over the people that wrought in the work. | וַיַּהֲפֹךְ יְהוֹרָם יָדָיו, וַיָּנֹס; וַיֹּאמֶר אֶל-אֲחַזְיָהוּ, מִרְמָה אֲחַזְיָה. | And Joram turned his hands, and fled, and said to Ahaziah: 'There is treachery, O Ahaziah.'

text_he: אך בת-פרעה עלתה מעיר דוד אל-ביתה אשר בנה-לה אז בנה את-המלוא | But Pharaoh's daughter came up out of the city of David unto her house which had built for her then did he build Millo | ויהוא מלא ידו בקשת ויך את-יהורם בין זרעיו ויצא החצי מלבו ויכרע ברכבו | And Jehu drew his bow with his full strength and smote Joram between his arms and the arrow went out at his heart and he sunk down in his chariot
text_en: But Pharaoh's daughter came up out of the city of David unto her house which had built for her; then did he build Millo.
text_pisuk: אַךְ בַּת-פַּרְעֹה, עָלְתָה מֵעִיר דָּוִד, אֶל-בֵּיתָהּ, אֲשֶׁר בָּנָה-לָהּ; אָז, בָּנָה אֶת-הַמִּלּוֹא. | But Pharaoh's daughter came up out of the city of David unto her house which had built for her; then did he build Millo. | וְיֵהוּא מִלֵּא יָדוֹ בַקֶּשֶׁת, וַיַּךְ אֶת-יְהוֹרָם בֵּין זְרֹעָיו, וַיֵּצֵא הַחֵצִי, מִלִּבּוֹ; וַיִּכְרַע, בְּרִכְבּוֹ. | And Jehu drew his bow with his full strength, and smote Joram between his arms, and the arrow went out at his heart, and he sunk down in his chariot.

text_he: והעלה שלמה שלש פעמים בשנה עלות ושלמים על-המזבח אשר בנה ליהוה והקטיר אתו אשר לפני יהוה ושלם את-הבית | And three times in a year did Solomon offer burnt-offerings and peace-offerings upon the altar which he built unto the LORD offering thereby upon the altar that was before the LORD So he finished the house | ויאמר אל-בדקר שלשה שא השלכהו בחלקת שדה נבות היזרעאלי כי-זכר אני ואתה את רכבים צמדים אחרי אחאב אביו ויהוה נשא עליו את-המשא הזה | Then said to Bidkar his captain 'Take up and cast him in the portion of the field of Naboth the Jezreelite for remember how that when I and thou rode together after Ahab his father the LORD pronounced this burden against him
text_en: And three times in a year did Solomon offer burnt-offerings and peace-offerings upon the altar which he built unto the LORD, offering thereby, upon the altar that was before the LORD. So he finished the house.
text_pisuk: וְהֶעֱלָה שְׁלֹמֹה שָׁלֹשׁ פְּעָמִים בַּשָּׁנָה עֹלוֹת וּשְׁלָמִים, עַל-הַמִּזְבֵּחַ אֲשֶׁר בָּנָה לַיהוָה, וְהַקְטֵיר אִתּוֹ, אֲשֶׁר לִפְנֵי יְהוָה; וְשִׁלַּם, אֶת-הַבָּיִת. | And three times in a year did Solomon offer burnt-offerings and peace-offerings upon the altar which he built unto the LORD, offering thereby, upon the altar that was before the LORD. So he finished the house. | וַיֹּאמֶר, אֶל-בִּדְקַר שָׁלִשֹׁה, שָׂא הַשְׁלִכֵהוּ, בְּחֶלְקַת שְׂדֵה נָבוֹת הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִי: כִּי-זְכֹר אֲנִי וָאַתָּה, אֵת רֹכְבִים צְמָדִים אַחֲרֵי אַחְאָב אָבִיו, וַיהוָה נָשָׂא עָלָיו, אֶת-הַמַּשָּׂא הַזֶּה. | Then said to Bidkar his captain: 'Take up, and cast him in the portion of the field of Naboth the Jezreelite; for remember how that, when I and thou rode together after Ahab his father, the LORD pronounced this burden against him:

text_he: ואני עשה המלך שלמה בעציון-גבר אשר את-אלות על-שפת ים-סוף--בארץ אדום | And king Solomon made a navy of ships in Ezion-geber which is beside Eloth on the shore of the Red Sea in the land of Edom | אם-לא את-דמי נבות ואת-דמי בניו ראיתי אמש נאם-יהוה ושלמתי לך בחלקה הזאת נאם-יהוה ועתה שא השלכהו בחלקה--כדבר יהוה | Surely I have seen yesterday the blood of Naboth and the blood of his sons saith the LORD and I will requite thee in this plot saith the LORD Now therefore take and cast him into the plot of ground according to the word of the LORD'
text_en: And king Solomon made a navy of ships in Ezion-geber, which is beside Eloth, on the shore of the Red Sea, in the land of Edom.
text_pisuk: וָאֳנִי עָשָׂה הַמֶּלֶךְ שְׁלֹמֹה בְּעֶצְיוֹן-גֶּבֶר אֲשֶׁר אֶת-אֵלוֹת, עַל-שְׂפַת יַם-סוּף--בְּאֶרֶץ אֱדוֹם. | And king Solomon made a navy of ships in Ezion-geber, which is beside Eloth, on the shore of the Red Sea, in the land of Edom. | אִם-לֹא אֶת-דְּמֵי נָבוֹת וְאֶת-דְּמֵי בָנָיו רָאִיתִי אֶמֶשׁ, נְאֻם-יְהוָה, וְשִׁלַּמְתִּי לְךָ בַּחֶלְקָה הַזֹּאת, נְאֻם-יְהוָה; וְעַתָּה, שָׂא הַשְׁלִכֵהוּ בַּחֶלְקָה--כִּדְבַר יְהוָה. | Surely I have seen yesterday the blood of Naboth, and the blood of his sons, saith the LORD; and I will requite thee in this plot, saith the LORD. Now therefore take and cast him into the plot of ground, according to the word of the LORD.'

text_he: וישלח חירם באני את-עבדיו אנשי אניות ידעי הים--עם עבדי שלמה | And Hiram sent in the navy his servants shipmen that had knowledge of the sea with the servants of Solomon | ואחזיה מלך-יהודה ראה וינס דרך בית הגן וירדף אחריו יהוא ויאמר גם-אתו הכהו אל-המרכבה במעלה-גור אשר את-יבלעם וינס מגדו וימת שם | But when Ahaziah the king of Judah saw this he fled by the way of the garden-house And Jehu followed after him and said 'Smite him also in the chariot' at the ascent of Gur which is by Ibleam And he fled to Megiddo and died there
text_en: And Hiram sent in the navy his servants, shipmen that had knowledge of the sea, with the servants of Solomon.
text_pisuk: וַיִּשְׁלַח חִירָם בָּאֳנִי, אֶת-עֲבָדָיו, אַנְשֵׁי אֳנִיּוֹת, יֹדְעֵי הַיָּם--עִם, עַבְדֵי שְׁלֹמֹה. | And Hiram sent in the navy his servants, shipmen that had knowledge of the sea, with the servants of Solomon. | וַאֲחַזְיָה מֶלֶךְ-יְהוּדָה, רָאָה, וַיָּנָס, דֶּרֶךְ בֵּית הַגָּן; וַיִּרְדֹּף אַחֲרָיו יֵהוּא, וַיֹּאמֶר גַּם-אֹתוֹ הַכֻּהוּ אֶל-הַמֶּרְכָּבָה בְּמַעֲלֵה-גוּר אֲשֶׁר אֶת-יִבְלְעָם, וַיָּנָס מְגִדּוֹ, וַיָּמָת שָׁם. | But when Ahaziah the king of Judah saw this, he fled by the way of the garden-house. And Jehu followed after him, and said: 'Smite him also in the chariot'; at the ascent of Gur, which is by Ibleam. And he fled to Megiddo, and died there.

text_he: ויבאו אופירה--ויקחו משם זהב ארבע-מאות ועשרים כר ויבאו אל-המלך שלמה | And they came to Ophir and fetched from thence gold four hundred and twenty talents and brought it to king Solomon | וירכבו אתו עבדיו ירושלמה ויקברו אתו בקברתו עם-אבתיו בעיר דוד | And his servants carried him in a chariot to Jerusalem and buried him in his sepulchre with his fathers in the city of David
text_en: And they came to Ophir, and fetched from thence gold, four hundred and twenty talents, and brought it to king Solomon.
text_pisuk: וַיָּבֹאוּ אוֹפִירָה--וַיִּקְחוּ מִשָּׁם זָהָב, אַרְבַּע-מֵאוֹת וְעֶשְׂרִים כִּכָּר; וַיָּבִאוּ, אֶל-הַמֶּלֶךְ שְׁלֹמֹה. | And they came to Ophir, and fetched from thence gold, four hundred and twenty talents, and brought it to king Solomon. | וַיַּרְכִּבוּ אֹתוֹ עֲבָדָיו, יְרוּשָׁלְָמָה; וַיִּקְבְּרוּ אֹתוֹ בִקְבֻרָתוֹ עִם-אֲבֹתָיו, בְּעִיר דָּוִד. | And his servants carried him in a chariot to Jerusalem, and buried him in his sepulchre with his fathers in the city of David.

text_he: ומלכת-שבא שמעת את-שמע שלמה--לשם יהוה ותבא לנסתו בחידות | And when the queen of Sheba heard of the fame of Solomon because of the name of the LORD she came to prove him with hard questions | ולאחאב שבעים בנים בשמרון ויכתב יהוא ספרים וישלח שמרון אל-שרי יזרעאל הזקנים ואל-האמנים אחאב לאמר | Now Ahab had seventy sons in Samaria And Jehu wrote letters and sent to Samaria unto the rulers of Jezreel even the elders and unto them that brought up Ahab saying
text_en: And when the queen of Sheba heard of the fame of Solomon because of the name of the LORD, she came to prove him with hard questions.
text_pisuk: וּמַלְכַּת-שְׁבָא, שֹׁמַעַת אֶת-שֵׁמַע שְׁלֹמֹה--לְשֵׁם יְהוָה; וַתָּבֹא לְנַסֹּתוֹ, בְּחִידוֹת. | And when the queen of Sheba heard of the fame of Solomon because of the name of the LORD, she came to prove him with hard questions. | וּלְאַחְאָב שִׁבְעִים בָּנִים, בְּשֹׁמְרוֹן; וַיִּכְתֹּב יֵהוּא סְפָרִים וַיִּשְׁלַח שֹׁמְרוֹן, אֶל-שָׂרֵי יִזְרְעֶאל הַזְּקֵנִים, וְאֶל-הָאֹמְנִים אַחְאָב, לֵאמֹר. | Now Ahab had seventy sons in Samaria. And Jehu wrote letters, and sent to Samaria, unto the rulers of Jezreel, even the elders, and unto them that brought up Ahab, saying:

text_he: ותבא ירושלמה בחיל כבד מאד גמלים נשאים בשמים וזהב רב-מאד ואבן יקרה ותבא אל-שלמה ותדבר אליו את כל-אשר היה עם-לבה | And she came to Jerusalem with a very great train with camels that bore spices and gold very much and precious stones and when she was come to Solomon she spoke with him of all that was in her heart | ועתה כבא הספר הזה אליכם ואתכם בני אדניכם ואתכם הרכב והסוסים ועיר מבצר והנשק | 'And now as soon as this letter cometh to you seeing your master's sons are with you and there are with you chariots and horses fortified cities also and armour
text_en: And she came to Jerusalem with a very great train, with camels that bore spices and gold very much, and precious stones; and when she was come to Solomon, she spoke with him of all that was in her heart.
text_pisuk: וַתָּבֹא יְרוּשָׁלְַמָה, בְּחַיִל כָּבֵד מְאֹד, גְּמַלִּים נֹשְׂאִים בְּשָׂמִים וְזָהָב רַב-מְאֹד, וְאֶבֶן יְקָרָה; וַתָּבֹא, אֶל-שְׁלֹמֹה, וַתְּדַבֵּר אֵלָיו, אֵת כָּל-אֲשֶׁר הָיָה עִם-לְבָבָהּ. | And she came to Jerusalem with a very great train, with camels that bore spices and gold very much, and precious stones; and when she was come to Solomon, she spoke with him of all that was in her heart. | וְעַתָּה, כְּבֹא הַסֵּפֶר הַזֶּה אֲלֵיכֶם, וְאִתְּכֶם, בְּנֵי אֲדֹנֵיכֶם; וְאִתְּכֶם הָרֶכֶב וְהַסּוּסִים, וְעִיר מִבְצָר וְהַנָּשֶׁק. | 'And now as soon as this letter cometh to you, seeing your master's sons are with you, and there are with you chariots and horses, fortified cities also, and armour;

text_he: ויגד-לה שלמה את-כל-דבריה לא-היה דבר נעלם מן-המלך אשר לא הגיד לה | And Solomon told her all her questions there was not any thing hid from the king which he told her not | וראיתם הטוב והישר מבני אדניכם ושמתם על-כסא אביו והלחמו על-בית אדניכם | look ye out the best and meetest of your master's sons and set him on his father's throne and fight for your master's house'
text_en: And Solomon told her all her questions; there was not any thing hid from the king which he told her not.
text_pisuk: וַיַּגֶּד-לָהּ שְׁלֹמֹה, אֶת-כָּל-דְּבָרֶיהָ: לֹא-הָיָה דָבָר נֶעְלָם מִן-הַמֶּלֶךְ, אֲשֶׁר לֹא הִגִּיד לָהּ. | And Solomon told her all her questions; there was not any thing hid from the king which he told her not. | וּרְאִיתֶם הַטּוֹב וְהַיָּשָׁר, מִבְּנֵי אֲדֹנֵיכֶם, וְשַׂמְתֶּם, עַל-כִּסֵּא אָבִיו; וְהִלָּחֲמוּ, עַל-בֵּית אֲדֹנֵיכֶם. | look ye out the best and meetest of your master's sons, and set him on his father's throne, and fight for your master's house.'

text_he: ותרא מלכת-שבא את כל-חכמת שלמה והבית אשר בנה | And when the queen of Sheba had seen all the wisdom of Solomon and the house that he had built | ויראו מאד מאד ויאמרו הנה שני המלכים לא עמדו לפניו ואיך נעמד אנחנו | But they were exceedingly afraid and said 'Behold the two kings stood not before him how then shall we stand'
text_en: And when the queen of Sheba had seen all the wisdom of Solomon, and the house that he had built,
text_pisuk: וַתֵּרֶא, מַלְכַּת-שְׁבָא, אֵת, כָּל-חָכְמַת שְׁלֹמֹה; וְהַבַּיִת, אֲשֶׁר בָּנָה. | And when the queen of Sheba had seen all the wisdom of Solomon, and the house that he had built, | וַיִּרְאוּ, מְאֹד מְאֹד, וַיֹּאמְרוּ, הִנֵּה שְׁנֵי הַמְּלָכִים לֹא עָמְדוּ לְפָנָיו; וְאֵיךְ, נַעֲמֹד אֲנָחְנוּ. | But they were exceedingly afraid, and said: 'Behold, the two kings stood not before him; how then shall we stand?'

text_he: ומאכל שלחנו ומושב עבדיו ומעמד משרתו ומלבשיהם ומשקיו ועלתו אשר יעלה בית יהוה ולא-היה בה עוד רוח | and the food of his table and the sitting of his servants and the attendance of his ministers and their apparel and his cupbearers and his burnt-offering which he offered in the house of the LORD there was no more spirit in her | וישלח אשר-על-הבית ואשר על-העיר והזקנים והאמנים אל-יהוא לאמר עבדיך אנחנו וכל אשר-תאמר אלינו נעשה לא-נמלך איש הטוב בעיניך עשה | And he that was over the household and he that was over the city the elders also and they that brought up the children sent to Jehu saying 'We are thy servants and will do all that thou shalt bid us we will not make any man king do thou that which is good in thine eyes'
text_en: and the food of his table, and the sitting of his servants, and the attendance of his ministers, and their apparel, and his cupbearers, and his burnt-offering which he offered in the house of the LORD, there was no more spirit in her.
text_pisuk: וּמַאֲכַל שֻׁלְחָנוֹ וּמוֹשַׁב עֲבָדָיו וּמַעֲמַד מְשָׁרְתָו וּמַלְבֻּשֵׁיהֶם, וּמַשְׁקָיו, וְעֹלָתוֹ, אֲשֶׁר יַעֲלֶה בֵּית יְהוָה; וְלֹא-הָיָה בָהּ עוֹד, רוּחַ. | and the food of his table, and the sitting of his servants, and the attendance of his ministers, and their apparel, and his cupbearers, and his burnt-offering which he offered in the house of the LORD, there was no more spirit in her. | וַיִּשְׁלַח אֲשֶׁר-עַל-הַבַּיִת וַאֲשֶׁר עַל-הָעִיר וְהַזְּקֵנִים וְהָאֹמְנִים אֶל-יֵהוּא לֵאמֹר, עֲבָדֶיךָ אֲנַחְנוּ, וְכֹל אֲשֶׁר-תֹּאמַר אֵלֵינוּ, נַעֲשֶׂה: לֹא-נַמְלִךְ אִישׁ, הַטּוֹב בְּעֵינֶיךָ עֲשֵׂה. | And he that was over the household, and he that was over the city, the elders also, and they that brought up the children, sent to Jehu, saying: 'We are thy servants, and will do all that thou shalt bid us; we will not make any man king; do thou that which is good in thine eyes.'

text_he: ותאמר אל-המלך אמת היה הדבר אשר שמעתי בארצי--על-דבריך ועל-חכמתך | And she said to the king 'It was a true report that I heard in mine own land of thine acts and of thy wisdom | ויכתב אליהם ספר שנית לאמר אם-לי אתם ולקלי אתם שמעים קחו את-ראשי אנשי בני-אדניכם ובאו אלי כעת מחר יזרעאלה ובני המלך שבעים איש את-גדלי העיר מגדלים אותם | Then he wrote a letter the second time to them saying 'If ye be on my side and if ye will hearken unto my voice take ye the heads of the men your master's sons and come to me to Jezreel by to-morrow this time' Now the king's sons being seventy persons were with the great men of the city who brought them up
text_en: And she said to the king: 'It was a true report that I heard in mine own land of thine acts, and of thy wisdom.
text_pisuk: וַתֹּאמֶר, אֶל-הַמֶּלֶךְ, אֱמֶת הָיָה הַדָּבָר, אֲשֶׁר שָׁמַעְתִּי בְּאַרְצִי--עַל-דְּבָרֶיךָ, וְעַל-חָכְמָתֶךָ. | And she said to the king: 'It was a true report that I heard in mine own land of thine acts, and of thy wisdom. | וַיִּכְתֹּב אֲלֵיהֶם סֵפֶר שֵׁנִית לֵאמֹר, אִם-לִי אַתֶּם וּלְקֹלִי אַתֶּם שֹׁמְעִים קְחוּ אֶת-רָאשֵׁי אַנְשֵׁי בְנֵי-אֲדֹנֵיכֶם, וּבֹאוּ אֵלַי כָּעֵת מָחָר, יִזְרְעֶאלָה; וּבְנֵי הַמֶּלֶךְ שִׁבְעִים אִישׁ, אֶת-גְּדֹלֵי הָעִיר מְגַדְּלִים אוֹתָם. | Then he wrote a letter the second time to them, saying: 'If ye be on my side, and if ye will hearken unto my voice, take ye the heads of the men your master's sons, and come to me to Jezreel by to-morrow this time.' Now the king's sons, being seventy persons, were with the great men of the city, who brought them up.

text_he: ולא-האמנתי לדברים עד אשר-באתי ותראינה עיני והנה לא-הגד-לי החצי הוספת חכמה וטוב אל-השמועה אשר שמעתי | Howbeit I believed not the words until I came and mine eyes had seen it and behold the half was not told me thou hast wisdom and prosperity exceeding the fame which I heard | ויהי כבא הספר אליהם ויקחו את-בני המלך וישחטו שבעים איש וישימו את-ראשיהם בדודים וישלחו אליו יזרעאלה | And it came to pass when the letter came to them that they took the king's sons and slew them even seventy persons and put their heads in baskets and sent them unto him to Jezreel
text_en: Howbeit I believed not the words, until I came, and mine eyes had seen it; and, behold, the half was not told me; thou hast wisdom and prosperity exceeding the fame which I heard.
text_pisuk: וְלֹא-הֶאֱמַנְתִּי לַדְּבָרִים, עַד אֲשֶׁר-בָּאתִי וַתִּרְאֶינָה עֵינַי, וְהִנֵּה לֹא-הֻגַּד-לִי, הַחֵצִי: הוֹסַפְתָּ חָכְמָה וָטוֹב, אֶל-הַשְּׁמוּעָה אֲשֶׁר שָׁמָעְתִּי. | Howbeit I believed not the words, until I came, and mine eyes had seen it; and, behold, the half was not told me; thou hast wisdom and prosperity exceeding the fame which I heard. | וַיְהִי, כְּבֹא הַסֵּפֶר אֲלֵיהֶם, וַיִּקְחוּ אֶת-בְּנֵי הַמֶּלֶךְ, וַיִּשְׁחֲטוּ שִׁבְעִים אִישׁ; וַיָּשִׂימוּ אֶת-רָאשֵׁיהֶם בַּדּוּדִים, וַיִּשְׁלְחוּ אֵלָיו יִזְרְעֶאלָה. | And it came to pass, when the letter came to them, that they took the king's sons, and slew them, even seventy persons, and put their heads in baskets, and sent them unto him to Jezreel.

text_he: אשרי אנשיך אשרי עבדיך אלה העמדים לפניך תמיד השמעים את-חכמתך | Happy are thy men happy are these thy servants that stand continually before thee and that hear thy wisdom | ויבא המלאך ויגד-לו לאמר הביאו ראשי בני-המלך ויאמר שימו אתם שני צברים פתח השער--עד-הבקר | And there came a messenger and told him saying 'They have brought the heads of the king's sons' And he said 'Lay ye them in two heaps at the entrance of the gate until the morning'
text_en: Happy are thy men, happy are these thy servants, that stand continually before thee, and that hear thy wisdom.
text_pisuk: אַשְׁרֵי אֲנָשֶׁיךָ, אַשְׁרֵי עֲבָדֶיךָ אֵלֶּה, הָעֹמְדִים לְפָנֶיךָ תָּמִיד, הַשֹּׁמְעִים אֶת-חָכְמָתֶךָ. | Happy are thy men, happy are these thy servants, that stand continually before thee, and that hear thy wisdom. | וַיָּבֹא הַמַּלְאָךְ וַיַּגֶּד-לוֹ לֵאמֹר, הֵבִיאוּ רָאשֵׁי בְנֵי-הַמֶּלֶךְ; וַיֹּאמֶר, שִׂימוּ אֹתָם שְׁנֵי צִבֻּרִים פֶּתַח הַשַּׁעַר--עַד-הַבֹּקֶר. | And there came a messenger, and told him, saying: 'They have brought the heads of the king's sons.' And he said: 'Lay ye them in two heaps at the entrance of the gate until the morning.'

text_he: יהי יהוה אלהיך ברוך אשר חפץ בך לתך על-כסא ישראל--באהבת יהוה את-ישראל לעלם וישימך למלך לעשות משפט וצדקה | Blessed be the LORD thy God who delighted in thee to set thee on the throne of Israel because the LORD loved Israel for ever therefore made He thee king to do justice and righteousness' | ויהי בקר ויצא ויעמד ויאמר אל-כל-העם צדקים אתם הנה אני קשרתי על-אדני ואהרגהו ומי הכה את-כל-אלה | And it came to pass in the morning that he went out and stood and said to all the people 'Ye are righteous behold I conspired against my master and slew him but who smote all these
text_en: Blessed be the LORD thy God, who delighted in thee, to set thee on the throne of Israel; because the LORD loved Israel for ever, therefore made He thee king, to do justice and righteousness.'
text_pisuk: יְהִי יְהוָה אֱלֹהֶיךָ, בָּרוּךְ, אֲשֶׁר חָפֵץ בְּךָ, לְתִתְּךָ עַל-כִּסֵּא יִשְׂרָאֵל--בְּאַהֲבַת יְהוָה אֶת-יִשְׂרָאֵל, לְעֹלָם, וַיְשִׂימְךָ לְמֶלֶךְ, לַעֲשׂוֹת מִשְׁפָּט וּצְדָקָה. | Blessed be the LORD thy God, who delighted in thee, to set thee on the throne of Israel; because the LORD loved Israel for ever, therefore made He thee king, to do justice and righteousness.' | וַיְהִי בַבֹּקֶר, וַיֵּצֵא וַיַּעֲמֹד, וַיֹּאמֶר אֶל-כָּל-הָעָם, צַדִּקִים אַתֶּם; הִנֵּה אֲנִי קָשַׁרְתִּי עַל-אֲדֹנִי, וָאֶהְרְגֵהוּ, וּמִי הִכָּה, אֶת-כָּל-אֵלֶּה. | And it came to pass in the morning, that he went out, and stood, and said to all the people: 'Ye are righteous; behold, I conspired against my master, and slew him; but who smote all these?

text_he: ותן למלך מאה ועשרים כר זהב ובשמים הרבה מאד--ואבן יקרה לא בא כבשם הוא עוד לרב אשר-נתנה מלכת-שבא למלך שלמה | And she gave the king a hundred and twenty talents of gold and of spices very great store and precious stones there came no more such abundance of spices as these which the queen of Sheba gave to king Solomon | דעו אפוא כי לא יפל מדבר יהוה ארצה אשר-דבר יהוה על-בית אחאב ויהוה עשה--את אשר דבר ביד עבדו אליהו | Know now that there shall fall unto the earth nothing of the word of the LORD which the LORD spoke concerning the house of Ahab for the LORD hath done that which He spoke by His servant Elijah'
text_en: And she gave the king a hundred and twenty talents of gold, and of spices very great store, and precious stones; there came no more such abundance of spices as these which the queen of Sheba gave to king Solomon.
text_pisuk: וַתִּתֵּן לַמֶּלֶךְ מֵאָה וְעֶשְׂרִים כִּכַּר זָהָב, וּבְשָׂמִים הַרְבֵּה מְאֹד--וְאֶבֶן יְקָרָה; לֹא בָא כַבֹּשֶׂם הַהוּא עוֹד לָרֹב, אֲשֶׁר-נָתְנָה מַלְכַּת-שְׁבָא לַמֶּלֶךְ שְׁלֹמֹה. | And she gave the king a hundred and twenty talents of gold, and of spices very great store, and precious stones; there came no more such abundance of spices as these which the queen of Sheba gave to king Solomon. | דְּעוּ אֵפוֹא, כִּי לֹא יִפֹּל מִדְּבַר יְהוָה אַרְצָה, אֲשֶׁר-דִּבֶּר יְהוָה, עַל-בֵּית אַחְאָב; וַיהוָה עָשָׂה--אֵת אֲשֶׁר דִּבֶּר, בְּיַד עַבְדּוֹ אֵלִיָּהוּ. | Know now that there shall fall unto the earth nothing of the word of the LORD, which the LORD spoke concerning the house of Ahab; for the LORD hath done that which He spoke by His servant Elijah.'

text_he: וגם אני חירם אשר-נשא זהב מאופיר הביא מאפיר עצי אלמגים הרבה מאד--ואבן יקרה | And the navy also of Hiram that brought gold from Ophir brought in from Ophir great plenty of sandal-wood and precious stones | ויך יהוא את כל-הנשארים לבית-אחאב ביזרעאל וכל-גדליו ומידעיו וכהניו--עד-בלתי השאיר-לו שריד | So Jehu smote all that remained of the house of Ahab in Jezreel and all his great men and his familiar friends and his priests until there was left him none remaining
text_en: And the navy also of Hiram, that brought gold from Ophir, brought in from Ophir great plenty of sandal-wood and precious stones.
text_pisuk: וְגַם אֳנִי חִירָם, אֲשֶׁר-נָשָׂא זָהָב מֵאוֹפִיר: הֵבִיא מֵאֹפִיר עֲצֵי אַלְמֻגִּים, הַרְבֵּה מְאֹד--וְאֶבֶן יְקָרָה. | And the navy also of Hiram, that brought gold from Ophir, brought in from Ophir great plenty of sandal-wood and precious stones. | וַיַּךְ יֵהוּא, אֵת כָּל-הַנִּשְׁאָרִים לְבֵית-אַחְאָב בְּיִזְרְעֶאל, וְכָל-גְּדֹלָיו, וּמְיֻדָּעָיו וְכֹהֲנָיו--עַד-בִּלְתִּי הִשְׁאִיר-לוֹ, שָׂרִיד. | So Jehu smote all that remained of the house of Ahab in Jezreel, and all his great men, and his familiar friends, and his priests, until there was left him none remaining.

text_he: ויעש המלך את-עצי האלמגים מסעד לבית-יהוה ולבית המלך וכנרות ונבלים לשרים לא בא-כן עצי אלמגים ולא נראה עד היום הזה | And the king made of the sandal-wood pillars for the house of the LORD and for the king's house harps also and psalteries for the singers there came no such sandal-wood nor was seen unto this day | ויקם ויבא וילך שמרון--הוא בית-עקד הרעים בדרך | And he arose and departed and went to Samaria And as he was at the shearing-house of the shepherds in the way
text_en: And the king made of the sandal-wood pillars for the house of the LORD, and for the king's house, harps also and psalteries for the singers; there came no such sandal-wood, nor was seen, unto this day.
text_pisuk: וַיַּעַשׂ הַמֶּלֶךְ אֶת-עֲצֵי הָאַלְמֻגִּים מִסְעָד לְבֵית-יְהוָה, וּלְבֵית הַמֶּלֶךְ, וְכִנֹּרוֹת וּנְבָלִים, לַשָּׁרִים; לֹא בָא-כֵן עֲצֵי אַלְמֻגִּים, וְלֹא נִרְאָה, עַד, הַיּוֹם הַזֶּה. | And the king made of the sandal-wood pillars for the house of the LORD, and for the king's house, harps also and psalteries for the singers; there came no such sandal-wood, nor was seen, unto this day. | וַיָּקָם, וַיָּבֹא, וַיֵּלֶךְ, שֹׁמְרוֹן--הוּא בֵּית-עֵקֶד הָרֹעִים, בַּדָּרֶךְ. | And he arose and departed, and went to Samaria. And as he was at the shearing-house of the shepherds in the way,

text_he: והמלך שלמה נתן למלכת-שבא את-כל-חפצה אשר שאלה מלבד אשר נתן-לה כיד המלך שלמה ותפן ותלך לארצה היא ועבדיה | And king Solomon gave to the queen of Sheba all her desire whatsoever she asked beside that which Solomon gave her of his royal bounty So she turned and went to her own land she and her servants | ויהוא מצא את-אחי אחזיהו מלך-יהודה ויאמר מי אתם ויאמרו אחי אחזיהו אנחנו ונרד לשלום בני-המלך ובני הגבירה | Jehu met with the brethren of Ahaziah king of Judah and said 'Who are ye' And they answered 'We are the brethren of Ahaziah and we go down to salute the children of the king and the children of the queen'
text_en: And king Solomon gave to the queen of Sheba all her desire, whatsoever she asked, beside that which Solomon gave her of his royal bounty. So she turned, and went to her own land, she and her servants.
text_pisuk: וְהַמֶּלֶךְ שְׁלֹמֹה נָתַן לְמַלְכַּת-שְׁבָא, אֶת-כָּל-חֶפְצָהּ אֲשֶׁר שָׁאָלָה, מִלְּבַד אֲשֶׁר נָתַן-לָהּ, כְּיַד הַמֶּלֶךְ שְׁלֹמֹה; וַתֵּפֶן וַתֵּלֶךְ לְאַרְצָהּ, הִיא וַעֲבָדֶיהָ. | And king Solomon gave to the queen of Sheba all her desire, whatsoever she asked, beside that which Solomon gave her of his royal bounty. So she turned, and went to her own land, she and her servants. | וְיֵהוּא, מָצָא אֶת-אֲחֵי אֲחַזְיָהוּ מֶלֶךְ-יְהוּדָה, וַיֹּאמֶר, מִי אַתֶּם; וַיֹּאמְרוּ, אֲחֵי אֲחַזְיָהוּ אֲנַחְנוּ, וַנֵּרֶד לִשְׁלוֹם בְּנֵי-הַמֶּלֶךְ, וּבְנֵי הַגְּבִירָה. | Jehu met with the brethren of Ahaziah king of Judah, and said: 'Who are ye?' And they answered: 'We are the brethren of Ahaziah; and we go down to salute the children of the king and the children of the queen.'

text_he: ויהי משקל הזהב אשר-בא לשלמה בשנה אחת--ש מאות שים וש כר זהב | Now the weight of gold that came to Solomon in one year was six hundred threescore and six talents of gold | ויאמר תפשום חים ויתפשום חים וישחטום אל-בור בית-עקד ארבעים ושנים איש ולא-השאיר איש מהם | And he said 'Take them alive' And they took them alive and slew them at the pit of the shearing-house even two and forty men neither left he any of them{S}
text_en: Now the weight of gold that came to Solomon in one year was six hundred threescore and six talents of gold,
text_pisuk: וַיְהִי מִשְׁקַל הַזָּהָב, אֲשֶׁר-בָּא לִשְׁלֹמֹה בְּשָׁנָה אֶחָת--שֵׁשׁ מֵאוֹת שִׁשִּׁים וָשֵׁשׁ, כִּכַּר זָהָב. | Now the weight of gold that came to Solomon in one year was six hundred threescore and six talents of gold, | וַיֹּאמֶר תִּפְשׂוּם חַיִּים, וַיִּתְפְּשׂוּם חַיִּים; וַיִּשְׁחָטוּם אֶל-בּוֹר בֵּית-עֵקֶד, אַרְבָּעִים וּשְׁנַיִם אִישׁ, וְלֹא-הִשְׁאִיר אִישׁ, מֵהֶם. | And he said: 'Take them alive.' And they took them alive, and slew them at the pit of the shearing-house, even two and forty men; neither left he any of them.{S}

text_he: לבד מאנשי התרים ומסחר הרכלים וכל-מלכי הערב ופחות הארץ | beside that which came of the merchants and of the traffic of the traders and of all the kings of the mingled people and of the governors of the country | וילך משם וימצא את-יהונדב בן-רכב לקראתו ויברכהו ויאמר אליו היש את-לבך ישר כאשר לבי עם-לבך ויאמר יהונדב יש ויש תנה את-ידך ויתן ידו ויעלהו אליו אל-המרכבה | And when he was departed thence he lighted on Jehonadab the son of Rechab coming to meet him and he saluted him and said to him 'Is thy heart right as my heart is with thy heart' And Jehonadab answered 'It is' 'If it be give me thy hand' And he gave him his hand and he took him up to him into the chariot
text_en: beside that which came of the merchants, and of the traffic of the traders, and of all the kings of the mingled people and of the governors of the country.
text_pisuk: לְבַד מֵאַנְשֵׁי הַתָּרִים, וּמִסְחַר הָרֹכְלִים, וְכָל-מַלְכֵי הָעֶרֶב, וּפַחוֹת הָאָרֶץ. | beside that which came of the merchants, and of the traffic of the traders, and of all the kings of the mingled people and of the governors of the country. | וַיֵּלֶךְ מִשָּׁם וַיִּמְצָא אֶת-יְהוֹנָדָב בֶּן-רֵכָב לִקְרָאתוֹ וַיְבָרְכֵהוּ, וַיֹּאמֶר אֵלָיו הֲיֵשׁ אֶת-לְבָבְךָ יָשָׁר כַּאֲשֶׁר לְבָבִי עִם-לְבָבֶךָ, וַיֹּאמֶר יְהוֹנָדָב יֵשׁ וָיֵשׁ, תְּנָה אֶת-יָדֶךָ; וַיִּתֵּן יָדוֹ, וַיַּעֲלֵהוּ אֵלָיו אֶל-הַמֶּרְכָּבָה. | And when he was departed thence, he lighted on Jehonadab the son of Rechab coming to meet him; and he saluted him, and said to him: 'Is thy heart right, as my heart is with thy heart?' And Jehonadab answered: 'It is.' 'If it be, give me thy hand.' And he gave him his hand; and he took him up to him into the chariot.

text_he: ויעש המלך שלמה מאתים צנה זהב שחוט ש-מאות זהב יעלה על-הצנה האחת | And king Solomon made two hundred targets of beaten gold six hundred shekels of gold went to one target | ויאמר לכה אתי וראה בקנאתי ליהוה וירכבו אתו ברכבו | And he said 'Come with me and see my zeal for the LORD' So they made him ride in his chariot
text_en: And king Solomon made two hundred targets of beaten gold: six hundred shekels of gold went to one target.
text_pisuk: וַיַּעַשׂ הַמֶּלֶךְ שְׁלֹמֹה מָאתַיִם צִנָּה, זָהָב שָׁחוּט; שֵׁשׁ-מֵאוֹת זָהָב, יַעֲלֶה עַל-הַצִּנָּה הָאֶחָת. | And king Solomon made two hundred targets of beaten gold: six hundred shekels of gold went to one target. | וַיֹּאמֶר לְכָה אִתִּי, וּרְאֵה בְּקִנְאָתִי לַיהוָה; וַיַּרְכִּבוּ אֹתוֹ, בְּרִכְבּוֹ. | And he said: 'Come with me, and see my zeal for the LORD.' So they made him ride in his chariot.

text_he: ושלש-מאות מגנים זהב שחוט--שלשת מנים זהב יעלה על-המגן האחת ויתנם המלך בית יער הלבנון | And he made three hundred shields of beaten gold three pounds of gold went to one shield and the king put them in the house of the forest of Lebanon | ויבא שמרון ויך את-כל-הנשארים לאחאב בשמרון עד-השמדו--כדבר יהוה אשר דבר אל-אליהו | And when he came to Samaria he smote all that remained unto Ahab in Samaria till he had destroyed him according to the word of the LORD which He spoke to Elijah
text_en: And he made three hundred shields of beaten gold: three pounds of gold went to one shield; and the king put them in the house of the forest of Lebanon.
text_pisuk: וּשְׁלֹשׁ-מֵאוֹת מָגִנִּים, זָהָב שָׁחוּט--שְׁלֹשֶׁת מָנִים זָהָב, יַעֲלֶה עַל-הַמָּגֵן הָאֶחָת; וַיִּתְּנֵם הַמֶּלֶךְ, בֵּית יַעַר הַלְּבָנוֹן. | And he made three hundred shields of beaten gold: three pounds of gold went to one shield; and the king put them in the house of the forest of Lebanon. | וַיָּבֹא, שֹׁמְרוֹן, וַיַּךְ אֶת-כָּל-הַנִּשְׁאָרִים לְאַחְאָב בְּשֹׁמְרוֹן, עַד-הִשְׁמִדוֹ--כִּדְבַר יְהוָה, אֲשֶׁר דִּבֶּר אֶל-אֵלִיָּהוּ. | And when he came to Samaria, he smote all that remained unto Ahab in Samaria, till he had destroyed him, according to the word of the LORD, which He spoke to Elijah.

text_he: ויעש המלך כסא-שן גדול ויצפהו זהב מופז | Moreover the king made a great throne of ivory and overlaid it with the finest gold | ויקבץ יהוא את-כל-העם ויאמר אלהם אחאב עבד את-הבעל מעט יהוא יעבדנו הרבה | And Jehu gathered all the people together and said unto them 'Ahab served Baal a little but Jehu will serve him much
text_en: Moreover the king made a great throne of ivory, and overlaid it with the finest gold.
text_pisuk: וַיַּעַשׂ הַמֶּלֶךְ כִּסֵּא-שֵׁן, גָּדוֹל; וַיְצַפֵּהוּ, זָהָב מוּפָז. | Moreover the king made a great throne of ivory, and overlaid it with the finest gold. | וַיִּקְבֹּץ יֵהוּא, אֶת-כָּל-הָעָם, וַיֹּאמֶר אֲלֵהֶם, אַחְאָב עָבַד אֶת-הַבַּעַל מְעָט; יֵהוּא, יַעַבְדֶנּוּ הַרְבֵּה. | And Jehu gathered all the people together, and said unto them: 'Ahab served Baal a little; but Jehu will serve him much.

text_he: ש מעלות לכסה וראש-עגל לכסה מאחריו וידת מזה ומזה אל-מקום השבת ושנים אריות עמדים אצל הידות | There were six steps to the throne and the top of the throne was round behind and there were arms on either side by the place of the seat and two lions standing beside the arms | ועתה כל-נביאי הבעל כל-עבדיו וכל-כהניו קראו אלי איש אל-יפקד כי זבח גדול לי לבעל--כל אשר-יפקד לא יחיה ויהוא עשה בעקבה למען האביד את-עבדי הבעל | Now therefore call unto me all the prophets of Baal all his worshippers and all his priests let none be wanting for I have a great sacrifice to do to Baal whosoever shall be wanting he shall not live' But Jehu did it in subtlety to the intent that he might destroy the worshippers of Baal
text_en: There were six steps to the throne, and the top of the throne was round behind; and there were arms on either side by the place of the seat, and two lions standing beside the arms.
text_pisuk: שֵׁשׁ מַעֲלוֹת לַכִּסֵּה, וְרֹאשׁ-עָגֹל לַכִּסֵּה מֵאַחֲרָיו, וְיָדֹת מִזֶּה וּמִזֶּה, אֶל-מְקוֹם הַשָּׁבֶת; וּשְׁנַיִם אֲרָיוֹת, עֹמְדִים אֵצֶל הַיָּדוֹת. | There were six steps to the throne, and the top of the throne was round behind; and there were arms on either side by the place of the seat, and two lions standing beside the arms. | וְעַתָּה כָל-נְבִיאֵי הַבַּעַל כָּל-עֹבְדָיו וְכָל-כֹּהֲנָיו קִרְאוּ אֵלַי אִישׁ אַל-יִפָּקֵד, כִּי זֶבַח גָּדוֹל לִי לַבַּעַל--כֹּל אֲשֶׁר-יִפָּקֵד, לֹא יִחְיֶה; וְיֵהוּא עָשָׂה בְעָקְבָּה, לְמַעַן הַאֲבִיד אֶת-עֹבְדֵי הַבָּעַל. | Now therefore call unto me all the prophets of Baal, all his worshippers, and all his priests, let none be wanting; for I have a great sacrifice to do to Baal; whosoever shall be wanting, he shall not live.' But Jehu did it in subtlety, to the intent that he might destroy the worshippers of Baal.

text_he: ושנים עשר ארים עמדים שם על-ש המעלות--מזה ומזה לא-נעשה כן לכל-מלכות | And twelve lions stood there on the one side and on the other upon the six steps there was not the like made in any kingdom | ויאמר יהוא קדשו עצרה לבעל--ויקראו | And Jehu said 'Sanctify a solemn assembly for Baal' And they proclaimed it
text_en: And twelve lions stood there on the one side and on the other upon the six steps; there was not the like made in any kingdom.
text_pisuk: וּשְׁנֵים עָשָׂר אֲרָיִים, עֹמְדִים שָׁם עַל-שֵׁשׁ הַמַּעֲלוֹת--מִזֶּה וּמִזֶּה; לֹא-נַעֲשָׂה כֵן, לְכָל-מַמְלָכוֹת. | And twelve lions stood there on the one side and on the other upon the six steps; there was not the like made in any kingdom. | וַיֹּאמֶר יֵהוּא, קַדְּשׁוּ עֲצָרָה לַבַּעַל--וַיִּקְרָאוּ. | And Jehu said: 'Sanctify a solemn assembly for Baal.' And they proclaimed it.

text_he: וכל כלי משקה המלך שלמה זהב וכל כלי בית-יער הלבנון זהב סגור אין כסף לא נחשב בימי שלמה--למאומה | And all king Solomon's drinking-vessels were of gold and all the vessels of the house of the forest of Lebanon were of pure gold none were of silver it was nothing accounted of in the days of Solomon | וישלח יהוא בכל-ישראל ויבאו כל-עבדי הבעל ולא-נשאר איש אשר לא-בא ויבאו בית הבעל וימלא בית-הבעל פה לפה | And Jehu sent through all Israel and all the worshippers of Baal came so that there was not a man left that came not And they came into the house of Baal and the house of Baal was filled from one end to another
text_en: And all king Solomon's drinking-vessels were of gold, and all the vessels of the house of the forest of Lebanon were of pure gold; none were of silver; it was nothing accounted of in the days of Solomon.
text_pisuk: וְכֹל כְּלֵי מַשְׁקֵה הַמֶּלֶךְ שְׁלֹמֹה, זָהָב, וְכֹל כְּלֵי בֵּית-יַעַר הַלְּבָנוֹן, זָהָב סָגוּר: אֵין כֶּסֶף, לֹא נֶחְשָׁב בִּימֵי שְׁלֹמֹה--לִמְאוּמָה. | And all king Solomon's drinking-vessels were of gold, and all the vessels of the house of the forest of Lebanon were of pure gold; none were of silver; it was nothing accounted of in the days of Solomon. | וַיִּשְׁלַח יֵהוּא, בְּכָל-יִשְׂרָאֵל, וַיָּבֹאוּ כָּל-עֹבְדֵי הַבַּעַל, וְלֹא-נִשְׁאַר אִישׁ אֲשֶׁר לֹא-בָא; וַיָּבֹאוּ בֵּית הַבַּעַל, וַיִּמָּלֵא בֵית-הַבַּעַל פֶּה לָפֶה. | And Jehu sent through all Israel; and all the worshippers of Baal came, so that there was not a man left that came not. And they came into the house of Baal; and the house of Baal was filled from one end to another.

text_he: כי אני תרשיש למלך בים עם אני חירם אחת לשלש שנים תבוא אני תרשיש נשאת זהב וכסף שנהבים וקפים ותכים | For the king had at sea a navy of Tarshish with the navy of Hiram once every three years came the navy of Tarshish bringing gold and silver ivory and apes and peacocks | ויאמר לאשר על-המלתחה הוצא לבוש לכל עבדי הבעל ויצא להם המלבוש | And he said unto him that was over the vestry 'Bring forth vestments for all the worshippers of Baal' And he brought them forth vestments
text_en: For the king had at sea a navy of Tarshish with the navy of Hiram; once every three years came the navy of Tarshish, bringing gold, and silver, ivory, and apes, and peacocks.
text_pisuk: כִּי אֳנִי תַרְשִׁישׁ לַמֶּלֶךְ בַּיָּם, עִם אֳנִי חִירָם; אַחַת לְשָׁלֹשׁ שָׁנִים תָּבוֹא אֳנִי תַרְשִׁישׁ, נֹשְׂאֵת זָהָב וָכֶסֶף, שֶׁנְהַבִּים וְקֹפִים, וְתֻכִּיִּים. | For the king had at sea a navy of Tarshish with the navy of Hiram; once every three years came the navy of Tarshish, bringing gold, and silver, ivory, and apes, and peacocks. | וַיֹּאמֶר, לַאֲשֶׁר עַל-הַמֶּלְתָּחָה, הוֹצֵא לְבוּשׁ, לְכֹל עֹבְדֵי הַבָּעַל; וַיֹּצֵא לָהֶם, הַמַּלְבּוּשׁ. | And he said unto him that was over the vestry: 'Bring forth vestments for all the worshippers of Baal.' And he brought them forth vestments.

text_he: ויגדל המלך שלמה מכל מלכי הארץ--לעשר ולחכמה | So king Solomon exceeded all the kings of the earth in riches and in wisdom | ויבא יהוא ויהונדב בן-רכב בית הבעל ויאמר לעבדי הבעל חפשו וראו פן-יש-פה עמכם מעבדי יהוה--כי אם-עבדי הבעל לבדם | And Jehu went and Jehonadab the son of Rechab into the house of Baal and he said unto the worshippers of Baal 'Search and look that there be here with you none of the servants of the LORD but the worshippers of Baal only'
text_en: So king Solomon exceeded all the kings of the earth in riches and in wisdom.
text_pisuk: וַיִּגְדַּל הַמֶּלֶךְ שְׁלֹמֹה, מִכֹּל מַלְכֵי הָאָרֶץ--לְעֹשֶׁר, וּלְחָכְמָה. | So king Solomon exceeded all the kings of the earth in riches and in wisdom. | וַיָּבֹא יֵהוּא וִיהוֹנָדָב בֶּן-רֵכָב, בֵּית הַבָּעַל; וַיֹּאמֶר לְעֹבְדֵי הַבַּעַל, חַפְּשׂוּ וּרְאוּ פֶּן-יֶשׁ-פֹּה עִמָּכֶם מֵעַבְדֵי יְהוָה--כִּי אִם-עֹבְדֵי הַבַּעַל, לְבַדָּם. | And Jehu went, and Jehonadab the son of Rechab, into the house of Baal; and he said unto the worshippers of Baal: 'Search, and look that there be here with you none of the servants of the LORD, but the worshippers of Baal only.'

text_he: וכל-הארץ--מבקשים את-פני שלמה לשמע את-חכמתו אשר-נתן אלהים בלבו | And all the earth sought the presence of Solomon to hear his wisdom which God had put in his heart | ויבאו לעשות זבחים ועלות ויהוא שם-לו בחוץ שמנים איש ויאמר האיש אשר-ימלט מן-האנשים אשר אני מביא על-ידיכם נפשו תחת נפשו | And they went in to offer sacrifices and burnt-offerings Now Jehu had appointed him fourscore men without and said 'If any of the men whom I bring into your hands escape his life shall be for the life of him'
text_en: And all the earth sought the presence of Solomon, to hear his wisdom, which God had put in his heart.
text_pisuk: וְכָל-הָאָרֶץ--מְבַקְשִׁים, אֶת-פְּנֵי שְׁלֹמֹה: לִשְׁמֹעַ, אֶת-חָכְמָתוֹ, אֲשֶׁר-נָתַן אֱלֹהִים, בְּלִבּוֹ. | And all the earth sought the presence of Solomon, to hear his wisdom, which God had put in his heart. | וַיָּבֹאוּ, לַעֲשׂוֹת זְבָחִים וְעֹלוֹת; וְיֵהוּא שָׂם-לוֹ בַחוּץ, שְׁמֹנִים אִישׁ, וַיֹּאמֶר הָאִישׁ אֲשֶׁר-יִמָּלֵט מִן-הָאֲנָשִׁים אֲשֶׁר אֲנִי מֵבִיא עַל-יְדֵיכֶם, נַפְשׁוֹ תַּחַת נַפְשׁוֹ. | And they went in to offer sacrifices and burnt-offerings. Now Jehu had appointed him fourscore men without, and said: 'If any of the men whom I bring into your hands escape, his life shall be for the life of him.'

text_he: והמה מבאים איש מנחתו כלי כסף וכלי זהב ושלמות ונשק ובשמים סוסים ופרדים--דבר-שנה בשנה | And they brought every man his present vessels of silver and vessels of gold and raiment and armour and spices horses and mules a rate year by year{S} | ויהי כלתו לעשות העלה ויאמר יהוא לרצים ולשלשים באו הכום איש אל-יצא ויכום לפי-חרב וישלכו הרצים והשלשים וילכו עד-עיר בית-הבעל | And it came to pass as soon as he had made an end of offering the burnt-offering that Jehu said to the guard and to the captains 'Go in and slay them let none come forth' And they smote them with the edge of the sword and the guard and the captains cast them out and went to the city of the house of Baal
text_en: And they brought every man his present, vessels of silver, and vessels of gold, and raiment, and armour, and spices, horses, and mules, a rate year by year.{S}
text_pisuk: וְהֵמָּה מְבִאִים אִישׁ מִנְחָתוֹ כְּלֵי כֶסֶף וּכְלֵי זָהָב וּשְׂלָמוֹת, וְנֵשֶׁק וּבְשָׂמִים, סוּסִים, וּפְרָדִים--דְּבַר-שָׁנָה, בְּשָׁנָה. | And they brought every man his present, vessels of silver, and vessels of gold, and raiment, and armour, and spices, horses, and mules, a rate year by year.{S} | וַיְהִי כְּכַלֹּתוֹ לַעֲשׂוֹת הָעֹלָה, וַיֹּאמֶר יֵהוּא לָרָצִים וְלַשָּׁלִשִׁים בֹּאוּ הַכּוּם אִישׁ אַל-יֵצֵא, וַיַּכּוּם, לְפִי-חָרֶב; וַיַּשְׁלִכוּ, הָרָצִים וְהַשָּׁלִשִׁים, וַיֵּלְכוּ, עַד-עִיר בֵּית-הַבָּעַל. | And it came to pass, as soon as he had made an end of offering the burnt-offering, that Jehu said to the guard and to the captains: 'Go in, and slay them; let none come forth.' And they smote them with the edge of the sword; and the guard and the captains cast them out, and went to the city of the house of Baal.

text_he: ויאסף שלמה רכב ופרשים ויהי-לו אלף וארבע-מאות רכב ושנים-עשר אלף פרשים וינחם בערי הרכב ועם-המלך בירושלם | And Solomon gathered together chariots and horsemen and he had a thousand and four hundred chariots and twelve thousand horsemen that he bestowed in the chariot cities and with the king at Jerusalem | ויצאו את-מצבות בית-הבעל וישרפוה | And they brought forth the pillars that were in the house of Baal and burned them
text_en: And Solomon gathered together chariots and horsemen; and he had a thousand and four hundred chariots, and twelve thousand horsemen, that he bestowed in the chariot cities, and with the king at Jerusalem.
text_pisuk: וַיֶּאֱסֹף שְׁלֹמֹה, רֶכֶב וּפָרָשִׁים, וַיְהִי-לוֹ אֶלֶף וְאַרְבַּע-מֵאוֹת רֶכֶב, וּשְׁנֵים-עָשָׂר אֶלֶף פָּרָשִׁים; וַיַּנְחֵם בְּעָרֵי הָרֶכֶב, וְעִם-הַמֶּלֶךְ בִּירוּשָׁלִָם. | And Solomon gathered together chariots and horsemen; and he had a thousand and four hundred chariots, and twelve thousand horsemen, that he bestowed in the chariot cities, and with the king at Jerusalem. | וַיֹּצִאוּ אֶת-מַצְּבוֹת בֵּית-הַבַּעַל, וַיִּשְׂרְפוּהָ. | And they brought forth the pillars that were in the house of Baal, and burned them.

text_he: ויתן המלך את-הכסף בירושלם כאבנים ואת הארזים נתן כשקמים אשר-בשפלה--לרב | And the king made silver to be in Jerusalem as stones and cedars made he to be as the sycamore-trees that are in the Lowland for abundance | ויתצו את מצבת הבעל ויתצו את-בית הבעל וישמהו למחראות (למוצאות) עד-היום | And they broke down the pillar of Baal and broke down the house of Baal and made it a draught-house unto this day
text_en: And the king made silver to be in Jerusalem as stones, and cedars made he to be as the sycamore-trees that are in the Lowland, for abundance.
text_pisuk: וַיִּתֵּן הַמֶּלֶךְ אֶת-הַכֶּסֶף בִּירוּשָׁלִַם, כָּאֲבָנִים; וְאֵת הָאֲרָזִים, נָתַן כַּשִּׁקְמִים אֲשֶׁר-בַּשְּׁפֵלָה--לָרֹב. | And the king made silver to be in Jerusalem as stones, and cedars made he to be as the sycamore-trees that are in the Lowland, for abundance. | וַיִּתְּצוּ, אֵת מַצְּבַת הַבָּעַל; וַיִּתְּצוּ אֶת-בֵּית הַבַּעַל, וַיְשִׂמֻהוּ למחראות (לְמוֹצָאוֹת) עַד-הַיּוֹם. | And they broke down the pillar of Baal, and broke down the house of Baal, and made it a draught-house, unto this day.

text_he: ומוצא הסוסים אשר לשלמה מצרים ומקוה--סחרי המלך יקחו מקוה במחיר | And the horses which Solomon had were brought out of Egypt also out of Keveh the king's merchants buying them of the men of Keveh at a price | וישמד יהוא את-הבעל מישראל | Thus Jehu destroyed Baal out of Israel
text_en: And the horses which Solomon had were brought out of Egypt; also out of Keveh, the king's merchants buying them of the men of Keveh at a price.
text_pisuk: וּמוֹצָא הַסּוּסִים אֲשֶׁר לִשְׁלֹמֹה, מִמִּצְרָיִם; וּמִקְוֵה--סֹחֲרֵי הַמֶּלֶךְ, יִקְחוּ מִקְוֵה בִּמְחִיר. | And the horses which Solomon had were brought out of Egypt; also out of Keveh, the king's merchants buying them of the men of Keveh at a price. | וַיַּשְׁמֵד יֵהוּא אֶת-הַבַּעַל, מִיִּשְׂרָאֵל. | Thus Jehu destroyed Baal out of Israel.

text_he: ותעלה ותצא מרכבה מצרים בש מאות כסף וסוס בחמשים ומאה וכן לכל-מלכי החתים ולמלכי ארם--בידם יצאו | And a chariot came up and went out of Egypt for six hundred shekels of silver and a horse for a hundred and fifty and so for all the kings of the Hittites and for the kings of Aram did they bring them out by their means | רק חטאי ירבעם בן-נבט אשר החטיא את-ישראל--לא-סר יהוא מאחריהם עגלי הזהב אשר בית-אל ואשר בדן | Howbeit from the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat wherewith he made Israel to sin Jehu departed not from after them the golden calves that were in Beth-el and that were in Dan
text_en: And a chariot came up and went out of Egypt for six hundred shekels of silver, and a horse for a hundred and fifty; and so for all the kings of the Hittites, and for the kings of Aram, did they bring them out by their means.
text_pisuk: וַתַּעֲלֶה וַתֵּצֵא מֶרְכָּבָה מִמִּצְרַיִם, בְּשֵׁשׁ מֵאוֹת כֶּסֶף, וְסוּס, בַּחֲמִשִּׁים וּמֵאָה; וְכֵן לְכָל-מַלְכֵי הַחִתִּים, וּלְמַלְכֵי אֲרָם--בְּיָדָם יֹצִאוּ. | And a chariot came up and went out of Egypt for six hundred shekels of silver, and a horse for a hundred and fifty; and so for all the kings of the Hittites, and for the kings of Aram, did they bring them out by their means. | רַק חֲטָאֵי יָרָבְעָם בֶּן-נְבָט, אֲשֶׁר הֶחֱטִיא אֶת-יִשְׂרָאֵל--לֹא-סָר יֵהוּא, מֵאַחֲרֵיהֶם: עֶגְלֵי, הַזָּהָב, אֲשֶׁר בֵּית-אֵל, וַאֲשֶׁר בְּדָן. | Howbeit from the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, wherewith he made Israel to sin, Jehu departed not from after them, the golden calves that were in Beth-el, and that were in Dan.

text_he: והמלך שלמה אהב נשים נכריות רבות--ואת-בת-פרעה מואביות עמניות אדמית צדנית חתית | Now king Solomon loved many foreign women besides the daughter of Pharaoh women of the Moabites Ammonites Edomites Zidonians and Hittites | ועתליה אם אחזיהו וראתה (ראתה) כי מת בנה ותקם ותאבד את כל-זרע המלכה | Now when Athaliah the mother of Ahaziah saw that her son was dead she arose and destroyed all the seed royal
text_en: Now king Solomon loved many foreign women, besides the daughter of Pharaoh, women of the Moabites, Ammonites, Edomites, Zidonians, and Hittites;
text_pisuk: וְהַמֶּלֶךְ שְׁלֹמֹה, אָהַב נָשִׁים נָכְרִיּוֹת רַבּוֹת--וְאֶת-בַּת-פַּרְעֹה: מוֹאֲבִיּוֹת עַמֳּנִיּוֹת אֲדֹמִיֹּת, צֵדְנִיֹּת חִתִּיֹּת. | Now king Solomon loved many foreign women, besides the daughter of Pharaoh, women of the Moabites, Ammonites, Edomites, Zidonians, and Hittites; | וַעֲתַלְיָה אֵם אֲחַזְיָהוּ, וראתה (רָאֲתָה) כִּי מֵת בְּנָהּ; וַתָּקָם, וַתְּאַבֵּד, אֵת, כָּל-זֶרַע הַמַּמְלָכָה. | Now when Athaliah the mother of Ahaziah saw that her son was dead, she arose and destroyed all the seed royal.

text_he: מן-הגוים אשר אמר-יהוה אל-בני ישראל לא-תבאו בהם והם לא-יבאו בכם אכן יטו את-לבכם אחרי אלהיהם--בהם דבק שלמה לאהבה | of the nations concerning which the LORD said unto the children of Israel 'Ye shall not go among them neither shall they come among you for surely they will turn away your heart after their gods' Solomon did cleave unto these in love | ותקח יהושבע בת-המלך-יורם אחות אחזיהו את-יואש בן-אחזיה ותגנב אתו מתוך בני-המלך המותים (המומתים)--אתו ואת-מינקתו בחדר המטות ויסתרו אתו מפני עתליהו ולא הומת | But Jehosheba the daughter of king Joram sister of Ahaziah took Joash the son of Ahaziah and stole him away from among the king's sons that were slain even him and his nurse and put them in the bed-chamber and they hid him from Athaliah so that he was not slain
text_en: of the nations concerning which the LORD said unto the children of Israel: 'Ye shall not go among them, neither shall they come among you; for surely they will turn away your heart after their gods'; Solomon did cleave unto these in love.
text_pisuk: מִן-הַגּוֹיִם, אֲשֶׁר אָמַר-יְהוָה אֶל-בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל לֹא-תָבֹאוּ בָהֶם וְהֵם לֹא-יָבֹאוּ בָכֶם, אָכֵן יַטּוּ אֶת-לְבַבְכֶם, אַחֲרֵי אֱלֹהֵיהֶם--בָּהֶם דָּבַק שְׁלֹמֹה, לְאַהֲבָה. | of the nations concerning which the LORD said unto the children of Israel: 'Ye shall not go among them, neither shall they come among you; for surely they will turn away your heart after their gods'; Solomon did cleave unto these in love. | וַתִּקַּח יְהוֹשֶׁבַע בַּת-הַמֶּלֶךְ-יוֹרָם אֲחוֹת אֲחַזְיָהוּ אֶת-יוֹאָשׁ בֶּן-אֲחַזְיָה, וַתִּגְנֹב אֹתוֹ מִתּוֹךְ בְּנֵי-הַמֶּלֶךְ הממותתים (הַמּוּמָתִים)--אֹתוֹ וְאֶת-מֵינִקְתּוֹ, בַּחֲדַר הַמִּטּוֹת; וַיַּסְתִּרוּ אֹתוֹ מִפְּנֵי עֲתַלְיָהוּ, וְלֹא הוּמָת. | But Jehosheba, the daughter of king Joram, sister of Ahaziah, took Joash the son of Ahaziah, and stole him away from among the king's sons that were slain, even him and his nurse, and put them in the bed-chamber; and they hid him from Athaliah, so that he was not slain.

text_he: ויהי-לו נשים שרות שבע מאות ופלגשים שלש מאות ויטו נשיו את-לבו | And he had seven hundred wives princesses and three hundred concubines and his wives turned away his heart | ויהי אתה בית יהוה מתחבא ש שנים ועתליה מלכת על-הארץ | And he was with her hid in the house of the LORD six years and Athaliah reigned over the land
text_en: And he had seven hundred wives, princesses, and three hundred concubines; and his wives turned away his heart.
text_pisuk: וַיְהִי-לוֹ נָשִׁים, שָׂרוֹת שְׁבַע מֵאוֹת, וּפִלַגְשִׁים, שְׁלֹשׁ מֵאוֹת; וַיַּטּוּ נָשָׁיו, אֶת-לִבּוֹ. | And he had seven hundred wives, princesses, and three hundred concubines; and his wives turned away his heart. | וַיְהִי אִתָּהּ בֵּית יְהוָה, מִתְחַבֵּא שֵׁשׁ שָׁנִים; וַעֲתַלְיָה, מֹלֶכֶת עַל-הָאָרֶץ. | And he was with her hid in the house of the LORD six years; and Athaliah reigned over the land.

text_he: ויהי לעת זקנת שלמה נשיו הטו את-לבו אחרי אלהים אחרים ולא-היה לבו שלם עם-יהוה אלהיו כלב דויד אביו | For it came to pass when Solomon was old that his wives turned away his heart after other gods and his heart was not whole with the LORD his God as was the heart of David his father | ובשנה השביעית שלח יהוידע ויקח את-שרי המאיות (המאות) לכרי ולרצים ויבא אתם אליו בית יהוה ויכרת להם ברית וישבע אתם בית יהוה וירא אתם את-בן-המלך | And in the seventh year Jehoiada sent and fetched the captains over hundreds of the Carites and of the guard and brought them to him into the house of the LORD and he made a covenant with them and took an oath of them in the house of the LORD and showed them the king's son
text_en: For it came to pass, when Solomon was old, that his wives turned away his heart after other gods; and his heart was not whole with the LORD his God, as was the heart of David his father.
text_pisuk: וַיְהִי, לְעֵת זִקְנַת שְׁלֹמֹה, נָשָׁיו הִטּוּ אֶת-לְבָבוֹ, אַחֲרֵי אֱלֹהִים אֲחֵרִים; וְלֹא-הָיָה לְבָבוֹ שָׁלֵם עִם-יְהוָה אֱלֹהָיו, כִּלְבַב דָּוִיד אָבִיו. | For it came to pass, when Solomon was old, that his wives turned away his heart after other gods; and his heart was not whole with the LORD his God, as was the heart of David his father. | וּבַשָּׁנָה הַשְּׁבִיעִית שָׁלַח יְהוֹיָדָע וַיִּקַּח אֶת-שָׂרֵי המאיות (הַמֵּאוֹת), לַכָּרִי וְלָרָצִים, וַיָּבֵא אֹתָם אֵלָיו, בֵּית יְהוָה; וַיִּכְרֹת לָהֶם בְּרִית וַיַּשְׁבַּע אֹתָם, בְּבֵית יְהוָה, וַיַּרְא אֹתָם, אֶת-בֶּן-הַמֶּלֶךְ. | And in the seventh year Jehoiada sent and fetched the captains over hundreds, of the Carites and of the guard, and brought them to him into the house of the LORD; and he made a covenant with them, and took an oath of them in the house of the LORD, and showed them the king's son.

text_he: וילך שלמה--אחרי עשתרת אלהי צדנים ואחרי מלכם שקץ עמנים | For Solomon went after Ashtoreth the goddess of the Zidonians and after Milcom the detestation of the Ammonites | ויצום לאמר זה הדבר אשר תעשון השלשית מכם באי השבת ושמרי משמרת בית המלך | And he commanded them saying 'This is the thing that ye shall do a third part of you that come in on the sabbath and that keep the watch of the king's house--
text_en: For Solomon went after Ashtoreth the goddess of the Zidonians, and after Milcom the detestation of the Ammonites.
text_pisuk: וַיֵּלֶךְ שְׁלֹמֹה--אַחֲרֵי עַשְׁתֹּרֶת, אֱלֹהֵי צִדֹנִים; וְאַחֲרֵי מִלְכֹּם, שִׁקֻּץ עַמֹּנִים. | For Solomon went after Ashtoreth the goddess of the Zidonians, and after Milcom the detestation of the Ammonites. | וַיְצַוֵּם לֵאמֹר, זֶה הַדָּבָר אֲשֶׁר תַּעֲשׂוּן: הַשְּׁלִשִׁית מִכֶּם, בָּאֵי הַשַּׁבָּת, וְשֹׁמְרֵי, מִשְׁמֶרֶת בֵּית הַמֶּלֶךְ. | And he commanded them, saying: 'This is the thing that ye shall do: a third part of you, that come in on the sabbath, and that keep the watch of the king's house--

text_he: ויעש שלמה הרע בעיני יהוה ולא מלא אחרי יהוה כדוד אביו | And Solomon did that which was evil in the sight of the LORD and went not fully after the LORD as did David his father{S} | והשלשית בשער סור והשלשית בשער אחר הרצים ושמרתם את-משמרת הבית מסח | now another third part was at the gate Sur and another third part at the gate behind the guard--shall keep the watch of the house and be a barrier
text_en: And Solomon did that which was evil in the sight of the LORD, and went not fully after the LORD, as did David his father.{S}
text_pisuk: וַיַּעַשׂ שְׁלֹמֹה הָרַע, בְּעֵינֵי יְהוָה; וְלֹא מִלֵּא אַחֲרֵי יְהוָה, כְּדָוִד אָבִיו. | And Solomon did that which was evil in the sight of the LORD, and went not fully after the LORD, as did David his father.{S} | וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁית בְּשַׁעַר סוּר, וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁית בַּשַּׁעַר אַחַר הָרָצִים; וּשְׁמַרְתֶּם אֶת-מִשְׁמֶרֶת הַבַּיִת, מַסָּח. | now another third part was at the gate Sur, and another third part at the gate behind the guard--shall keep the watch of the house, and be a barrier.

text_he: אז יבנה שלמה במה לכמוש שקץ מואב בהר אשר על-פני ירושלם ולמלך שקץ בני עמון | Then did Solomon build a high place for Chemosh the detestation of Moab in the mount that is before Jerusalem and for Molech the detestation of the children of Ammon | ושתי הידות בכם כל יצאי השבת ושמרו את-משמרת בית-יהוה אל-המלך | And the other two parts of you even all that go forth on the sabbath shall keep the watch of the house of the LORD about the king
text_en: Then did Solomon build a high place for Chemosh the detestation of Moab, in the mount that is before Jerusalem, and for Molech the detestation of the children of Ammon.
text_pisuk: אָז יִבְנֶה שְׁלֹמֹה בָּמָה, לִכְמוֹשׁ שִׁקֻּץ מוֹאָב, בָּהָר, אֲשֶׁר עַל-פְּנֵי יְרוּשָׁלִָם; וּלְמֹלֶךְ, שִׁקֻּץ בְּנֵי עַמּוֹן. | Then did Solomon build a high place for Chemosh the detestation of Moab, in the mount that is before Jerusalem, and for Molech the detestation of the children of Ammon. | וּשְׁתֵּי הַיָּדוֹת בָּכֶם, כֹּל יֹצְאֵי הַשַּׁבָּת, וְשָׁמְרוּ אֶת-מִשְׁמֶרֶת בֵּית-יְהוָה, אֶל-הַמֶּלֶךְ. | And the other two parts of you, even all that go forth on the sabbath, shall keep the watch of the house of the LORD about the king.

text_he: וכן עשה לכל-נשיו הנכריות מקטירות ומזבחות לאלהיהן | And so did he for all his foreign wives who offered and sacrificed unto their gods | והקפתם על-המלך סביב איש וכליו בידו והבא אל-השדרות יומת והיו את-המלך בצאתו ובאו | And ye shall compass the king round about every man with his weapons in his hand and he that cometh within the ranks let him be slain and be ye with the king when he goeth out and when he cometh in'
text_en: And so did he for all his foreign wives, who offered and sacrificed unto their gods.
text_pisuk: וְכֵן עָשָׂה, לְכָל-נָשָׁיו הַנָּכְרִיּוֹת, מַקְטִירוֹת וּמְזַבְּחוֹת, לֵאלֹהֵיהֶן. | And so did he for all his foreign wives, who offered and sacrificed unto their gods. | וְהִקַּפְתֶּם עַל-הַמֶּלֶךְ סָבִיב, אִישׁ וְכֵלָיו בְּיָדוֹ, וְהַבָּא אֶל-הַשְּׂדֵרוֹת, יוּמָת; וִהְיוּ אֶת-הַמֶּלֶךְ, בְּצֵאתוֹ וּבְבֹאוֹ. | And ye shall compass the king round about, every man with his weapons in his hand; and he that cometh within the ranks, let him be slain; and be ye with the king when he goeth out, and when he cometh in.'

text_he: ויתאנף יהוה בשלמה כי-נטה לבו מעם יהוה אלהי ישראל הנראה אליו פעמים | And the LORD was angry with Solomon because his heart was turned away from the LORD the God of Israel who had appeared unto him twice | ויעשו שרי המאיות (המאות) כל אשר-צוה יהוידע הכהן ויקחו איש את-אנשיו באי השבת עם יצאי השבת ויבאו אל-יהוידע הכהן | And the captains over hundreds did according to all that Jehoiada the priest commanded and they took every man his men those that were to come in on the sabbath with those that were to go out on the sabbath and came to Jehoiada the priest
text_en: And the LORD was angry with Solomon, because his heart was turned away from the LORD, the God of Israel, who had appeared unto him twice,
text_pisuk: וַיִּתְאַנַּף יְהוָה, בִּשְׁלֹמֹה: כִּי-נָטָה לְבָבוֹ, מֵעִם יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל, הַנִּרְאָה אֵלָיו, פַּעֲמָיִם. | And the LORD was angry with Solomon, because his heart was turned away from the LORD, the God of Israel, who had appeared unto him twice, | וַיַּעֲשׂוּ שָׂרֵי המאיות (הַמֵּאוֹת), כְּכֹל אֲשֶׁר-צִוָּה יְהוֹיָדָע הַכֹּהֵן, וַיִּקְחוּ אִישׁ אֶת-אֲנָשָׁיו, בָּאֵי הַשַּׁבָּת עִם יֹצְאֵי הַשַּׁבָּת; וַיָּבֹאוּ, אֶל-יְהוֹיָדָע הַכֹּהֵן. | And the captains over hundreds did according to all that Jehoiada the priest commanded; and they took every man his men, those that were to come in on the sabbath, with those that were to go out on the sabbath, and came to Jehoiada the priest.

text_he: וצוה אליו על-הדבר הזה לבלתי-לכת אחרי אלהים אחרים ולא שמר את אשר-צוה יהוה | and had commanded him concerning this thing that he should not go after other gods but he kept not that which the LORD commanded | ויתן הכהן לשרי המאיות (המאות) את-החנית ואת-השלטים אשר למלך דוד--אשר בית יהוה | And the priest delivered to the captains over hundreds the spear and shields that had been king David's which were in the house of the LORD
text_en: and had commanded him concerning this thing, that he should not go after other gods; but he kept not that which the LORD commanded.
text_pisuk: וְצִוָּה אֵלָיו, עַל-הַדָּבָר הַזֶּה, לְבִלְתִּי-לֶכֶת, אַחֲרֵי אֱלֹהִים אֲחֵרִים; וְלֹא שָׁמַר, אֵת אֲשֶׁר-צִוָּה יְהוָה. | and had commanded him concerning this thing, that he should not go after other gods; but he kept not that which the LORD commanded. | וַיִּתֵּן הַכֹּהֵן לְשָׂרֵי המאיות (הַמֵּאוֹת), אֶת-הַחֲנִית וְאֶת-הַשְּׁלָטִים, אֲשֶׁר, לַמֶּלֶךְ דָּוִד--אֲשֶׁר, בְּבֵית יְהוָה. | And the priest delivered to the captains over hundreds the spear and shields that had been king David's, which were in the house of the LORD.

text_he: ויאמר יהוה לשלמה יען אשר היתה-זאת עמך ולא שמרת בריתי וחקתי אשר צויתי עליך--קרע אקרע את-המלכה מעליך ונתיה לעבדך | Wherefore the LORD said unto Solomon 'Forasmuch as this hath been in thy mind and thou hast not kept My covenant and My statutes which I have commanded thee I will surely rend the kingdom from thee and will give it to thy servant | ויעמדו הרצים איש וכליו בידו מכתף הבית הימנית עד-כתף הבית השמאלית למזבח ולבית--על-המלך סביב | And the guard stood every man with his weapons in his hand from the right side of the house to the left side of the house along by the altar and the house by the king round about
text_en: Wherefore the LORD said unto Solomon: 'Forasmuch as this hath been in thy mind, and thou hast not kept My covenant and My statutes, which I have commanded thee, I will surely rend the kingdom from thee, and will give it to thy servant.
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמֶר יְהוָה לִשְׁלֹמֹה, יַעַן אֲשֶׁר הָיְתָה-זֹּאת עִמָּךְ, וְלֹא שָׁמַרְתָּ בְּרִיתִי וְחֻקֹּתַי, אֲשֶׁר צִוִּיתִי עָלֶיךָ--קָרֹעַ אֶקְרַע אֶת-הַמַּמְלָכָה מֵעָלֶיךָ, וּנְתַתִּיהָ לְעַבְדֶּךָ. | Wherefore the LORD said unto Solomon: 'Forasmuch as this hath been in thy mind, and thou hast not kept My covenant and My statutes, which I have commanded thee, I will surely rend the kingdom from thee, and will give it to thy servant. | וַיַּעַמְדוּ הָרָצִים אִישׁ וְכֵלָיו בְּיָדוֹ, מִכֶּתֶף הַבַּיִת הַיְמָנִית עַד-כֶּתֶף הַבַּיִת הַשְּׂמָאלִית, לַמִּזְבֵּחַ, וְלַבָּיִת--עַל-הַמֶּלֶךְ, סָבִיב. | And the guard stood, every man with his weapons in his hand, from the right side of the house to the left side of the house, along by the altar and the house, by the king round about.

text_he: אך-בימיך לא אעשנה למען דוד אביך מיד בנך אקרענה | Notwithstanding in thy days I will not do it for David thy father's sake but I will rend it out of the hand of thy son | ויוצא את-בן-המלך ויתן עליו את-הנזר ואת-העדות וימלכו אתו וימשחהו ויכו-כף--ויאמרו יחי המלך | Then he brought out the king's son and put upon him the crown and the insignia and they made him king and anointed him and they clapped their hands and said 'Long live the king'{S}
text_en: Notwithstanding in thy days I will not do it, for David thy father's sake; but I will rend it out of the hand of thy son.
text_pisuk: אַךְ-בְּיָמֶיךָ לֹא אֶעֱשֶׂנָּה, לְמַעַן דָּוִד אָבִיךָ: מִיַּד בִּנְךָ, אֶקְרָעֶנָּה. | Notwithstanding in thy days I will not do it, for David thy father's sake; but I will rend it out of the hand of thy son. | וַיּוֹצִא אֶת-בֶּן-הַמֶּלֶךְ, וַיִּתֵּן עָלָיו אֶת-הַנֵּזֶר וְאֶת-הָעֵדוּת, וַיַּמְלִכוּ אֹתוֹ, וַיִּמְשָׁחֻהוּ; וַיַּכּוּ-כָף--וַיֹּאמְרוּ, יְחִי הַמֶּלֶךְ. | Then he brought out the king's son, and put upon him the crown and the insignia; and they made him king, and anointed him; and they clapped their hands, and said: 'Long live the king.'{S}

text_he: רק את-כל-המלכה לא אקרע שבט אחד אתן לבנך למען דוד עבדי ולמען ירושלם אשר בחרתי | Howbeit I will not rend away all the kingdom but I will give one tribe to thy son for David My servant's sake and for Jerusalem's sake which I have chosen'{S} | ותשמע עתליה את-קול הרצין העם ותבא אל-העם בית יהוה | And when Athaliah heard the noise of the guard and of the people she came to the people into the house of the LORD
text_en: Howbeit I will not rend away all the kingdom; but I will give one tribe to thy son; for David My servant's sake, and for Jerusalem's sake which I have chosen.'{S}
text_pisuk: רַק אֶת-כָּל-הַמַּמְלָכָה לֹא אֶקְרָע, שֵׁבֶט אֶחָד אֶתֵּן לִבְנֶךָ: לְמַעַן דָּוִד עַבְדִּי, וּלְמַעַן יְרוּשָׁלִַם אֲשֶׁר בָּחָרְתִּי. | Howbeit I will not rend away all the kingdom; but I will give one tribe to thy son; for David My servant's sake, and for Jerusalem's sake which I have chosen.'{S} | וַתִּשְׁמַע עֲתַלְיָה, אֶת-קוֹל הָרָצִין הָעָם; וַתָּבֹא אֶל-הָעָם, בֵּית יְהוָה. | And when Athaliah heard the noise of the guard and of the people, she came to the people into the house of the LORD.

text_he: ויקם יהוה שטן לשלמה את הד האדמי מזרע המלך הוא באדום | And the LORD raised up an adversary unto Solomon Hadad the Edomite he was of the king's seed in Edom | ותרא והנה המלך עמד על-העמוד כמשפט והשרים והחצרות אל-המלך וכל-עם הארץ שמח ותקע בחצרות ותקרע עתליה את-בגדיה ותקרא קשר קשר | And she looked and behold the king stood on the platform as the manner was and the captains and the trumpets by the king and all the people of the land rejoiced and blew with trumpets Then Athaliah rent her clothes and cried 'Treason treason'
text_en: And the LORD raised up an adversary unto Solomon, Hadad the Edomite; he was of the king's seed in Edom.
